Title: S|C Ergo Magnetic Clipper
Description: The holy grail of clipper motors, the magnetic motor, is finally available in acordless clipper. Always considered the most heavy-duty and professional motor, the ERGO features the latest in magnetic motor technology with the improved and revolutionary linear magnetic motor. This turbocharged long-life magnetic motor runs at 10,000 strokes per a minute, not only offering the ultimate in speed, power, and longevity but the quietest performance of any professional clipper.The first-ever fully modular Ergo clipper includes full Matte Black, Metallic Pink, and Metallic Blue body kits to create different custom modifications. Assembled on the Ergo is a transparent thumb rest to observe the fastest and quietest motor in action. Engineered to be perfectly balanced in your hand, the Ergo features a click taper for the most consistent results.Includes: Charging stand, pass-thru cord (for corded or cordless use), 5 Magnetic guards, 3 lids, spare screws, transparent thumb rest & cleaning/maintenance kit. Convenient mini screwdriver for blade regulation and custom body modifications.

Title: StyleCraft Rogue Clipper (Matte Gun Metal)
Description: The holy grail of clipper motors, the magnetic 9V motor, is finally available in a cordless clipper. Considered the most heavy-duty and professional motor, the Rogue features the latest in magnetic motor technology with the improved and revolutionary linear magnetic motor. This turbocharged long-life magnetic motor runs at 10,000 strokes per a minute, not only offering the ultimate in speed, power, and longevity but the quietest performance of any professional clipper.Engineered to be perfectly balanced in your hand, the Rogue features a click taper for the most consistent results. Fully adjustable blade can be easily zero gapped for the closest cut and finish. Highest quality Black Diamond Carbon DLC blade stays cooler, rust-free, and sharper longer. With a click lever taper and lithium-ion battery featuring 120 minutes of run-time - a new standard has been set.Features:Turbocharged long-life magentic 9V motor runs at 10,000 strokes per minute, has over 5,000 hours of motor life, and whisper quiet operation.Fully adjustable zero gap fade blade can easily be zero gapped for the closest cut and finish.Lithium-ion battery delivers 120 minutes of run-time with a 105 minute rapid charge.Includes 5 magnetic guards (1/16', 1/8', 1/4', 3/8', 1/2') & cleaning and maintenance kit

Title: Gamma+ Boosted Super-Torque Modular Cordless Clipper
Description: The Gamma+ Boosted is a professional modular clipper that comes with 3 different body kits (Red, Gold, and Black) which are interchangeable for a fully customizable look. Its super torque motor runs at 7200 RPM, so it'll power through anything! It can be zero-gapped with its cutting length adjustable between 4mm and zero via a thumb lever. The levers are also customizable, 2 using a click system and 1 with a floating system for length adjustment.Its 45-mm fade blade is made from diamond-like carbon (DLC) which keeps it cool, rust-free, and sharp, and is also kind to sensitive skin. The Shallow DLC blade is designed for perfectly smooth cutting. The lithium-ion battery delivers 120 minutes of run time and is fully recharged after 150 minutes using a cord, docking station, or mini-USB charger. It has a large light display that indicates the level of battery charge.Super-Torque MotorBlack Diamond Carbon DLC Fade BladeNext Level CustomizationPerformance ModificationsBattery & Mini-USB ChargerPremium Accessories Included - 8 Double Magnetic Guards

Description: This is a fixed replacement T-blade compatible with all Gamma+ and StyleCraft trimmer models. This package includes just 1 blade so you are not locked into a blade combination that you do not need. Buy the exact blade you need, Gamma+ allows you to mix and match your blades as you desire.EASY INSTALLATION – To replace the fixed blade simply unscrew the two screws on the back of the trimmer, gently remove the old blade, replace with new one, and reinstall screws into machine. Make sure blades are aligned properly before turning on machine.  Improper alignment may cause injury. As consistent with any Gamma+ or StyleCraft tools, all blades are fully adjustable to zero gap for the closest cut and finish.HOW TO CLEAN and CARE FOR YOUR BLADE - gently brush the blade with the maintenance kit brush to clear debris, spray blades with disinfectant (optional), apply 2-3 drops of oil directly on the blade and wipe trimmer body clean with a dry cloth.  Using the blade cover can help to avoid scratches and blade damage along with storage to help prolong the life the blade. We recommend, depending on your daily use, to change your blades every 1 to 4 months for superior sharpness.• FEWER BLADE CHANGES when properly maintained and cleaned • ZERO GAP BLADE for the closest cut and finish• PROFESSIONAL QUALITY materials for maximum performance• FITS ALL GAMMA+ and StyleCraft trimmer models• ENGINEERED AND DESIGNED in ItalyTHINK GAMMA+ THINK THE FUTURE

Title: CHI Ionic Permanent Shine Crème Hair Color-1N Black
Description:
CHI® Ionic Permanent Shine Color Systems. Confidence has never been so easy with coloring. CHI® Ionic Permanent Shine Color is the easiest and most reliable color line that you can imagine!
There is no guesswork with complicated formulations because the formula is already pre-mixed for you in the CHI® Ionic Color Tube! Formulating is just following the Four Easy Steps.
These steps are logical, step-by-step sequences, which will guide you to achieve your target color with precise accuracy and predictability.

Step 2: Determine the Level You Wish to Achieve

CHI® Ionic Permanent Shine Color Systems. Confidence has never been so easy with coloring. CHI® Ionic Permanent Shine Color is the easiest and most reliable color line that you can imagine!
There is no guesswork with complicated formulations because the formula is already pre-mixed for you in the CHI® Ionic Color Tube! Formulating is just following the Four Easy Steps.
These steps are logical, step-by-step sequences, which will guide you to achieve your target color with precise accuracy and predictability.
Step 1: Determine the Natural Level You Are Starting From
Step 2: Determine the Level You Wish to Achieve
Step 3: Determine the Tone Desired
Step 4: Determine the Volume of Developer Needed

CHI® Ionic Permanent Shine Color Systems. Confidence has never been so easy with coloring. CHI® Ionic Permanent Shine Color is the easiest and most reliable color line that you can imagine!
There is no guesswork with complicated formulations because the formula is already pre-mixed for you in the CHI® Ionic Color Tube! Formulating is just following the Four Easy Steps.
These steps are logical, step-by-step sequences, which will guide you to achieve your target color with precise accuracy and predictability.
Step 1: Determine the Natural Level You Are Starting From
Step 2: Determine the Level You Wish to Achieve
Step 3: Determine the Tone Desired
Step 4: Determine the Volume of Developer Needed

Title: CHI Ionic Shine Shades Liquid Hair Color-1N Black
Description:
CHI Ionic Shine Shades is a versatile liquid color line that can be used as a stand alone coloring system or in conjunction with CHI Ionic Permanent Shine Hair Color. Easy to mix and apply liquid formula features PDS coloring system that can be used for Permanent, Demi-Perment and Semi-Permanent color formulations. CHI shine shades offers the ability to tone, correct, and refresh all color tones, perfect for maximizing color services in the salon.
65 Color Shade System
- 59 Color Shades
- 5 Additives - intensify or neautralize tones
- 1 Clear - adds shine for touch ups or full color application

Title: Koleston Perfect ME+ Permanent Color Collection-2/0 Darkest Brown/Natural
Description:
Koleston Perfect - Our purest Color Ever with ME+ Technology
Hair color trends are constantly moving. One week we might be talking about rose gold hair, and the next we’re taking it neon blue or paring locks back with natural-looking balayage. You could never call our industry’s goings-on uneventful, but there is one area where things tend to stay the same: in the choice of dye molecules that are used.
Until now, that is. Wella Professionals’ technical advancement soars to new heights with the introduction of KOLESTON PERFECT with ME+. It is the first and only professional hair color brand to feature breakthrough technologies, Pure Balance Technology and ME+. But, what does that mean? Let’s break it down…
The Pure Balance Technology is designed to minimize the formation of free radicals during the color formation by deactivating impurities like metals present in hair. Free radicals interfere with the color formation during the color development and are a key cause to hair damage. With Pure Balance Technology, the result is even pure color results with natural depth and shine and significantly less hair damage, color after color*.
Meanwhile, the ME+ technology is a scientific breakthrough designed to replace extreme sensitizers, PPD and PTD. ME+ considerably reduces the risk of developing a new allergy to hair color**.  First patented in the 19th century, PPD and PTD had been the leading ingredients in permanent hair color for over 130 years. NEW KOLESTON PERFECT with ME+ is about to change that, offering salon clients our most meaningful change in hair color innovation in over a century.
The new formula also delivers color that is significantly more even, balanced and true to tone from root to tip** offering better balance of tone and control of depth** with up to 100% grey coverage. The vibrant color portfolio spans naturals, brunettes, reds and blondes, plus a special mixing range to make a wide array of shades possible. 
NEW KOLESTON PERFECT with ME+ features the same mixing ratio, the same development time and the same grey coverage, all enhanced with easier mixing, more precise application and an improved fragrance that offers a better experience for colorists and clients.

* Versus previous Koleston Perfect. Valid for Koleston Perfect with Pure Balance Technology
** FOR THE PEOPLE NOT ALLERGIC TO HAIR COLORANTS. Although the risk of developing new allergy is reduced, there remains a risk of allergic reaction that can be severe. Always perform an Allergy Alert Test 48h before each coloration. Strictly follow safety instructions and consult www.wella.com/XYZ. If your client has ever experienced an allergic reaction to hair colorants, you should not color. ME+ is present in specific shades of Pure Naturals, Rich Naturals, Vibrant Reds, Special Blondes and Deep Browns of the Koleston Perfect brand.

You could never call our industry’s goings-on uneventful, but there is one area where things tend to stay the same: in the choice of dye molecules that are used.
Until now, that is. Wella Professionals’ technical advancement soars to new heights with the introduction of KOLESTON PERFECT with ME+. It is the first and only professional hair color brand to feature breakthrough technologies, Pure Balance Technology and ME+. But, what does that mean? Let’s break it down…
The Pure Balance Technology is designed to minimize the formation of free radicals during the color formation by deactivating impurities like metals present in hair. Free radicals interfere with the color formation during the color development and are a key cause to hair damage. With Pure Balance Technology, the result is even pure color results with natural depth and shine and significantly less hair damage, color after color*.
Meanwhile, the ME+ technology is a scientific breakthrough designed to replace extreme sensitizers, PPD and PTD. ME+ considerably reduces the risk of developing a new allergy to hair color**.  First patented in the 19th century, PPD and PTD had been the leading ingredients in permanent hair color for over 130 years. NEW KOLESTON PERFECT with ME+ is about to change that, offering salon clients our most meaningful change in hair color innovation in over a century.
The new formula also delivers color that is significantly more even, balanced and true to tone from root to tip** offering better balance of tone and control of depth** with up to 100% grey coverage. The vibrant color portfolio spans naturals, brunettes, reds and blondes, plus a special mixing range to make a wide array of shades possible. 
NEW KOLESTON PERFECT with ME+ features the same mixing ratio, the same development time and the same grey coverage, all enhanced with easier mixing, more precise application and an improved fragrance that offers a better experience for colorists and clients.

* Versus previous Koleston Perfect. Valid for Koleston Perfect with Pure Balance Technology
** FOR THE PEOPLE NOT ALLERGIC TO HAIR COLORANTS. Although the risk of developing new allergy is reduced, there remains a risk of allergic reaction that can be severe. Always perform an Allergy Alert Test 48h before each coloration. Strictly follow safety instructions and consult www.wella.com/XYZ. If your client has ever experienced an allergic reaction to hair colorants, you should not color. ME+ is present in specific shades of Pure Naturals, Rich Naturals, Vibrant Reds, Special Blondes and Deep Browns of the Koleston Perfect brand.

Title: Koleston Perfect ME+ Permanent Color Collection-5/43 Light Red Gold Brown

Hair color trends are constantly moving. One week we might be talking about rose gold hair, and the next we’re taking it neon blue or paring locks back with natural-looking balayage. Description:
Koleston Perfect - Our purest Color Ever with ME+ Technology
Hair color trends are constantly moving. One week we might be talking about rose gold hair, and the next we’re taking it neon blue or paring locks back with natural-looking balayage. You could never call our industry’s goings-on uneventful, but there is one area where things tend to stay the same: in the choice of dye molecules that are used.
Until now, that is. Wella Professionals’ technical advancement soars to new heights with the introduction of KOLESTON PERFECT with ME+. It is the first and only professional hair color brand to feature breakthrough technologies, Pure Balance Technology and ME+. But, what does that mean? Let’s break it down…
The Pure Balance Technology is designed to minimize the formation of free radicals during the color formation by deactivating impurities like metals present in hair. Free radicals interfere with the color formation during the color development and are a key cause to hair damage. With Pure Balance Technology, the result is even pure color results with natural depth and shine and significantly less hair damage, color after color*.
Meanwhile, the ME+ technology is a scientific breakthrough designed to replace extreme sensitizers, PPD and PTD. ME+ considerably reduces the risk of developing a new allergy to hair color**.  First patented in the 19th century, PPD and PTD had been the leading ingredients in permanent hair color for over 130 years. NEW KOLESTON PERFECT with ME+ is about to change that, offering salon clients our most meaningful change in hair color innovation in over a century.
The new formula also delivers color that is significantly more even, balanced and true to tone from root to tip** offering better balance of tone and control of depth** with up to 100% grey coverage. The vibrant color portfolio spans naturals, brunettes, reds and blondes, plus a special mixing range to make a wide array of shades possible. 
NEW KOLESTON PERFECT with ME+ features the same mixing ratio, the same development time and the same grey coverage, all enhanced with easier mixing, more precise application and an improved fragrance that offers a better experience for colorists and clients.

* Versus previous Koleston Perfect. Valid for Koleston Perfect with Pure Balance Technology
** FOR THE PEOPLE NOT ALLERGIC TO HAIR COLORANTS. Although the risk of developing new allergy is reduced, there remains a risk of allergic reaction that can be severe. Always perform an Allergy Alert Test 48h before each coloration. Strictly follow safety instructions and consult www.wella.com/XYZ. If your client has ever experienced an allergic reaction to hair colorants, you should not color. ME+ is present in specific shades of Pure Naturals, Rich Naturals, Vibrant Reds, Special Blondes and Deep Browns of the Koleston Perfect brand.

Title: Vero K-Pak Permanent Creme Color-10N Very Light Natural Blonde
Description:
VERO K-PAK? Color Intensity Shades: Joico Vero K-PAK Color Intensity Color System gives haircolor pros the power to create vivid, on-trend, insanely intense shades. This intermixable palette of semi-permanents includes the three new shades—Red, Yellow and Orange—plus supporting shades of Blue, Magenta, Purple, Green, along with a Clear Mixer, so that it's possible to create any hue, shade and nuance.

Designed to delight the artist that lives within every salon pro, Color Intensity can be applied straight from the tube, or combined in endless combinations. Each hue can be used with or without the Clear Mixer, for a range of intensities from extreme to moderate to less intense. Ideally applied to pre-lightened hair, results from these highly-pigmentized semi-permanents can last up to 8 shampoos, depending on hair's condition and porosity. And like all Joico Vero K-PAK Color, Color Intensity reconstructs as it colors, thanks to Joico's exclusive Quadramine Complex. Hair emerges shiny, healthy and manageable.

This intermixable palette of semi-permanents includes the three new shades—Red, Yellow and Orange—plus supporting shades of Blue, Magenta, Purple, Green, along with a Clear Mixer, so that it's possible to create any hue, shade and nuance.

Designed to delight the artist that lives within every salon pro, Color Intensity can be applied straight from the tube, or combined in endless combinations. Each hue can be used with or without the Clear Mixer, for a range of intensities from extreme to moderate to less intense. Ideally applied to pre-lightened hair, results from these highly-pigmentized semi-permanents can last up to 8 shampoos, depending on hair's condition and porosity. And like all Joico Vero K-PAK Color, Color Intensity reconstructs as it colors, thanks to Joico's exclusive Quadramine Complex. Hair emerges shiny, healthy and manageable.

Title: SoColor Blended Permanent Hair Color-3N Darkest Brown
Description:
Matrix permanent and demi-permanent oxidative dyes are perfectly matched—so you can achieve seamless, scalp-to-ends color, that lasts and fades on tone.

	Pre-Bonded: Matrix exclusive Bond-Protecting Concentrate protects the inner hair structure – so you can maintain the integrity of the hair, color after color.
	Pre-Blended: Matrix formulas are pre-blended with background + reflect – so you can neutralize every underlying pigment.
	Pre-Paired: Permanent + demi-permanent oxidative dyes are perfectly matched – so you can achieve seamless, root-to-tip color, that lasts and fades on tone.

Blended Collection pre-blended with brown/tan background. Formulated for natural and fashion tones on

Title: Lumishine Permanent Creme Color-5BA Light Brown
Description:
LumiShine transforms hair from the inside out with breakthrough ArgiPlex Technology, delivering astonishing shine, color longevity, and overall healthier-looking hair?guaranteed!

Delivers up to 2X the shine*
Reduced breakage** and 100% replenished and restrengthened hair***
Nourishing protection that seals in moisture, softness, and shine for up to 30 shampoos****

* vs. untreated damaged hair

** Combing breakage on damaged hair with K-PAK. Color Therapy? Shampoo and Conditioner vs. non-conditioning shampoo

*** vs. haircolor without ArgiPlex

**** When followed with K-PAK. Color Therapy? Shampoo and Conditioner

LumiShine offers pros the easiest possible color solution for every salon service and hair type imaginable. Here?s why you?ll love LumiShine?

IT?S EASY! Three simple steps to brilliant color?consultation, formulation, and application.
ITS PREDICTABLE... RELIABLE... AND UTTERLY STRAIGHTFORWARD! A full spectrum of perfectly balanced, intermixable pre-blended shades allows you to deliver straight-from-the-tube (or bottle) color perfection?every single time.
IT SMELLS AMAZING! LumiShine is formulated with Joico?s exclusive Gentle Fresh Fragrance technology, a patented combination of molecules that helps neutralize airborne ammonia and envelopes your color service in fresh, calming notes of bergamot, iris, and sandalwood. Client comfort is off the charts.
Awards


AWARDS

BEHINDTHECHAIR.COM
Stylist Choice Awards 2016 winner for Favorite New Color Line
BEAUTY LAUNCHPAD MAGAZINE
Readers Choice Awards 2018 winner for Best Fashion Color

Title: Kenra Color - Permanent Coloring Cream-7NB Natural Brown
Description:
Kenra Color™ from Kenra Professional® makes it easier than ever to achieve simply stunning hair color results. This powerful NEW color brand is high performance, straightforward, and easy-to-use hair color that produces consistent, reliable results that stylists can count on to provide professional, true-to-tone hair color solutions on every client, every time.

Permanent Coloring Creme is a gentle, low-ammonia color that's available in 70 shades with a level system ranging from 1 to 10. It's specially formulated for consistent, reliable results when used with Permanent Coloring Creme Developer, 10–40 Volume.

Demi-Permanent Coloring Creme is a gentle, ammonia-free, deposit-only color that's available in 40 shades with a level system ranging from 1 to 10. It's specially formulated for consistent, reliable results when used with Demi-Permanent Coloring Creme Activator 9 Volume.

To ensure straightforward and easy-to-use hair color for stylists, Kenra Color™ offers:
- Permanent and Demi-Permanent lines;
- A balanced shade collection of warm and cool tones and a common level system;
- Shades that are intermixable for basic to advanced color formulation; and
- An easy measuring system and a drip-free consistency for reliable and precise color application.

Kenra Color™ from Kenra Professional® makes it easier than ever to achieve simply stunning hair color results. This powerful NEW color brand is high performance, straightforward, and easy-to-use hair color that produces consistent, reliable results that stylists can count on to provide professional, true-to-tone hair color solutions on every client, every time.

Permanent Coloring Creme is a gentle, low-ammonia color that's available in 70 shades with a level system ranging from 1 to 10. It's specially formulated for consistent, reliable results when used with Permanent Coloring Creme Developer, 10–40 Volume.

Demi-Permanent Coloring Creme is a gentle, ammonia-free, deposit-only color that's available in 40 shades with a level system ranging from 1 to 10. It's specially formulated for consistent, reliable results when used with Demi-Permanent Coloring Creme Activator 9 Volume.

To ensure straightforward and easy-to-use hair color for stylists, Kenra Color™ offers:
- Permanent and Demi-Permanent lines;
- A balanced shade collection of warm and cool tones and a common level system;
- Shades that are intermixable for basic to advanced color formulation; and
- An easy measuring system and a drip-free consistency for reliable and precise color application.

Title: Majirel Permanent Creme Color Collection-8.03 Gold
Description: Majirel, our legendary professional hair colour that covers up to 100% of grey hair whilst caring for the hair fibre. Majirel creates vibrant and pure reflect colours with a wide palette of rich tones and shades. A first in professional hair colour, Majirel cares for the entirety of the hair fibre. Enriched with Incell™  and Ionène G™ . The formula helps strengthen and re-inforce the hair fibre. Hair feels stronger, and is left looking glossy and feeling soft and supple to the touch.

Title: Majirel Permanent Creme Color Collection-8.34
Description: Majirel, our legendary professional hair colour that covers up to 100% of grey hair whilst caring for the hair fibre. Majirel creates vibrant and pure reflect colours with a wide palette of rich tones and shades. A first in professional hair colour, Majirel cares for the entirety of the hair fibre. Enriched with Incell™  and Ionène G™ . The formula helps strengthen and re-inforce the hair fibre. Hair feels stronger, and is left looking glossy and feeling soft and supple to the touch.

Title: Blondor Permanent Liquid Toners-Lightest Natural
Description:
Blonde Brightness – Lighten, Tone and Kick Brass
Wella Professional introduces 5 new Permanent Liquid Toners and 1 customizable Brass Kicker from Blondor – the Stylist Choice Winner for lightening*.  A versatile, non-progressive color that removes unwanted tones after any lightening service without the risk of over depositing. No Yellow, No Orange, Just Beautiful Brass Kicking Results! 
* THREE-TIME BEAUTY LAUNCHPAD READER’S CHOICE AWARD WINNER
Brass Kicker
A violet additive that must be mixed with Blondor Permanent Liquid Toners. Neutralizes underlying pigments for an extra cool kick and to minimize warm tones to achieve the perfect blonde.
Blondor Permanent Liquid Toners
Designed to neutralize unwanted warmth for perfect blonde results every time.

Title: Shadow Ash Permanent Collection-Shadow Ash  7 Medium Blonde
Description: The Shadow Ash Collection offers ten new shades that control warmth when lifting darker levels and fade on tone to keep brass at bay. Shine light on darkness. Take control of what lies beneath. Formulated with Miru-Style X-HP™ to deliver x-treme heat protection up to 450° and advanced Vibrariche™ Technology for haircolor with 2x the shine, these pre-blended Naked shades enable you to easily recreate the most demanding haircolor trends of the season.

Title: Majirel Cool Coverage Shades-5 Brown
Description:
Achieve ultra-cool reflects, extra deep coverage on all hair. Wide professional palette from cold brown to blonde for rich, deep, intense cool results. 
Hair is left with a silky soft touch. Only your haidresser can create customized reflects with Majirel Cool Cover. Ionène G™ and Incell™ advanced technologies reach all 3 levels of the hair to treat the entirety of the hair fiber.

Title: Vero K-Pak Color Age Defy Natural Beige Series-10NB+ Very Light Natural Beige Blonde
Description:
Take natural up a notch with the ultimate beige-y palette. This naturally balanced collection boasts seven brand-new Age Defy shades that brilliantly blend luscious, creamy tones of taupe with complete, one-step gray coverage. The kind of beige that offers glimpses of cool undertones with a thoroughly subtle, believable vibe. Age Defy Natural Beige shades deliver illuminating shade results for beautiful, more youthful-looking hair. 

Vero K-Pak Age Defy is an all-in-one formula that not only covers grays effortlessly, but revives hair and is proven to improve Texture, Luster, and Condition. Enriched with a blend of time-released lipids, essential amino acids, and bio-mimetic ceramides, Age Defy helps to soften and smooth the hair for renewed shine, condition, and manageability that makes styling a breeze.

Discover why natural-beige tones are all the rage in gray coverage.

Title: FramColor 2001 Permanent Color-9SB Very Pale Sandy Blonde
Description:
Framcolor® 2001 offers an endless choice of tonality and coverage. Naturally reflective, warm finish or a cool, more dense coverage. For the first time ever in permanent haircolor, one line does it ALL.
Natural or fantasy, warm or cool, Framcolor® 2001 shades offer the salon a complete and elegant palette on which the color artist can blend the perfect color for each individual client.

Framcolor® 2001 offers an endless choice of tonality and coverage. Naturally reflective, warm finish or a cool, more dense coverage. For the first time ever in permanent haircolor, one line does it ALL.
Natural or fantasy, warm or cool, Framcolor® 2001 shades offer the salon a complete and elegant palette on which the color artist can blend the perfect color for each individual client.

Title: Metallic Series - Demi Permanent Kenra Color-7SM Silver Metallic
Description: The Kenra Color® Silver and Violet Metallics Collections includes 6 Permanent and 6 Demi-Permanent shades that are designed for pre-lightened hair. The Silver and Violet Metallics offer artistry and creativity while providing a blue or violet reflection. The Metallics Collection can be used to add dimensional highlights or for overall cool steel look. Experience trendy elegance with the NEW Metallics Collection.

Title: Illumina Permanent Hair Color-6/37 Dark Blonde Golden Brown
Description: Wella Professionals Ilumina Color is a premium brand that introduces the wonder of light to the Wella Professionals portfolio. You get sheer, permanent color that's luminous in every kind of light with up to 70% more Light Reflection. Illumina Color provides superior hair protection and up to 100% grey/white coverage with a sheer result.  The color line was created to complement Wella's current hair color offerings. With a range of multiple shades, Illumina Color may be used with any developer, and introduces MICROLIGHT technology, whereby micro-particles encapsulate the metals left on hair to protect the cuticle and maintain clarity. See color in a new light with Wella Professionals Illumina Color.  Color service revenues increase by 5.6% on average due to Illumina Color. Based on survey with 67 hairdressers using Illumina Color in the USA

Description: Wella Professionals Ilumina Color is a premium brand that introduces the wonder of light to the Wella Professionals portfolio. You get sheer, permanent color that's luminous in every kind of light with up to 70% more Light Reflection. Illumina Color provides superior hair protection and up to 100% grey/white coverage with a sheer result.  The color line was created to complement Wella's current hair color offerings. With a range of multiple shades, Illumina Color may be used with any developer, and introduces MICROLIGHT technology, whereby micro-particles encapsulate the metals left on hair to protect the cuticle and maintain clarity. See color in a new light with Wella Professionals Illumina Color.  Color service revenues increase by 5.6% on average due to Illumina Color. Based on survey with 67 hairdressers using Illumina Color in the USA

Title: SoColor Cult Collection - Semi Permanent-Lavender Macaron
Description:
Matrix SoColor Cult - Vibrant haircolor available in an extensive palette of shades in semi, demi, and permanent technologies. Also with a Color Eraser that allows you to seamlessly remove color to change your looks.
What''s different about #SOCOLORCULT?
1. CUSTOMIZABLE LONGEVITY
2. SUPERIOR CONDITIONING
3. ULTIMATE VIBRANCY
Now you have ability to decide how long your color lasts with shades across 3 different technologies. Our highest concentration of vibrant dyes and superior conditioning help ensure the best results behind-the-chair. Welcome to the Cult.

Semi Permanent Direct dye color deposits on the outside of the hair cuticle.

Title: Color Insider Permanent Hair Color-9G/9.3 Light Blonde Gold
Description:
Revolutionary Technology: No-Ammonia, Permanent Haircolor with a Unique Oil Delivery Injection System.
• Creates a much higher resolution color result than a traditional  ammoniated color because the oil injects the color molecule directly in to the hair .
• The color develops from the inside out, optimizing the effectiveness of the color actives for maximized color impact with minimum levels of alkaline agent.
• Minimum stress on the cuticle of the surface.
• Rich, even finish from root to tip with 100% gray coverage.

Title: SoColor Ultra Blonde + Bonder Collection-UL-P
Description:
SoColor Ultra Blonde + Bonder Collection delivers the highest level of lifts, up to 5 levels, with a wide range of shades.
Featuring a low ammonia base, and the new built-in Fortibond Technology that targets ionic bonds, this formula provides 1-step bond protection without the need of additives.

Title: Lumishine Permanent Creme Ash Ash Collection-5AA Ash Ash Light Brown
Description:
LumiShine: Color so brilliant, it instantly restrengthens hair with up to 2x shinier hair 
NEW Joico LumiShine transforms hair from the inside out with breakthrough ArgiPlex Technology, delivering astonishing shine, color longevity and overall healthier hair - guaranteed!

Joi starts on the inside. Our exclusive ArgiPlex Technology fuses the power of three proven, advanced complex formulas to repair hair damage and lock in exceptional color, vibrancy, and shine
Arginine Replacement System: Unlike traditional haircolor that depletes this vital amino acid, LumiShine replenishes Arginine 100%, instantly restrengthening hair to bring back luminous healthy shine 

Arginine also: 
?	Drives color molecules deep into the hair?s cortex for longer-lasting, fade-resistant results
?	Reduces the amount of ammonia needed to color hair, improving client comfort during the color service

Patented Conditioning Complex: This conditioning shield surrounds the hair shaft to nourish and protect color-treated hair for up to 30 shampoos*, sealing in moisture, softness, and brilliant shine

Quadramine Complex?: Our exclusive blend of low-molecular weight and size proteins (MWS 150-2500) adhere quickly and effectively to ensure maximum protection and reconstruction from cuticle to the cortex, guaranteeing healthy-looking hair after every single color service 


With a Permanent Cr�me and Demi-Permanent Liquid system, LumiShine offers pros the easiest possible color solution for every salon service and hair type imaginable.  Here?s why you?ll love LumiShine?
?	It?s Easy! Three simple steps to brilliant color, consultation, formulation and application

?	It?s Predictable?Reliable?and Utterly Straightforward! A full spectrum of perfectly balanced, intermixable pre-blended shades allows you to deliver straight-from-the-tube (or bottle) color perfection?every single time.

?	It Smells Amazing! LumiShine is formulated with Joico?s exclusive Gentle Fresh Fragrance technology, a patented combination of molecules that helps neutralize airborne ammonia and envelops your color service in fresh, soothing notes of bergamot, iris, and sandalwood.  Client comfort is off the charts

Title: SoColor Power Cools Ash Shades-6VA Light Brown Violet Ash
Description:
Now brunettes can go cool & stay cool with SoColor Power Cools.  Matrix coolest ash shades with calibrated brass neutralizing dye combinations let you experiment from icy to smokey with no risk of red or brass. The low ammonia, brass neutralizing dye combinations allow each shade to stay true to tone and provides long-lasting pure cool tones.

ASH ASH TONES are calibrated  blue dyes to provide ultimate brass  neutralization for our coolest ash yet.
VIOLET ASH TONES are calibrated violet tones with an ash background to provide ultimate brass neutralization for long-lasting cool tones.

Title: Illumina Opal-Essence Permanent Shades-Platinum Lily
Description:
Illumina Opal-Essence Permanent Shades.  Metallic iridescent sheen with warm and cool light reflections reveal the change in color through movement and light.

Wella Professionals Ilumina Color is a premium brand that introduces the wonder of light to the Wella Professionals portfolio. You get sheer, permanent color that's luminous in every kind of light with up to 70% more Light Reflection. Illumina Color provides superior hair protection and up to 100% grey/white coverage with a sheer result. The color line was created to complement Wella's current hair color offerings. With a range of 37 shades, Illumina Color may be used with any developer. Infused with MICROLIGHT technology, whereby micro-particles encapsulate the metals left on hair to protect the cuticle and maintain clarity. See color in a new light with Wella Professionals Illumina Color.

Title: Demi Permanent Tone-on-Tone Color - Deepshine-5.3G Light Golden Brown
Description:
Rusk Deepshine Demi Advanced Marine Therapy Ammonia-Free Tone-on-Tone Cream Color is a marine mineral-enriched formula that rebuilds, rebalances and renews the natural integrity of the hair during the coloring process. Rusk’s exclusive combination of nano technology and Marine Nutrient Complex allows micro-sized pigment penetration into the hair while infusing the hair with intense color deposit, superior condition and radiant shine.
 
Deepshine Demi is excellent for refreshing the mid-shaft and ends, for toning, and for the client who does not want the commitment of permanent hair color.  It neutralizes yellow tones in hair to make them white. Use this toner to neutralize or cover unwanted tones in lightened hair. Toner can also be used to dilute semi-permanent hair dye.

Title: AgeDenied Permanent Haircolor-3/0 Dark Natural Brown
Description:
AGE DENIED by TIGI copyright©olour is a new range of 14 rejuvenating permanent haircolour shades designed to provide up to 100% coverage on over 50% non-pigmented hair.
The AGE DENIED Rejuvenating Complex has been crafted with three anti-ageing ingredients known to help combat signs of ageing hair.
The shine enhancing pre-blended formula maintains hair’s natural strength, smoothness and resistance to breakage while compensating for the effects of lost melanin.

You will find new shades that align Color Sync as the perfect refresh color for both SOCOLOR, beauty and COLORINSIDER. We've also enhanced our Reflect collection to provide more visible and pure tonality.

Title: Tonal Control Pre-Bonded Acidic Gel Toners-9V Iced Out
Description:
Tonal Control Pre-Bonded is an acidic, demi-permanent haircolor ideal for glossing, toning, and post-lightening control. This gel toner provides predictable and long-lasting, multi-dimensional results with high shine and extra-conditioning.

17 fully Pre-Bonded shades (bonder pre-mixed in every tube). Ideal for color glossing, post-lightening toning, enhancing color, overlays, and more. Large 3 oz. tube for superior value. Ammonia-free and vegan formula.

Title: Colorance - Demi Permanent Hair Color Canisters-5B@BK Brown Copper
Description:
Colorance acid hair color was introduced by Goldwell in 1986. It was the first acidic hair color to contain an oxidative pigment that could develop in a non-alkaline environment. Colorance contains natural plant extracts and hydrolyzed wheat protein to protect and care for hair. Colorance delivers brilliant color the gentle way, to every client’s hair.
Colorance Demi-Permanent Hair Color - As a professional, you know the healthier the hair, the more beautiful and shining the color result will be. Colorance is the first demi-permanent hair color with IntraLipid* Technology that repairs the hair during the coloration service.

Colorance acid hair color was introduced by Goldwell in 1986. It was the first acidic hair color to contain an oxidative pigment that could develop in a non-alkaline environment. Colorance contains natural plant extracts and hydrolyzed wheat protein to protect and care for hair. Colorance delivers brilliant color the gentle way, to every client’s hair.
Colorance Demi-Permanent Hair Color - As a professional, you know the healthier the hair, the more beautiful and shining the color result will be. Colorance is the first demi-permanent hair color with IntraLipid* Technology that repairs the hair during the coloration service.

Title: Demi Rapid Toners - Kenra Color-Silver Violet
Description: Rapid Toners from Kenra Color® have been designed to process and tone in 5 minutes or less. These ammonia-free, deposit-only colors have been formulated to provide your clients with the consistent, reliable results of Kenra Color Balancing Complex 5™ while enhancing blonde levels 8, 9 and 10. Kenra Color Demi-Permanent Rapid Toners offer versatility for adding multi-dimensional tones in four warm or cool shades.

Title: Oblivion Teal Semi-Permanent Hair Color
Description:
ob·liv·i·on
/əˈblivēən/
noun - a state of being unaware or unconscious of what is happening
Of all the ideas Danger Jones had for Oblivion, this was definitely one that came from the brain of the artist. With so many directions it could go, the team fell in love with this delicate take on the subject’s peace with the escape of consciousness.

For all hair types. Deeper tones last up to 45 washes, lighter tones up to 25.

	Acidic pH and Citric Acid help smooth hair cuticles and increase shine and condition.
	Contains Rice Protein which helps add shine, strength and condition to hair.
	Contains Glycerin which is known to help prevent hair breakage and add moisture.
	Contains Propanediol which is certified 100% biobased glycol alternative to increase hydration.

Title: Empire Green Semi-Permanent Hair Color
Description:
Something about Empire’s artwork hit Danger Jones all differently the first time they saw it. It was weird and cool and made everyone question, “what’s he trying to say with this?” The brand wondered what the trees meant to him, or if the neck piece was an adornment or a restraint, and if she was regal or magical. They asked none of our questions though, and in the end, it was up to the audience to decide on their own.

For all hair types. Deeper tones last up to 45 washes, lighter tones up to 25.

	Acidic pH and Citric Acid help smooth hair cuticles and increase shine and condition.
	Contains Rice Protein which helps add shine, strength and condition to hair.
	Contains Glycerin which is known to help prevent hair breakage and add moisture.
	Contains Propanediol which is certified 100% biobased glycol alternative to increase hydration.

Title: Solitude Blue Semi-Permanent Hair Color
Description:
With most semis, blues are the most stubborn shades during the removal process. So when Danger Jones was formulating the perfect blue, it was important to have both brightness and depth - but also be easier to remove. With Solitude, you get the perfect combination of both.

For all hair types. Deeper tones last up to 45 washes, lighter tones up to 25.

	Acidic pH and Citric Acid help smooth hair cuticles and increase shine and condition.
	Contains Rice Protein which helps add shine, strength and condition to hair.
	Contains Glycerin which is known to help prevent hair breakage and add moisture.
	Contains Propanediol which is certified 100% biobased glycol alternative to increase hydration.

Title: Hustler Pink Semi-Permanent Hair Color
Description:
After Danger Jones shared the artwork with their community of artists, and all over social media, who would’ve thought so many of would shout out this ‘80s-inspired wrestler as your favorite! All the brand can think is they must’ve struck a chord with those nostalgic WWE childhood memories!

For all hair types. Deeper tones last up to 45 washes, lighter tones up to 25.

	Acidic pH and Citric Acid help smooth hair cuticles and increase shine and condition.
	Contains Rice Protein which helps add shine, strength and condition to hair.

Title: Starrider Yellow Semi-Permanent Hair Color
Description:
When creating a brand, one of the hardest exercises to go through is to create a brand name. It has to feel like it encompasses the essence of who the brand is, it has to speak to the artists they create with and for, and of course, it has to be something not already used. Before Danger Jones was Danger Jones, Starrider was one of the few names that they just had a hard time crossing off the list. So when it came time to name Danger Jones's bold, bright yellow, it was a no-brainer.

For all hair types. Deeper tones last up to 45 washes, lighter tones up to 25.

	Acidic pH and Citric Acid help smooth hair cuticles and increase shine and condition.
	Contains Rice Protein which helps add shine, strength and condition to hair.
	Contains Glycerin which is known to help prevent hair breakage and add moisture.
	Contains Propanediol which is certified 100% biobased glycol alternative to increase hydration.

Title: Vertigo Neon Blue Semi-Permanent Hair Color
Description:
Vertigo was one of those pieces that the team just couldn’t put their finger on, the missing ingredient. Everything the artist had put together was super cool and we loved the direction, but they just needed “something”. In the end, it was actually a Blink 182 poster that inspired Danger Jones to consider laser eyes. And that was it! The team was sold.

For all hair types. Deeper tones last up to 45 washes, lighter tones up to 25.

	Acidic pH and Citric Acid help smooth hair cuticles and increase shine and condition.
	Contains Rice Protein which helps add shine, strength and condition to hair.
	Contains Glycerin which is known to help prevent hair breakage and add moisture.
	Contains Propanediol which is certified 100% biobased glycol alternative to increase hydration.

Title: Adrenaline Neon Green Semi-Permanent Hair Color
Description:
There was no shortage of ideas from South African artist, Simon Brendt @1horsetown, when brainstorming for Adrenaline. And Danger Jones was about to happily move forward with an illustration similar to what is seen on the box now, except it featured women skydiving. But at the very last second, David came up with an idea to change them to flying jetpacks, and that sealed the deal for all of the team.

For all hair types. Deeper tones last up to 45 washes, lighter tones up to 25.

	Acidic pH and Citric Acid help smooth hair cuticles and increase shine and condition.
	Contains Rice Protein which helps add shine, strength and condition to hair.
	Contains Glycerin which is known to help prevent hair breakage and add moisture.
	Contains Propanediol which is certified 100% biobased glycol alternative to increase hydration.

Title: Pavement Grey Semi-Permanent Hair Color
Description:
When Belgian artist, Arno Kiss @arnokiss, sent over his first draft, he prefaced it with a disclaimer that he didn’t want Danger Jones to worry about how little is on his sketch. And the team had to admit, they were definitely a little uncertain. But his portfolio had spoken for itself. And man, was he right. For all four of his Danger Jones pieces, in just a single version, his artwork went from a couple of sketched lines to a complete scene with so much life to them that they felt more like parts of a video than stills. Truly impressive.


For all hair types. Deeper tones last up to 45 washes, lighter tones up to 25.


	Acidic pH and Citric Acid help smooth hair cuticles and increase shine and condition.
	Contains Rice Protein which helps add shine, strength and condition to hair.
	Contains Glycerin which is known to help prevent hair breakage and add moisture.
	Contains Propanediol which is certified 100% biobased glycol alternative to increase hydration.

Title: ColorSync Power Cools Ash Shades-7AA Dark Blonde Ash Ash
Description:
Now brunettes can go cool & stay cool with SoColor Power Cools.  Matrix coolest Demi-permanent ash shades with calibrated brass neutralizing dye combinations let you experiment from icy to smokey with no risk of red or brass. The no-ammonia, brass neutralizing dye combinations allow each shade to stay true to tone and provides long-lasting pure cool tones.
ASH ASH TONES are calibrated  blue dyes to provide ultimate brass  neutralization for our coolest ash yet.
VIOLET ASH TONES are calibrated violet tones with an ash background to provide ultimate brass neutralization for long-lasting cool tones.

Title: Deepshine Gloss Demi Permanent Color-4CH Medium Chocolate Brown
Description:
Rusk® Deepshine® Gloss - Liquid Demi-Permanent Color
Deepshine® Gloss is powered by state-of-the-art technology direct from Italy. Infused with a Conditioning Blend of Marine Extracts and Oleic Acid to deliver maximum softness, shine and combability.
24 fast, efficient and easy-to-apply translucent liquid demi colors. Pairs with Deepshine Activating Lotion. 
Suitable for All Hair Types
For use on unprocessed, tinted, highlighted, double-processed and chemically straightened hair.

Title: Exotica Light Purple Semi-Permanent Hair Color
Description:
This poster, featuring a happy little tropical carving, was created by Hawaiian artist Bryan Yap @byap. But what people might not realize, is that Bryan was just a limitless source of ideas with incredible sketches for so much of Danger Jones's range. Not only did he create the artwork for Exotica, but he also happens to be the artist for seven other pieces, including Oblivion, Solitude, Starrider, Empire, Clear, Ray Gun, and Hysteria.

For all hair types. Deeper tones last up to 45 washes, lighter tones up to 25.

	Acidic pH and Citric Acid help smooth hair cuticles and increase shine and condition.
	Contains Rice Protein which helps add shine, strength and condition to hair.
	Contains Glycerin which is known to help prevent hair breakage and add moisture.
	Contains Propanediol which is certified 100% biobased glycol alternative to increase hydration.

Title: Diablo Red Semi-Permanent Hair Color
Description:
We all know how semis reds can present challenges behind the chair. The depth, vibrancy, and overall brightness all need to be perfect on their own or when overlaid on top of permanent color. So it was vital to Danger Jones that they tackled those challenges in testing, without exception. Diablo’s fiery finish is bold, bright, warm, and fueled with enough depth to cover any canvas, level 6 and up.

For all hair types. Deeper tones last up to 45 washes, lighter tones up to 25.

	Acidic pH and Citric Acid help smooth hair cuticles and increase shine and condition.
	Contains Rice Protein which helps add shine, strength and condition to hair.
	Contains Glycerin which is known to help prevent hair breakage and add moisture.
	Contains Propanediol which is certified 100% biobased glycol alternative to increase hydration.

Title: Poolside Light Blue Semi-Permanent Hair Color
Description:
Pastel blue is just one of those semis colors that causes problems for artists constantly. It just seems like no matter how light you get the canvas, you’re still left with a hint of green from the slightest natural warmth - to the point that adding in a little canceling violet to a pastel blue application is a pretty common practice. Knowing this though, Danger Jones was determined to pack Poolside with enough pigment to fight the warmth, while still offering a pastel result. And when it came down to it, that became the brand's expectation for all of their pastels: to actually offer full coverage, without any spottiness or hollowness - a feat artists are raving about daily!

For all hair types. Deeper tones last up to 45 washes, lighter tones up to 25.

	Acidic pH and Citric Acid help smooth hair cuticles and increase shine and condition.
	Contains Rice Protein which helps add shine, strength and condition to hair.
	Contains Glycerin which is known to help prevent hair breakage and add moisture.
	Contains Propanediol which is certified 100% biobased glycol alternative to increase hydration.

Title: Clear Semi-Permanent Hair Color
Description:
Clear is a weird one, right? Because it doesn’t have a color of its own. And it’s for that reason that the artwork for Clear came about as it did - with the front featuring television call outs to all those other shades, and the back featuring a collage of the entire collection. Because it is the key instrument to an artist’s ability to customize Danger Jones shades into any tone they want to create. An integral element of every Danger Jones color bar.

For all hair types. Deeper tones last up to 45 washes, lighter tones up to 25.

	Acidic pH and Citric Acid help smooth hair cuticles and increase shine and condition.
	Contains Rice Protein which helps add shine, strength and condition to hair.
	Contains Glycerin which is known to help prevent hair breakage and add moisture.
	Contains Propanediol which is certified 100% biobased glycol alternative to increase hydration.

Title: Cheap Date Light Pink Semi-Permanent Hair Color
Description:
There are so many moving parts in creating a color line, including what Danger Jones know artists want out of the color’s base, what shades they need, what fragrance they can enjoy day after day and hour after hour behind the chairs. Cheap Date happened to be the one that was key in that fragrance testing as each new fragrance came back mixed into Danger Jones's pastel pink. With an unbelievable number of versions, customizing, combining, and diluting different fragrances, the brand had finally locked it in, also making Cheap Date Danger Jones's first approved shade in the collection.

For all hair types. Deeper tones last up to 45 washes, lighter tones up to 25.

	Acidic pH and Citric Acid help smooth hair cuticles and increase shine and condition.
	Contains Rice Protein which helps add shine, strength and condition to hair.
	Contains Glycerin which is known to help prevent hair breakage and add moisture.
	Contains Propanediol which is certified 100% biobased glycol alternative to increase hydration.

Title: Burnout Orange Semi-Permanent Hair Color
Description:
Naming Danger Jones shades is one of the team's favorite jobs. How many brands get to throw around names like “Sweet & Sour” or “Whiskey Night” on any given Tuesday. But when it came down to the right name for Danger Jones Orange, we found oursselves drawn to the lyric, “It's better to burn out than fade away” courtesy of the great Neil Young.

For all hair types. Deeper tones last up to 45 washes, lighter tones up to 25.

	Acidic pH and Citric Acid help smooth hair cuticles and increase shine and condition.
	Contains Rice Protein which helps add shine, strength and condition to hair.
	Contains Glycerin which is known to help prevent hair breakage and add moisture.
	Contains Propanediol which is certified 100% biobased glycol alternative to increase hydration.

Title: DIA Light Acidic Demi-Permanent Hair Color-9.2/9V Iridescent Milkshake
Description:
What It Is

DIA Light is an acidic demi-permanent gel-crème haircolor without ammonia used to gloss, tone, and refresh color. We recommend DIA Light be used after all lightening services.

What It Does


	Tone, gloss, refresh previously colored or sensitized hair.
	Gentle acid technology smooths the cuticle for vinyl shine.
	Provides intense care for the hair.
	Provides zero lift.
	Not for white coverage - for white coverage of up to 70% white, we recommend DIA Richesse.


What Else You Need to Know


	A Must Have: Milkshake Shades.
	Cool shades in Level 9 and 10 are amazing to tone and gloss your blondes in just 2-10 minutes.


Developer Pro Tips:

You can use any DIActivateur Developer with DIA Light, but our Artists recommend:


	6-vol. DIActivateur Developer for your blondes.
	9-vol. DIActivateur Developer for your brunettes.
	15-vol DIActivateur Developer for your red heads & fashion shades.


Service Options:


	Corrective color/pre-coloration.
	Colormatch/refresh permanent haircolor.
	Refresh/tone highlights and Balayage.
	Lowlights

Title: Colorance @Elumenated Metallics Collection - Tubes-8CA@PB Cool Bronze Elumenated Pearl Beige
Description:
The @Elumenated Metallics shades merge the best of two worlds – beautiful, metallized colors with depth and coverage spiced up with a layer of multi-shine reflections thanks to Goldwell’s unique @Elumenated technology. Elumenation represents long lasting multi-layer color effects with outstanding shine – exclusively available in Goldwell Salons.

Colorance acid hair color was introduced by Goldwell in 1986. It was the first acidic hair color to contain an oxidative pigment that could develop in a non-alkaline environment. Colorance contains natural plant extracts and hydrolyzed wheat protein to protect and care for hair. Colorance delivers brilliant color the gentle way, to every client’s hair.
Colorance Demi-Permanent Hair Color - As a professional, you know the healthier the hair, the more beautiful and shining the color result will be. Colorance is the first demi-permanent hair color with IntraLipid* Technology that repairs the hair during the coloration service.

Title: Ray Gun Neon Yellow Semi-Permanent Hair Color
Description:
Neon yellow is one of the hardest colors to formulate. Danger Jones knows what it’s like to want a neon that is super bright, offers full coverage, yet still has depth. So with Ray Gun more than any other, the team pushed hard, going back and forth with the lab repeatedly, to be certain this had it all.

For all hair types. Deeper tones last up to 45 washes, lighter tones up to 25.

Title: Hotwire Neon Orange Semi-Permanent Hair Color
Description:
Once you get Danger Jones in your hands, you’ll notice that super luxe, soft touch feel of the boxes. However, you’ll also notice that Hotwire and the other neons have a completely different look and feel about them. Since their color is bold and explosive on the inside, we wanted a finish that would amplify that and be as bold and explosive on the outside - the way a neon ought to be!

For all hair types. Deeper tones last up to 45 washes, lighter tones up to 25.

Title: Hysteria Berry Semi-Permanent Hair Color
Description:
Oftentimes this color can be a bit challenging with semis. Artists are after a pinkish purple, but once applied, the warmth in the hair just pushes the result too far from purple. So, when formulating Hysteria, Danger Jones was certain to include just the right amount of violet to accommodate for the unwanted warmth in the canvas, leaving the perfect berry result.

For all hair types. Deeper tones last up to 45 washes, lighter tones up to 25.

	Acidic pH and Citric Acid help smooth hair cuticles and increase shine and condition.
	Contains Rice Protein which helps add shine, strength and condition to hair.
	Contains Glycerin which is known to help prevent hair breakage and add moisture.
	Contains Propanediol which is certified 100% biobased glycol alternative to increase hydration.

Title: Reflect Liquid Demi Collection-9RG Rose Gold
Description: Reflect liquid demi-permanent color range consists of 15 new shades, from warm to cool, that process in 15 minutes to enhance, tone or intensity your client's hair. The liquid viscosity allows for extremely easy mixing and application to hair. Formulated without ammonia or alcohol for a gentle process that improves softness of the hair and delivers brilliant shiny color results.

Description: Reflect liquid demi-permanent color range consists of 15 new shades, from warm to cool, that process in 15 minutes to enhance, tone or intensity your client's hair. The liquid viscosity allows for extremely easy mixing and application to hair. Formulated without ammonia or alcohol for a gentle process that improves softness of the hair and delivers brilliant shiny color results.

Title: Simpatico Light Peach Semi-Permanent Hair Color
Description:
Chelsea Bunn @good.scary, the Columbus, Ohio artist behind Simpatico, originally created two options that were both so cool, they were almost impossible to choose between. One option had that adorable cowgirl peach rocking out with a guitar in the desert, the other had her relaxing by her campfire roasting marshmallows. Danger Jones finally just had to land on one, so campfire it is! And since it was so loved among the brand's team, it became one of the first pieces that they just knew had to be featured in their fashion line.

For all hair types. Deeper tones last up to 45 washes, lighter tones up to 25.

	Acidic pH and Citric Acid help smooth hair cuticles and increase shine and condition.
	Contains Rice Protein which helps add shine, strength and condition to hair.
	Contains Glycerin which is known to help prevent hair breakage and add moisture.
	Contains Propanediol which is certified 100% biobased glycol alternative to increase hydration.

Title: Marijel High-Lift-Ash
Description:
Majirel High-Lift offers an array of different shades of blonde, from ultra-cool tones to luminous platinum blondes, in only one step. L'Oreal's coolest and most neutralising blonde shades tailor-made for you by your colourist. Enriched with Ionène G™ and Incell™ technology, the formula helps take care of the hair fibre providing silky soft feeling hair with up to 4.5 levels of lift. Enhanced with Icium+, a new iridescent colourant used for the first time in our products.
The formula provides extra neutralisation delivering shimmering icy cool results. Majirel High-Lift does not cover white hair. It is possible however, to apply Majirel High-Lift to hair that has a small percentage (30% maximum) of evenly distributed white hair. For global, full head application, use on virgin hair only. For coloured hair, use for touching up the roots only.

Originally named Fallen Angel, this bold purple was the very first color to ever appear on social media. Title: Copyright Colour - Gloss-10/32 Extra Light Golden Violet Blonde
Description: TIGI copyright©olour gloss is a demi-permanent haircolour crème emulsion that delivers a tone-on-tone low commitment colour service for your clients. It gives you full control when darkening the hair, changing the level, or maintaining the tone; however, it provides no lift. Hair will look radiant and glossy after this no-ammonia demi-permanent colour service. PH ranges from 9.5 to 10. TIGI copyright©olour gloss lasts approximately 20 shampoos, gradually losing intensity after each shampoo. Blends up to 50% non-pigmented hair and is designed to be used with 8.5vol/2.55% TIGI copyright©olour activator. Range totals 21 shades, including four gloss toners, which can all be used alone, or blended, and layered for total bespoke colouring; intermix to create an endless colour palette, enjoy mixing 9/03 with 0/03 creating a soft light golden blonde. Have a play with mixing mahogany with red tones like 5/5 and 6/6 to create rich warm mahogany tones.

Title: Color Fresh Masks-Golden Gloss
Description: Wella Professionals Color Fresh Mask is a zero-damage color-depositing mask to refresh salon color. Use this at-home treatment weekly to easily create vibrant tones in light blonde hair and balayage in just 10 minutes! The temporary color fades gradually and the rich care ingredients in the formula leave the hair feeling smooth and moisturized. Color results can vary depending on the mask used and the base level and porosity of the hair – the lighter the hair the brighter the color.

Title: Colour Refresh Bright Copper 7.40-3.4 fl oz
Description:
Maria Nila Colour Refresh is a gentle hair masque with non-permanent colour pigments. By using Colour Refresh you can easily either intensify your current colour or change the colour in your hair. The colour washes out successively and stays in your hair for about 4–10 washes. To each product a box with 2 pair of high quality gloves is included. The result depends on the quality of the hair and the masque will be more intense in treated or porous hair. To get the perfect nuance you can mix the different Colour Refresh colours with each other or use the White Mix to dilute the prefered colour.

Clean at Cosmo Prof:
Products featuring Cosmo Prof’s Clean logo are free from: Sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, mineral oil,  coal tar, hydroquinone, and triclocarban.

Description: Refresh, intensify and condition your hair color in 5 minutes with Biolage ColorBalm Color Depositing Conditioner. It deposits temporary hair color and leaves hair 10x more conditioned after just one use with no damage. For all hair types and textures, color-treated or not.

Title: Viral® Colorwash®-Blue
Description:
Introducing NEW Celeb Luxury Colorwash® with Colorposit™ technology. The new category - a game changer in hair color adds rich color while cleansing with hi-conditioning results. These 10 fun Viral® Colorwash colors allow you to instantly wash in daring color or maintain your color in between salon appointments. 
Viral® Fashion Color Care™  - inspired by personality color, it''s the new hair color paradigm shift. Instant, creative, cost-effective with no mess. Viral Colorwash® with patent-pending, new advanced cleanse + Colorposit™ technology. 7 extreme colors + 3 pastels + 3 clears. To achieve purity of bold color, hair must be pre-lightened (bleached), to the palest blonde or white hair.

Title: Colour Refresh Black 2.00-3.4 fl oz
Description:
Maria Nila Colour Refresh is a gentle hair masque with non-permanent colour pigments. By using Colour Refresh you can easily either intensify your current colour or change the colour in your hair. The colour washes out successively and stays in your hair for about 4–10 washes. To each product a box with 2 pair of high quality gloves is included. The result depends on the quality of the hair and the masque will be more intense in treated or porous hair. To get the perfect nuance you can mix the different Colour Refresh colours with each other or use the White Mix to dilute the prefered colour.

Clean at Cosmo Prof:
Products featuring Cosmo Prof’s Clean logo are free from: Sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, mineral oil,  coal tar, hydroquinone, and triclocarban.

Read more about Maria Nila

Title: Tint Shot Root Concealer-Dark Brown
Description:
In a perfect world where time is no object and colorists are always on call, embarrassing, difficult-to-disguise roots are never an issue - they don't exist.
For those of us who don't live in the Land of Make Believe, Joico's Tint Shot root concealer is just what undercover brunettes, blondes and silver foxes everywhere ordered!
In a brilliant 2-for-1 shot, Tint Shot's transfer r- and humidity-resistant micro-pigments adhere to hair, instantly concealing telltale roots while 'filling in' thinning areas to create the illusion of thicker, fuller hair.
Unlike flat-finished root concealers of the past, Tint Shot's flash-drying formula comes in four satiny custom-blended shades so natural-looking that even your stylist won't know your secret.

Title: Universal Shine Enhancing 10V Cream Developer-16 fl. oz.
Description: The Rusk Deepshine Marine Therapy Shine Enhancing Cream Developer is a developer and balancing lotion. Designed to be used with all Rusk hair color and lightening products for reliable and consistent results. When used with Deepshine Pure Pigments Conditioning Cream Color, they provide uniform, long-lasting color and maximum gray coverage. This developer is for anyone looking for optimal and predictable color results, and superior gray coverage.

Title: FramColor Bold Metallic Shade Collection

Title: FramColor Bold Collection-Silver
Description:
Summer awakens the desire for color. Even in hair. The newborn in the framesi color family is FRAMCOLOR BOLD. Green, yellow, pink, electric blue, violet, titanium are created to play with hair and make it a fashion accessory more and more personalized.
All those who love colors will adore FRAMCOLOR BOLD, the new generation pigment that restructures decolored hair while coloring. Its special formula seals the hair shaft cuticles and, while coloring, makes hair shinier and smoother for the best possible esthetic performance. With its 15 spectacular semi-permanent direct dye intermixable shades, FRAMCOLOR BOLD offers colorists endless possibilities.

Title: Deepshine Direct - Intense Direct Color Ready-to-Use Cream-Icy White
Description:
Pure Creativity.  Pure Artistry.  Unlimited Possibilities!  Introducing the new intense Rusk Deepshine Direct Advanced Marine Therapy Color Collection!  You get optical color shock for maximum impact. Intense direct color available in 5 vibrant shades:  Purple, Pink, Red, Yellow, Teal plus Icy White (Toner).  Available now new shades of Blue, Green, Merlot and Orange!

Deepshine Direct intense, vibrant colors can be used individually or mixed together for endless color transformations. The unique cream formula allows multiple colors to be precisely applied across the same strand, witout bleeding, to create unique stacking effects. New Icy White can be used as a toner, or to help eliminate yellow from blonde or gray hair. Deepshine Direct empowers you to create color expressions for your clients that will command attention.

Title: DeColor Clay Lightener
Description: Clay/3 Bold is the brand new product in the Decolor B family. Ammonia and perfume free, this decolorant offers a higher hair texture quality, even when damaged, thanks to a pool of protective substances. And it is perfect for all lightening techniques, in particular free-hand ones.

Title: Bleaching Powder No Dust
Description: A great performance and top delicacy decoloration for more than 7 shades. DeColor B Special Plus is a bleaching powder based on high quality oxidizing agents ensuring a strong decoloring power and on silicon by-products protecting hair all through the decoloring process.

Title: Cream Plus Bleach
Description: The new Framesi bleaching cream is used to decolor and highlight the hair and to remove cosmetic color without the dusting effect". It is extremely efficient in lightening the hair. Not only does its special formula allow results 1 or 2 levels lighter than a normal bleaching product but the protective oil contained in the cream ensures a delicate action on the hair structure."

Title: #Magnum8 Powder Lightener
Description: #mydentity @Guy_Tang #Magnum8 Powder Lightener is a dust-free, violet powder that lifts up to 8 levels in a single application. #Magnum8 is your ideal solution for fast-acting on- and off-scalp lift, maximum control and superior conditioning during the lifting process.

Title: Oxycur Platin 9+ Lightening Powder-17.6 oz
Description:
The Strongest Lifting Performance At Full Speed
Muli-purpose lightening powder providing 9+ levels of lift with integrated BondPro+ and upgraded Lightening Control Technology.  Designed for the strongest lifting performance at full speed.

Title: Oxycur Platin 9+ Lightening Powder-35.2 fl oz
Description:

Title: Blondorplex Powder Lightener
Description:
Wella Professionals introduces Blondorplex. The Blondor you love, now pre-mixed with the active ingredient in Wellaplex No1 (malic acid). 
For the first time, Blondor lightening powder includes Bond Building Technology. Bond builders help to reconstruct inner hair bonds during lightening or color service. Bond stabilizers further strengthen hair bonds and rebalances the PH factor.  
Our new Blondorplex has easy preparation and up to 97% less breakage with the same lifting performance. Blondorplex is the perfect partner for premium lightening services.  
Always complete a Blondorplex service with WellaPlex N02 Bond Stabilizer.

Title: Blondor Multi Blonde Powder-28.2 oz
Description:
Think Blonde!  As clients ask to lighten up for warmer weather, Blondor empowers you to achieve beautiful results across the full spectrum of blond hair.  Wella Blondor Multi Blonde Powder Lightener 800G is for both on and off the scalp lightening. It's dust free and completely odorless. Simple and safe mixing with revolutionary easy-to-pour dispensing system, which makes no direct contact with the stylist's skin. Gives perfect results for both on and off-scalp techniques. Variable mixing ratio provides individual choice of consistency. Blondor creates a new dimension in lightening and highlighting techniques.

- From Blondor's high quality range of professional lightening products
- For beautiful blonde results
- It's Tri-Lightening Complex ensures effective lightening
- With Anti-Yellow Molecules for clear blonde results
- Controlled and reliable lightening with up to 7 levels of lift
- Suitable for all applications and techniques
- Blue bleach, creamy consistency

Title: Blonde Life Brightening Masque-5.1 fl oz
Description: The Joico Blonde Life Brightening Masque instantly hydrates, softens and illuminates by neutralizing chlorine and removing trace minerals that can dull and yellow blonde hair. Nutrient-rich Tamanu and Monoi oils help restore strength and reduce breakage

Title: Olaplex Traveling Stylist Kit - 30 Applications
Description:
During every chemical service, disulfide bonds are broken and reformed to create a different color, texture, or curl pattern. OLAPLEX’s patented technology mitigates damage by seeking out and repairing broken disulfide bonds during the process. When used together, the two-part system allows salon professionals to push the limits of creativity while protecting the health & integrity of the hair.
Traveling Stylist Kit is perfect for on-location use for up to 30 applications.
Kit includes:
(1) 3.3 Oz. Olaplex N°1 Bond Multiplier
(2) 3.3 Oz. Olaplex N°2 Bond Perfector

Title: Light Master Lift & Tone Powder Lifter-1 lb
Description: Light Master Lift & Tone Powder Lifter is 1 step in a 3-part Highlighting System enriched with Pro Vitamin B5 to protect and condition the hair. Light Master Lift & Tone is a 3-part highlighting system that lifts up to 6 levels in 2-10 minutes with heat or up to 50 minutes at room temperature and offers customized toning while lifting.

Title: Color Lover Dynamic Blonde Violet Shampoo-16.9 fl oz

Designed to alternate with your regular Color Lover shampoo every third wash.

Title: Vero KPak Creme Lightener
Description: Together with Quadramine Complex?and vitamin-rich Shea Butter. This on the scalp only" creme lightener delivers:  True Speed: Lifts up to 8 levels  True Performance: Minimal swelling provides control over gold bands and keeps foils in place  True Results: Creme consistency results in even lift along the entire hair shaft  True Condition: Leaves hair exceptionally soft

Title: CHI Blondest Blonde Ionic Powder Lightener
Description: CHI Blondest Blonde Ionic Powder Lightener is a revolutionary dust-free powder that is unique in the industry. Formulated with silk and ceramic, it helps lift up to 8 levels in a single process. Offering maximum lift and tone in 1 step, this improved formula features intense blue dyes that help instantly tone brassiness, unwanted yellow and warm tones for cooler blonde results. This exceptional lightener is fast, contains silk proteins and other ingredients that are gentler on the hair, and works for both on or off-the-scalp applications resulting in multi-dimensional highlights.

Title: Deepshine Ultimate Blonde Blue Powder Lightener
Description:
Deepshine Ultimate Blonde Blue Powder Lightener with Inupro Technology™ that helps shield the structural integrity of the hair during the lifting process.
INULIN - sugar complex (complex carbohydrate) that can form a grid-like structure during the lightening process which   helps to keep hair fibers intact and moisture retained.

Title: Blonde Life Brightening Conditioner-8.5 fl oz
Description: Joico Blonde Life Brightening Conditioner is an ultra-nourishing conditioner that instantly detangles and renews for bright, beautiful blondes. Nutrient-rich Tamanu and Monoi oils help restore strength, softness and shine.

Title: Blonde Life Brightening Conditioner-1.7 fl oz
Description: Joico Blonde Life Brightening Conditioner is an ultra-nourishing conditioner that instantly detangles and renews for bright, beautiful blondes. Nutrient-rich Tamanu and Monoi oils help restore strength, softness and shine.

Title: Blonde Gentle Lightening Cream
Description: A new look to the original Gentle Lightening Cream. Rusk® Deepshine®Blonde Gentle Lightening Cream is a marine mineral enriched formula that deeply conditions the hair during the lightening process. Sea oak functions as a barrier to prevent moisture loss, while sea kelp nourishes and revitalizes the hair, improving elasticity. Deepshine® Blonde leaves the hair in optimal condition with radiant shine. This gentle formula lifts up to 7 levels.

Title: Blonde Life Brightening Shampoo-1.7 fl oz
Description: Joico Blonde Life Brightening Shampoo gently cleanses for bright, beautiful blondes. Nutrient-rich Tamanu and Monoi oils help restore strength, softness and shine.

Description: Joico Blonde Life Brightening Shampoo gently cleanses for bright, beautiful blondes. Nutrient-rich Tamanu and Monoi oils help restore strength, softness and shine.

Title: Light Dimensions Brightener Silver
Description: The Light Dimensions Brightener Silver: Up to 1.5 levels of lift for levels 5-7. These five-minute highlight upgrades reduce strong contrasts. Integrated BondPro+ and Cool Protect technology ensure clearer, cooler, longer-lasting results.

Title: Olaplex Salon Intro Kit
Description:
During every chemical service, disulfide bonds are broken and reformed to create a different color, texture, or curl pattern. OLAPLEX’s patented technology mitigates damage by seeking out and repairing broken disulfide bonds during the process. When used together, the two-part system allows salon professionals to push the limits of creativity while protecting the health & integrity of the hair.

Salon Intro Kit provides up to 140 applications. Kit includes:
(1) 17.75 oz. OLAPLEX  N°1 BOND MULTIPLIER
(2) 17.75 oz. OLAPLEX N°2 BOND PERFECTOR

JOICO VeroLight Dust-Free Lightening Powder must be used with JOICO Vero K-Pak Color Veroxide Gentle Cr�me Developer.

Title: Blonde Life Creme Lightener

When you want to go beautifully blonde?and go there fast?NEW Blonde Life Cr?me Lightener turns up the power and rockets you to bombshell status in no time flat. Here?s Why You?ll Love It...

Title: Blonde Life Brilliant Glow Brightening Oil
Description: The Joico Blonde Life Brightening Veil shields color from UV damage and fading; protects against thermal styling; adds shine; detangles and controls frizz.

Title: Blondor Base Breaker Silk Blend Cool/19
Description:
Wella Professionals introduces Blondor Base Breakers, specifically designed for an express base breaking service while gently depositing tone in up to 10 minutes. This allows you to lighten the natural hair up to 1 level while neutralizing unwanted warmth on both the natural hair and the pre-lightened areas. Aiding in blending the light and dark areas of the hair for a softer more natural and bright look and feel. All while being gentle. 

Base Breaker Silk Blend /19 – Cool: A soft ash cendre tone ideal for natural hair from 6/0 to 8/0 and to neutralize yellow tones.

Title: Total Results Brass Off Toning Mask
Description: Total Results Brass Off Toning Mask.  Highly pigmented blue tones neutralize and eliminate brassy/orange tones to maintain lightened or highlighted hair.  Helps repair and protect fragile hair caused by the pre-lightening process.

Description: Multi-Techniques lightening powder, up to 8 levels, high-performance formula, Balayage and Open Air Techniques, idea for natural or coloured hair. Adapted for all lightening techniques: enclosed highlights, open air and global lightening.
