Title: Extra Blonde Cool Powder
Description: Think Blonde!  As clients ask to lighten up for warmer weather, Blondor empowers you to achieve beautiful results across the full spectrum of blond hair.  Extra Cool Blonde Powder lightens and tones in one step.

Title: Simply Blonde Blue Powder Lightener
Description:
Kenra Color® Simply Blonde - High-performance blonde haircolor that provides radiant, reliable results every time. Take the guesswork out of blonding. This
easy-to-use collection provides precision application and simple formulating that inspires client loyalty through stunning results.Stylists can target each of the key attributes that a client needs when coloring blonde.
Kenra's signature LIFT-CONTROL-TONE. Performance, provides the radiant results every blonde demands. 
Ultra Lift- Control and Tone in a single step.

Title: Maria Nila Silver Shot
Description: Maria Nila Silver Shot is a finishing treatment with violet pigment that neutralizes golden tones. It makes sure the cuticles are properly closed by helping restore the hair's natural pH level. The treatment should be used directly after the bleaching treatment is finished at the salon. We recommend that the customer buys a Silvershot to use at home to make sure that the hair retains the correct pH level, keeping the cuticles closed and the hair smooth.

Title: No Ammonia Lightener
Description: Kenra Color® No Ammonia Lightener is a dust-free, fragrance-free, white powder with a lifting strength of up to 7 levels in a single application. Formulated without ammonia, this lightener delivers quick, optimal lift power that is less damaging to the hair providing a more manageable result. Extremely versatile, Kenra Lightening Powder can be applied both on and off the scalp, as well as mixed with Kenra Color Permanent Coloring Creme Developer at 10 to 30 volume in different ratios for multiple blonding effects.

Title: Malibu Direct Dye Lifter 6 Count Packette
Description: Take It Off with New DDL Direct Dye Lifter for Professional Colorists. Now you can get more control over your color formulas than ever before with Malibu C Direct Dye Lifter. This creamy, non-drip formula is designed for use with or without developer to give you the control you want while preserving the integrity of your clients hair.

Title: Simply Blonde Bonus Size Blue Powder Lightener
Description: A collection of high-performance lighteners, toners, and ultra lifts that provide radiant, reliable results every time. Take the guesswork out of blonding with every tool you need for the most demanding of hair color clients. This easy-to-use collection provides precision application and simple formulating for optimal blonding.

Title: Blond Studio 8-Bonder Inside
Description:
Blond Studio 8-Bonder Inside protects bonds & keeps hair strong while providing up to 8 levels of lift.
All-in-one step- no bonder additive needed.
Blonder-Stronger-Faster.

Title: Light Master Bonder Inside
Description:
Light Master Bonder Inside, Level 8 pre-mixed lightening powder with bonder Inside. Protects bonds to keep fibers strong while lifting up to 8 levels. Light Master Bonder Inside reduces breakage during the lightening process for increased strength, improves elasticity, and provides touchable smoothness.

NOW YOU CAN LIGHTEN & PROTECT ALL-IN-ONE STEP SAVING TIME & MONEY WHILE DELIVERING HEALTHIER HAIR

Title: Magnum8 Powder Lightener
Description: #Magnum8 Powder Lightener is a dust-free, violet powder that lifts up to 8 levels in a single application. #Magnum8 is your ideal solution for fast-acting on- and off-scalp lift, maximum control and superior conditioning during the lifting process.

Title: Blond Studio Platinum Ammonia-Free Lightening Paste
Description:
Ammonia-free lightening paste for fine hair, natural or coloured, with a light base. 
Achieve the best blond shades while protecting your hair, thanks to this ammonia free hair dye. 
Nutriceride and white bee's wax for maximum care. Lighten up to 7 levels.

Pre-bonded with citric acid & glycine to protect fibers and includes Kaolin Clay to hold moisture in the formula to protect the product from drying during application. Open Air Pre-Bonded's whipped clay texture saturates & forms to hair’s natural bends and provides up to 7 levels of lift.

Title: Maria Nila Silver Bleach Jar
Description: A professional bleaching powder with violet pigment that diminishes golden tones. The natural ingredient Kaolin, will strengthen the elasticity and prevent aging of the hair. Thanks to its lighter formula, our Silver bleach will create a cream once mixed that is easy to apply and can be used with paper, foil or a highlight cap – without bleeding or swelling!

Title: CHI Blondest Blond Creme Lightener
Description: CHI Blondest Blonde Ionic Lightening System is an ammonia free, advanced ionic lightening system that can lift up to 8 levels. Far infrared helps to neutralize unwanted warm tones from the inside out with the help of cool toned pigments. The lightening system can be used for on the scalp and off the scalp applications and provides less swelling than traditional lighteners. The lightener is available in either a crème or powder form.  CHI Blondest Blonde provides superior performance with simplicity.  It is easy to mix and use at 1:1 equal parts of CHI Blondest Blonde and CHI Color Generator with either the Crème or Powder.

Title: Blond Studio Blonding Majimeches Cream
Description: Majimèches is an ammonia-free highlighting cream that creates desirable golden blonde highlights and is suitable for all hair types. The combination of the cream and the powder texture gives precise, luminous, natural-looking highlights. The formula is enriched with Beeswax and Incell™ technology and helps leave hair feeling soft. Majimèches allows you to achieve up to 5 levels of lift while maintaining a beautiful natural golden reflect.

2000ml backbar size provides over 140 applications.

- Superior reliability for maximum confidence: no visible dilution of lightening and color performance
- Strengthens the hair fiber and supports bond stability

	Deep, long-lasting hydration.

Title: BondFix Conditioner
Description:
BondFix rebuilds, regenerates and repairs bleached, lightened or fragile hair.
BondFix Complex advanced technology, uses the safest, most up-to-date combination of ingredients to strengthen and rehydrate bleached, lightened, highlighted, all colored, fragile or dry hair from the inside out.
BondFix Complex advanced technology rebuilds strengthening bonds differently, with a highly rehydrating conditioning formula.
The smaller molecules of the bond-building material penetrate deep into the inner cortex of the hair fiber to strengthen and rebuild bonds. The rehydrating materials (larger molecules), work separately to condition and moisturize, detangle, soften and leave hair shiny and smooth.

Title: The Color Accelerator
Description:
The Color Accelerator (TCA) by Dennis Bernard fights fadeout! What could please your color clients more than a product that helps retain great color longer, while leaving them with silky strands? The TCA BY Dennis Bernard works to extend color life and prevent fadeout. Add this accelerator to professional hair color products, whether semi, demi, or permanent, and then use low heat processing. The product also can be added to bleach, foil and high-lift applications. Even feisty reds will fight fade thanks to the hair color additive. Tested by colorists in numerous salon settings, it works in just a few minutes. Add extra minutes to the salon timers to accelerate color on resistant hair, too. The TCA by Dennis Bernard accentuates perm processing, too. You can squeeze drops into perm neutralizers to silken hair as it adopts vibrant waves or curls.

If you have clients with damaged hair, the accelerator can amplify the effects of moisturizing conditioners, for that extra service any client will appreciate. Though highly effective, the formula is gentle and non-irritating. The Dennis Bernard Company invented TCA to speed up processing, with mega-conditioning, and practically eliminating fadeout. TCA gives color specialists a tool for improved bleaching and coloring services. Faster and more effective processing can actually benefit the bottom line of stylists who do a lot of coloring. When stylists can reduce color processing times with successful results, it opens up the potential for additional appointments and increased earnings.

Title: Dia Light Boosters-Green
Description: Dia Light Boosters are the ultimate Pro Tool to boost your color palette! Six versatile new pure reflects in Dia Light’s unique acidic gel cream allow you to neutralize, intensify, and create more with improved tenacity for long-lasting color. L'Oréal Professionnel Dialight is the perfect technical tool to create a glossed finish for coloured and sensitized hair. This luminous demi-permanent gel-creme hair color is formulated with gentle acid technology, which is ideal for color-treated or sensitive hair. Its creamy consistency allows for complete placement control and easy application. Once applied, Dialight gently penetrates the hair fiber while cationic polymers provide a resurfacing effect to the cuticle, creating shiny, beautiful results. Provides incredible shine and care that lasts up to 6 weeks.

Title: Colour Refresh Lavender 9.22-3.5 oz
Description:
Maria Nila Colour Refresh is a gentle hair masque with non-permanent colour pigments. By using Colour Refresh you can easily either intensify your current colour or change the colour in your hair. The colour washes out successively and stays in your hair for about 4–10 washes. To each product a box with 2 pair of high quality gloves is included. The result depends on the quality of the hair and the masque will be more intense in treated or porous hair. To get the perfect nuance you can mix the different Colour Refresh colours with each other or use the White Mix to dilute the prefered colour.

Clean at Cosmo Prof:
Products featuring Cosmo Prof’s Clean logo are free from: Sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, mineral oil,  coal tar, hydroquinone, and triclocarban.

Title: Colour Refresh Cool Cream
Description:
A nourishing colour masque with non-permanent colour pigments that will quickly freshen up your hair. The masque moisturises and reduces frizz for a silky smooth and shiny result. All colours can be diluted with our White Mix to create pastel colours. Or simply mix two different colours to create your own unique colour. Colour Refresh is perfect to use between the colour sessions at the salon or for special events.

Properties and expected results
-Suitable for blonde hair (level 7-10)
-Effect may not be visible on darker hair
-Do not use before any kind of bleach treatment as this may cause discoloration
-Does not cover grey hair

They are ready and willing to invest in their looks and want exceptional services and products that deliver fabulous results geared for them. Many men prefer a low maintenance approach when dealing with their look. Men ReShade delivers all of this and more!

Description: Prepare to take hair styling to the next level with this new collection of professional hairstylist tools inspired by the beautiful canyon skies. With layers of colors resembling cliffs and rocks, these tools are sure to give your tresses the perfect blend of color and depth. From the subtle hues of pinks and blues found in upper layers, to oranges and mochas on the floor, these sky-inspired tools will make your hair look like a masterpiece by Mother Nature herself! This sulfate-free shampoo is so gentle and moisturizing that it can be used as a shampoo for color-treated hair and a shampoo for dry hair.

The thirst-quenching, sulfate-free formulas of Pureology Hydrate provide superior replenishment, touchable softness and extraordinary color protection. Title: Food For Soft Detangling Hydrating Shampoo-10.1 fl. oz.
Description:
Hydrating Shampoo, infused with avocado oil & hyaluronic acid, moisturizes while cleansing & removing excess oil without stripping the necessary moisture dry hair needs.

Food For Soft is a professional hydrating haircare range that targets dry hair and instantly transforms it for touchable soft results. Food For Soft is suitable for all dry, porous hair types and textures. It is infused with avocado oil, which can add lightweight moisture, and hyaluronic acid, a known humectant that provides moisture and can retain a balance of lipids and proteins.

Food For Soft is suitable for color-treated hair and can be used from that point on and at home between coloring appointments.

Food For Soft can be used on 100% human hair extensions in which the cuticle has not been altered from its original state prior to purchase. Apply product to the human hair portion of the weft only avoiding any points of adhesion.

Title: Color Lover™ Moisture Rich Shampoo-16.9 fl oz
Description:
Hair color is the distinguishing feature that all hairdressers adore using to emphasize the personality of their individual clients.  Color Lover is a gesture of love for color-treated hair that every woman can repeat in the comfort of her own home with a customized, top quality and absolutely affordable treatment.
Color Lover is a HIGHLY PROTECTIVE line of shampoos and conditioners, formulated to combat fading and to prolong cosmetic coloring, DEEPLY MOISTURIZING, to keep the hair soft, shiny and radiant, EFFECTIVELY SPECIFIC to give the best result on every type of color-treated hair:
Coarse hair (average diameter between 70 and 110 microns) is often rough, unmanageable and porous. It needs to be softened and restored to a more manageable and radiant condition. With four types of conditioning ingredients, MOISTURE RICH SHAMPOO transforms the texture of dull, rough and unruly hair.

Title: Hydrate Sheer Shampoo-1 Liter
Description:
This concentrated, but lightweight, moisturizing shampoo from Pureology is Silicone-Free to avoid weighing hair down, and is infused with a signature aromatherapy blend of Peppermint and Corn Mint Essential Oils. Now with an enhanced sensorial experience and a creamier lather!
Fine hair needs hydration, too—but rich, heavy formulas can be too much since this hair type is easily weighed down. This lightweight, Silicone-free version of the best selling Hydrate moisturizing shampoo replenishes and detangles knot-prone fine, color-treated hair and is specifically for finer hair. Without weighing hair down, this daily shampoo restores suppleness and maximizes color retention.
The thirst-quenching formulas of Hydrate provide superior replenishment, touchable softness and extraordinary color protection. Advanced Hydrating Micro-Emulsion Technology deeply hydrates to revitalize dry hair and enhance color radiance, while Jojoba, green tea and sage condition. Multi-weight proteins of soy, oat and wheat help strengthen, rebuild and repair, and Pureology''s exclusive AntiFade Complex protects color vibrancy. A final touch of our signature aromatherapy blend of ylang ylang, bergamot and patchouli scents the collection.

Title: Hydrate Sheer Shampoo-9 fl oz
Description:
This concentrated, but lightweight, moisturizing shampoo from Pureology is Silicone-Free to avoid weighing hair down, and is infused with a signature aromatherapy blend of Peppermint and Corn Mint Essential Oils. Now with an enhanced sensorial experience and a creamier lather!
Fine hair needs hydration, too—but rich, heavy formulas can be too much since this hair type is easily weighed down. This lightweight, Silicone-free version of the best selling Hydrate moisturizing shampoo replenishes and detangles knot-prone fine, color-treated hair and is specifically for finer hair. Without weighing hair down, this daily shampoo restores suppleness and maximizes color retention.
The thirst-quenching formulas of Hydrate provide superior replenishment, touchable softness and extraordinary color protection. Advanced Hydrating Micro-Emulsion Technology deeply hydrates to revitalize dry hair and enhance color radiance, while Jojoba, green tea and sage condition. Multi-weight proteins of soy, oat and wheat help strengthen, rebuild and repair, and Pureology''s exclusive AntiFade Complex protects color vibrancy. A final touch of our signature aromatherapy blend of ylang ylang, bergamot and patchouli scents the collection.

Organic apple cider vinegar naturally closes the hair cuticle for additional shine and organic argan oil and aloe vera help further smooth and moisturize. AG's exclusive blend of rosemary, lavender, lemongrass and clary sage essential oils provide natural fragrance and the benefits of aromatherapy. Ideal for all hair types, perfect for colour-treated hair.

As a Body wash with its invigorating Woody’s fragrance and its awesome foam you can be sure that you'll be sparkling clean and ready to go. As a shampoo your hair will be fuller, shinier and conditioned. You'll be ready to take on any challenge. So what are you waiting for? The only way to start or end the day is to hit the shower with your Woody's Hair and body wash in hand.

Title: Big SexyHair Volumizing Shampoo-10.1 fl oz

Add volume and shine when you give your locks some love with this cleansing and volumizing shampoo - lather, rinse, and repeat as needed! Big SexyHair Volumizing Shampoo and Conditioner are the dream team for your hair, providing moisture and volume while improving the smoothness and shine of your locks for easy combing and styling. Free of SLE & SLES Sulfates. SLS (Sodium Lauryl Sulfate) and SLES (Sodium Laureth Sulfate) are sulfates commonly known to be harsh.

Title: Cleansing Powder-2.1 oz
Description: Maria Nila Cleansing Powder is a styling product that instantly refreshes the hair and scalp. Using the main ingredient rice starch, the new Cleansing Powder works by absorbing fats, natural oils, impurities and product residue in the hair. The powder settles in with ease on the roots and lengths of the hair. The result is a matte and refreshed hair. The powder gives a light volumizing touch to the hair but is still light in formula. In comparison to the Maria Nila Power Powder, the Cleansing Powder is more absorbent and offers less volume. Comparing it to the Invisidry, the Cleansing Powder adds a bit more texture and volume. The powder has a refreshing flowery scent of lily and rose, with notes of apricot and peppermint.

Description:
Cedarwood™ Shampoo with Dynagen-R™ is a delicate shampoo that removes the daily grit, grime, oils and product buildup that can rob hair of its natural beauty, leaving hair squeaky clean. 
- Recommended for non-chemically treated hair,  normal to oily hair &  fine to medium hair.
- Cleanses hair back to a purer state
- Maintains hair hydration
- Invigorates hair and scalp
- Increases volume and shine


WHY CEDARWOOD OIL?
Great Hair is Fresh Hair. Cleansed and Hydrated!
Extracted from the coniferous trees native to British Columbia, this fragrant oil features natural non-chemical chelating properties, removing everything from dead skin cells on the scalp to styling products and hard-water minerals that weigh down your hair. It is essential daily care for fine hair types and the perfect treatment to “reset” your hair before color or chemical services.

Description:
Nourishes and protects to help maintain the Depth, Tone and Shine of color-treated hair.

Title: Nano Works Gold Shampoo-1 Liter
Description:
This dry-hair, sulfate-free shampoo treatment is a special blend of a shampoo for advanced hair and a shampoo for color-treated hair. In addition to a gentle and deeply nourishing formula, it features a blend of jasmine, vanilla, rose & amber that''ll make hair-washing a truly sensorial experience. Now with an enhanced sensorial experience and a creamier lather.

This concentrated, luxurious sulfate-free shampoo with a light-weight texture, gently cleanses to improve manageability and shine.

Rich, transforming formulas recapture what hair has lost for renewed softness, manageability and shine with extraordinary color protection. Keravis strengthens hair and antioxidant rich Golden Marula Oil intensely nourishes to restore youthful movement, suppleness and shine. Nano Works Gold has a signature aromatherapy blend of jasmine, vanilla, rose and amber.

Title: Advanced Climate Control® Defrizzing Shampoo-8.5 fl. oz.
Description: For curls, once frizz sets in, there's no going back (at least without re-washing your hair). For truly frizz-free, smooth, and shiny curls, you have to prevent frizz before humidity wreaks havoc on your hair. With our new Advanced Climate Control® Defrizzing Shampoo, the fight against frizz starts in the shower. This unique sulfate-free formula keeps hair's cuticle sealed to lock nourishing moisture in, and frizz-causing humidity out. Our advanced blend of emollients (Shea Butter, Murumuru Butter) and Ceramides helps repair the cuticle and smooth its surface. Our high-performance Anti-Frizz Nano Technology with a protein derived from silk seals the cuticle to form a barrier against frizz. A dedicated UV filter helps protect against damage from environmental aggressors. The result: defined, shiny, controlled curls-in any climate.

Infused with rose and almond oil, this shampoo is safe for daily use to cleanse hair. Use in  combination with Healthy SexyHair Color Lock Conditioner for best results. Free of SLE & SLES Sulfates. SLS (Sodium Lauryl Sulfate) and SLES (Sodium Laureth Sulfate) are sulfates commonly known to be harsh and potentially damaging to the vibrancy and longevity of hair color.

Title: Miracle Shampoo Plus Keratin
Description:
Miracle Shampoo Plus Keratin. Strengthen hair when it’s typically most vulnerable — while wet. This shampoo imparts moisture and keratin proteins while cleansing to leave hair healthier with every wash.
Infused with keratin — the building-block protein that makes up all hair — the It’s a 10 Keratin Collection builds stronger, shinier, smoother hair beginning with its most vital components. This versatile compound also shields against damage-causing environmental stressors and heat, locks in moisture, guards against humidity, and restores lost smoothness to dry or brittle hair.

Title: Color Lover™ Curl Define Shampoo-16.9 fl oz
Description: Hair color is the distinguishing feature that all hairdressers adore using to emphasize the personality of their individual clients. Color Lover is a gesture of love for color-treated hair that every woman can repeat in the comfort of her own home with a customized, top quality and absolutely affordable treatment. Color Lover is a HIGHLY PROTECTIVE line of shampoos and conditioners, formulated to combat fading and to prolong cosmetic coloring, DEEPLY MOISTURIZING, to keep the hair soft, shiny and radiant, EFFECTIVELY SPECIFIC to give the best result on every type of color-treated hair: Coarse hair (average diameter between 70 and 110 microns) is often rough, unmanageable and porous. It needs to be softened and restored to a more manageable and radiant condition. Curly hair is frequently damaged by aggressive drying and by the use of straightening irons to remove frizz. Curl Definition Shampoo nourishes and lubricates with wheat germ oil and substances similar to the hair structure

Title: Water Works Clarifying Shampoo
Description: If you have curly hair, you probably love a great styling product - or two, or three, or more. And, after awhile, those products can build up on your curls, along with residue from dirt, oil, and hard or chlorinated water. The result? Dull, droopy curls that can't live up to their full, springy, shiny potential. That's when curls need the help of a clarifying shampoo. Unlike other clarifiers that can be too harsh and drying, our Water Works Clarifying Shampoo is formulated to be curl-friendly. Its gentle but powerful chelating formula uses a blend of Lemon, Grapefruit, and Orange Flower extracts to target, break down, and remove residue build-up without stripping away essential moisture. In one wash, it will help to reboot" the curl pattern for a fresh start. Plus
Price: it's safe to use on color-treated hair (but shouldn't be used directly after a coloring process). Curls are left clean

Title: Invisidry Shampoo-8.5 oz
Description:
Maria Nila invisidry shampoo is a light powder spray that quickly freshens up the hair and the scalp. The formula easily absorbs natural hair oils from the scalp and hair, which gives a newly washed look and feel to the hair. In comparison to the Maria Nila Dry Shampoo, the Invisidry gives a lighter hold and as the name reveals, it doesn’t
leave any trace of the product in the hair thanks to its innovative formula. Therefore, it works perfectly on both blonde and darker hair. The Invisidry has a unique fruity scent of passionfruit and apple.

Title: Food For Soft Detangling Hydrating Conditioner-10.1 fl. oz.
Description:
Detangling Hydrating Conditioner, infused with avocado oil & hyaluronic acid, replenishes hydration in dry & brittle hair.

Food For Soft is a professional hydrating haircare range that targets dry hair and instantly transforms it for touchable soft results. Food For Soft is suitable for all dry, porous hair types and textures. It is infused with avocado oil, which can add lightweight moisture, and hyaluronic acid, a known humectant that provides moisture and can retain a balance of lipids and proteins.

Food For Soft is suitable for color-treated hair and can be used from that point on and at home between coloring appointments.

Food For Soft can be used on 100% human hair extensions in which the cuticle has not been altered from its original state prior to purchase. Apply product to the human hair portion of the weft only avoiding any points of adhesion.

Description:
COLORVITALITY Conditioner maintains color up to 3 times longer**, moisturizes and restores radiance to color treated hair.

Title: Primer 11
Description:
To complete the Color Lover range, pre-styling Hair Primer 11, which removes imperfections and bestows no fewer than eleven benefits, first and foremost color protection. Pre-styling, acid pH primer, formulated with a pool of antioxidant enzymes of bio-technological origin and a UV screen. Indispensable for removing imperfections before drying the hair. Suitable for all hair types.

How does Primer 11 love your hair?  Count the ways…..
Meet Primer 11 and Framesi Color Lover shampoos and conditioners, filled with a promise to keep your hair color shiny and vibrant, infusing color protection, anti-aging and nourishing vitamins day after day. When your hair color lasts 95% longer, you will feel everlasting love.

Title: ColorLast Aqua Gel Conditioner-8.5 fl oz
Description:
Aqua Gel Conditioners for fine and baby fine hair. For the first time, weightless conditioning from roots to ends. Water-gel technology revives limp hair without adding 1 gram of weight. Aqua Gel perfectly moisturizes from root to ends and provides instant body and bounce. It strengthens fragile strands.
Color Last Aqua-Gel for fine, frizzy hair. Fragile strands are revitalized with hydration for strength. Color treated hair is enhanced with vibrancy & shine

Title: BosRevive Color Safe Volumizing Conditioner-10.1 fl oz
Description: BosRevive Volumizing Conditioner is uniquely formulated for those who want to help restore visibly thinning hair. Weightless, daily conditioner containing DHT inhibitors infuses body and shine without weighing the hair down. Saw Palmetto, a natural DHT-blocker, works with Niacin to help revitalize the hair and reduce shedding while Biotin and Panthenol help strengthen hair strands.  Hair appears fuller and nourished with more volume.

Title: BosRevive Color Safe Volumizing Conditioner-1 Liter
Description: BosRevive Volumizing Conditioner is uniquely formulated for those who want to help restore visibly thinning hair. Description: Healthy SexyHair Color Lock Conditioner is a colour conserving conditioner that helps keep color vibrant for up to 75 uses. Infused with rose and almond oil, this conditioner is safe for daily use to help keep hair hydrated. Use in combination with Healthy SexyHair Color Lock Shampoo for best results. Free of SLE & SLES Sulfates. SLS (Sodium Lauryl Sulfate) and SLES (Sodium Laureth Sulfate) are sulfates commonly known to be harsh and potentially damaging to the vibrancy and longevity of hair color.

Title: Tea Tree Conditioner
Description:
Keep your hair and scalp healthy and hydrated with GIBS Rejuvenating
Tea Tree Shampoo & Conditioner. Our SULFATE, PARABEN AND PHTHALATE-FREE FORMULA
is fortified with Keratin, Aloe and Hyaluronic Acid, helping to strengthen,
smooth and detangle, while Tea Tree, Eucalyptus, Peppermint and Menthol
come together for a cool, cleansing tingle that will leave you, and your
scalp, feeling revitalized and renewed. GIBS Tea Tree Conditioner is the
perfect rejuvenating follow up to GIBS Tea Tree Shampoo.
GET INVOLVED!

Title: Volupt Conditioner - Foundation-8.4 fl oz
Description: Volupt Conditioner is a volume-boosting conditioner with micro-lite technology that delivers volume boost without adding extra weight. The blend of conditioning ingredients creates an invisible layer around hair for voluptuous softness while the color-safe formula contains natural bamboo extract to strengthen hair and lock-in moisture. It is ideal for fine hair.

Description: Volupt Conditioner is a volume-boosting conditioner with micro-lite technology that delivers volume boost without adding extra weight. Title: Advanced Climate Control® Defrizzing Conditioner-33.8 fl. oz.
Description: It's a fact: Dry hair equals frizzy hair. That's because curls that lack moisture look to absorb it from anywhere they can get it - exposing them to frizz-causing humidity in the air. For truly frizz-free curls, you need care that helps balance their moisture levels. With our new Advanced Climate Control® Defrizzing Conditioner, the fight against frizz starts in the shower. This unique formula hydrates curls and keeps hair's cuticle sealed to lock nourishing moisture in, and frizz-causing humidity out. Our advanced blend of emollients (Shea Butter, Murumuru Butter) and Ceramides helps repair the cuticle and smooth its surface. Our high-performance Anti-Frizz Nano Technology with protein derived from silk seals the cuticle to form a barrier against frizz. A dedicated UV filter helps protect against damage from environmental aggressors. The result: defined, shiny, controlled curls-in any climate.

Title: Bed Head Recovery Conditioner

Title: Color Lover™ Moisture Rich Conditioner-16.9 fl oz
Description:
Hair color is the distinguishing feature that all hairdressers adore using to emphasize the personality of their individual clients.  Color Lover is a gesture of love for color-treated hair that every woman can repeat in the comfort of her own home with a customized, top quality and absolutely affordable treatment.
Color Lover is a highly protective line of shampoos and conditioners, formulated to combat fading and to prolong cosmetic coloring, deeply moisturizing, to keep the hair soft, shiny and radiant, effectively specific to give the best result on every type of color-treated hair:
Coarse hair (average diameter between 70 and 110 microns) is often rough, unmanageable and porous. It needs to be softened and restored to a more manageable and radiant condition. MOISTURE CONTROL CONDITIONER with rice bran oil, vitamin E and a pool of antioxidant enzymes of bio-technological origin

Title: Miracle Deep Conditioner Plus Keratin
Description:
Miracle Deep Conditioner Plus Keratin. Reverse the effects of hair that’s been depleted of keratin with a deep conditioning treatment that penetrates deep within the hair shaft to restore structure, seal the cuticle, and reveal shine.

Infused with keratin — the building-block protein that makes up all hair — the It’s a 10 Keratin Collection builds stronger, shinier, smoother hair beginning with its most vital components. This versatile compound also shields against damage-causing environmental stressors and heat, locks in moisture, guards against humidity, and restores lost smoothness to dry or brittle hair.

Title: Miracle Leave-In Plus Keratin
Description:
- This leave-in conditioner forms a protective film across the hair, automatically bonding keratin proteins to fully condition hair inside and out. 
- Closes and seals the cuticles, prolongs keratin treatment results and protects hair against heat, sun and pollution. 
- Untangles strands, eliminates static, and leaves hair shiny, sleek, frizz-free.

Title: CHI Luxury - Black Seed Oil Leave-In Conditioner
Description: Lightweight leave-in conditioner helps to detangle and smooth hair while protecting against thermal styling. Black Seed Oil replenishes moisture while fortifying hair strands, prepping hair for styling.

Title: Biosilk Silk Therapy Conditioner-12 fl oz
Description: Biosilk Silk Therapy Conditioner is a unique self-adjusting formula that provides balanced conditioning and moisturizing. Infused with silk, botanicals and vitamins that leave hair soft, silky and manageable without weight. Ideal for all hair types.

Title: Sensories Smoother Conditioner
Description: This conditioner for unruly hair stands up to defiant hair. It eliminates static while adding shine, balance, sun protection and texture for a smooth, healthy look. Apply RUSK® Sensories™ Smoother™ Passionflower and Aloe Leave-in Smoothing Conditioner to towel-dried hair for day-long smoothing effects.

Title: Natural Boost Conditioner Pouch
Description: Formulated with over 98% plant-based and naturally-derived ingredients, AG's Boost conditioner combines coconut oil, mango seed butter, rapeseed oil, rosehip oil, olive leaf extract, shea butter and hydrolyzed quinoa with the abundant benefits of organic apple cider vinegar to help nourish, detangle, smooth the hair cuticle and seal in moisture. A blend of rosemary, lemongrass, clary sage and vanilla essential oils provide natural fragrance and the benefits of aromatherapy. Ideal for all hair types, perfect for colour-treated hair.

Title: AllCurl Hydrating Leave-In
Description: Textured hair lines do not consider the complex styling needs of curls & only rely on hair type. AllCurl Hydrating Leave-In provides up to 70% more manageability, enhanced shine as well as 72-hour moisture retention. This versatile leave-in helps to detangle curls while delivering maximum moisture for endless styling possibilities. Define curls beyond just type and texture. For all curl types. Silicone free. Paraben free.

Title: Rock It Texture Conditioner-10.1 fl oz
Description:
Rock It Texture System, with polymers, helps boost structure for wavy and short style definition*. Hair is structured and primed for styles. Suitable for color-treated hair.
Texturize your hair! Get ready for high-definition, rock star style with Rock It Texture. Now all you need is that perfect leather jacket! With polymers for flexibility, Rock It Texture provides texturized definition, defrizzed waves, and 100% sexy undone texture.
*System consists of shampoo, conditioner, styler.

Title: Catwalk Oatmeal & Honey Mask
Description:
Intense nourishing mask for dry, damaged hair with a delicate oatmeal and honey fragrance by TIGI Catwalk.
Indulgent mask with a delicate oatmeal and honey fragrance. Formulated with acacia honey, wheat helps nourish and repair, leaving hair soft, smooth and full of shine. Active fibre-repairing ingredients which help to reconstruct the hair internally.

Title: INVIGO Brilliance Conditioner for Coarse Hair-8.4 fl. oz.
Description: Amplify your colour with the INVIGO Color Brilliance Conditioner for Coarse Hair from Wella Professionals.

Title: INVIGO Brilliance Conditioner for Coarse Hair-33.8 fl. oz.
Description: Amplify your colour with the INVIGO Color Brilliance Conditioner for Coarse Hair from Wella Professionals.

Title: Curl Quencher Moisturizing Conditioner-33.8 fl. oz.
Description: Tight curls' worst enemy is dryness - and the resulting tangles that can take over the better part of your head if you're not careful. That means the right conditioner is key to ensure you don't stress about annoying snags. That's where our supremely hydrating formula comes into play. Our Curl Quencher® Moisturizing Conditioner infuses curls with healthy moisture and makes detangling a breeze, so your tight curls are more manageable to style. Nourishing botanicals and vitamins rehydrate from within to maximize natural curl definition and shine. Algae Extract and Wheat Amino Acids help to seal hair's cuticle, locking in the moisture curls need-without the heaviness they don't. Curls are left soft and supple with buoyant bounce.

WHY CEDARWOOD OIL?
Great Hair is Fresh Hair. Cleansed and Hydrated!
Extracted from the coniferous trees native to British Columbia, this fragrant oil features natural non-chemical chelating properties, removing everything from dead skin cells on the scalp to styling products and hard-water minerals that weigh down your hair. It is essential daily care for fine hair types and the perfect treatment to “reset” your hair before color or chemical services.

Title: Hydrate Sheer Conditioner-1 Liter
Description:
Make detangling sessions a breeze with a lightweight, moisturizing conditioner for fine, dry color-treated hair that soothes with its signature aromatherapy blend of Peppermint and Corn Mint essential oils. Now with an enriched sensorial experience and a creamier lather!

Fine hair needs hydration, too-but rich, heavy formulas can be too much since this hair type is easily weighed down. This lightweight, silicone-free version of Hydrate moisturizing conditioner replenishes and detangles knot-prone fine, color-treated hair and is specifically for finer hair. Without weighing hair down, this daily conditioner restores suppleness and maximizes color retention.

The thirst-quenching formulas of Hydrate provide superior replenishment, touchable softness and extraordinary color protection. Advanced Hydrating Micro-Emulsion Technology deeply hydrates to revitalize dry hair and enhance color radiance, while Jojoba, green tea and sage condition. Multi-weight proteins of soy, oat and wheat help strengthen, rebuild and repair, and Pureology's exclusive AntiFade Complex® protects color vibrancy. A final touch of our signature aromatherapy blend of Peppermint and Corn Mint essential oil.

Title: Color Lover™ Curl Define Conditioner-16.9 fl oz
Description: Hair color is the distinguishing feature that all hairdressers adore using to emphasize the personality of their individual clients. Color Lover is a gesture of love for color-treated hair that every woman can repeat in the comfort of her own home with a customized, top quality and absolutely affordable treatment. Color Lover is a highly protective line of shampoos and conditioners, formulated to combat fading and to prolong cosmetic coloring, deeply moisturizing, to keep the hair soft, shiny and radiant, effective specific to give the best result on every type of color-treated hair: Coarse hair (average diameter between 70 and 110 microns) is often rough, unmanageable and porous. It needs to be softened and restored to a more manageable and radiant condition. Curly hair is frequently damaged by aggressive drying and by the use of straightening irons to remove frizz.

Title: VitalCurl®+ Balancing Rinse Conditioner-8.5 fl. oz.
Description: When it comes to classic curls, it's all about balance. Your spirals look their best when they’re nourished with gentle moisture – not weighed down with heavy ingredients. New VitalCurl™+ Balancing Rinse Conditioner creates the perfect balance of lightweight hydration for optimal curl health and frizz control. This conditioning formula, with Botanical Omega 3-6-9 Complex (with Chia Seed, Japanese Camellia, and Sunflower oils), targets dry areas to fortify hair’s natural lipid barrier, helping curls retain moisture, elasticity, and bounce. Its low pH helps hair retain hydration by keeping its protective cuticle layer on lockdown. The result: Healthy, high-performing curls with a more consistent pattern from roots to ends.

Title: Color Detangling Conditioner
Description:
Goldwell Dualsenses Color Detangling Conditioner nourishes thick and coarse hair whilst intensifying color.
Ideal for thick and coarse colour treated hair, Dualsenses Color Extra Rich Detangling Conditioner instantly detangles hair and allows you to maintain salon perfect colour for as long as possible. The unique Fade Stop Formula actively strengthens the anchoring of colour molecules whilst Goldwell’s innovative Color Chroma Complex is infused with Raspberry Seed Oil to reduce colour fading.

Title: RePower Gelmusion
Description: Goldwell Inner Effect Repower & Color Live Gelmulsion is the gel base formulation for the regeneration service: Strength . Gelmulsion is the base for the individual deep acting regeneration service. Strengthens fine, thin, and weak hair for optimum volume. Protects and prolongs color brilliance.

Title: Moisture Repair Conditioner
Description:
Argan Oil Moisture Repair Conditioner is a daily conditioner that helps reconstruct, detangle and replenish moisture levels, instantly revitalizing dull, weak, and damaged hair. 
One of the world's rarest oils, argan oil is derived from the Moroccan Argan Tree. Its moisturizing properties help to revive and nourish dry and damaged hair. This formula is Sulfate, Phosphate and Paraben FREE, which makes it safe for chemically and color treated hair. 
Argan Oil Moisture Repair Conditioner gently detangles and conditions hair while infusing it with Argan Oil and Keratin. Helps repair and smooth the cuticle and helps improve the structure of the hair. The unique formula revitalizes and renews the overall health of the hair, leaving it silky, shiny and manageable.

Title: Sensories Bright Conditioner
Description: Rusk Sensories Bright Conditioner awakens the senses as it conditions and instantly revitalizes and brightens dull, lifeless silver, gray or white hair. Adds shine and effectively erases yellow or brassy tones on highlighted or blonde-tinted hair. Specially formulated with color-enhancing chamomile and lavender.  It is specially formulated with color enhancing chamomile and lavender, strengthening wheat proteins, moisturizing honey and protective UVA/UVB absorbers which prevents color-fade.

Description: This quick-dry wax is made with moisturizing oil and plant-based proteins to create a hydrating formula to protect the hair from becoming dry while delivering the right amount of texture and light shine. Leaves behind an oriental floral scent with notes of wood, jasmine and citrus. Great for those with shorter hair. Give your hair the strong hold it needs.

Title: O.G. Baller Playable Pomade
Description: O.G. Baller Playable Pomade lets you keep it fresh all day long. With a flexible hold and medium shine, you can go from street style, to business and back in no time. Holy Basil helps moisturize, soothe dry scalp and eliminate pimples and breakouts along the hairline. Hops offers anti- inflammatory and astringent properties, helps reduce hair loss and helps soothe the scalp and increase the overall health of the hair and scalp. Panthenol moisturizes and conditions the hair, helping to improve its elasticity and flexibility.

Title: Cream Pomade Gravity Feeder Display
Description:
Cream pomade with light/medium hold and low shine. A moisture-rich cream pomade that provides a natural look while taming hair leaving a low shine finish.
Use when textured definition, frizz-free hair and a natural look is desired.

Title: Deflect Fast-Dry Heat Protection
Description: Help protect hair from heat damage and reduce drying time with this ultra-light, thermal protection spray infused with Abyssinian oil for smoothness, slip and shine while AG’s exclusive CARE Complex helps protect and extend the vibrancy of hair colour.

Title: Volume Mousse Extra 17
Description: Kenra Classic Volume Mousse Extra is a firm hold styling fixative.

Title: Bed Head Small Talk Cream
Description:
Tigi Bedhead Small Talk cream volumizes and energizes the hair whilst adding definition and separation. 
Enriched with a blend of Jojoba and Sunflower Oils, this best-selling styling lotion conditions the hair and adds a healthy radiance and shine whilst protecting the hair against external environmental aggressors.
Ideal for all hair types, Small Talk gives life to limp hair and adds body and volume to finer hair types. When used on wet hair, Small Talk defines and separates the hair to offer improved styling control whilst smoothing and eliminating frizz on dry hair.
Small Talk leaves the hair looking healthy, shiny and radiant with renewed body, texture, hold, volume and energy.

Title: Shaper Plus Hairspray
Description:
Brushable Spray, Humidity Resistant!
Sebastian Shaper Plus Hairspray. New look, same great formula! Shaper Plus provides 24-hour control that's never stiff or sticky, and holds up in high humidity. This original, touchable, strong hold is the professional's choice; delivering amazing style, immediate action and great results. Shape your hair with extra hold and control with Shaper Plus, the name behind the look.

Title: The Shield Anti Humidity Spray-5.3 oz
Description: Blissfully exist in any environment—from high humidity, to pollution-ridden or scorchingly sunny—with this heat-activated spray. Time-released actives form an invisible shield over every strand, protecting hair up to 450°F/232°C and against UV rays. Look smooth, sleek, frizz-free and just-done for 24 hours or more. It works. We’ve got the proof.

Title: The Shield Anti Humidity Spray-1.1 oz
Description: Blissfully exist in any environment—from high humidity, to pollution-ridden or scorchingly sunny—with this heat-activated spray. Time-released actives form an invisible shield over every strand, protecting hair up to 450°F/232°C and against UV rays. Look smooth, sleek, frizz-free and just-done for 24 hours or more. It works. We’ve got the proof.

Contains Thermplex, a unique combination of ingredients that activates with the heat of a blow-dryer to provide shine, control and condition from the inside out.

Compared to the Styling Spray and Finishing Spray, Extreme Spray is the strongest hair spray from the Maria Nila styling series. The Extreme Spray has a vanilla-balsamic fragrance, with fruity notes of passion fruit and apple.

Title: High Amplify Hairspray

Title: StyleSign Ultra Volume Dust Up Volumizing Powder
Description: StyleSign Ultra Volume Dust Up Volumizing Powder creates instant body, boosts texture and adds grip. Volumizing powder for all hair types.

Description:
Maria Nila styling mousse is a volumising mousse with medium hold that leaves the hair healthy and shiny. The mousse is easy to brush out and leaves the hair without any sticky result. The product can be used as a foundation for an updo, before straightening/curling, or just to add more structure and definition to the hair.
The product is also great for naturally curly hair that needs extra hold and more defined curls. The Styling Mousse has a vanilla-balsamic fragrance, with notes of red apple, blackcurrant bud, and strawberry.

Description: Rusk Designer Collection Mousse Maximum Volume and Control 5.8% is a light, foamy, highly concentrated formula that delivers maximum volume and control.

2–10.6 fl. oz. Sebastian Shaper 80%

Title: HAIRPLAY Styling Gel-6.7 fl oz
Description: HAIRPLAY Styling Gel provides glossy shine and gives long-lasting hold and control.

Title: HAIRPLAY Styling Gel-25.3 fl oz
Description: HAIRPLAY Styling Gel provides glossy shine and gives long-lasting hold and control.

Title: StyleSign - Sleek Perfection Thermal Spray Serum
Description: StyleSign Sleek Perfection - Thermal Spray Serum - provides heat protection for up to 200°C/392°F and makes hair resistant to breakage when using hot tools. Offers humidity protection for up to 24 hours for long-lasting silky-straight hair.

Title: Texture Creme
Description:
A rich, creamy styling tool with a unique composition: it moves like a glue, but when worked into the hair finishes with a non-tacky weightless hold!
Recommended for: Any hair you want to creatively texture.

Title: Supernova Moisture & Shine Cream
Description: Supernova Moisture and Shine Cream provides superior hydration and lightweight-conditioning, leaving hair supernaturally soft and smooth with brilliant shine. This supreme leave-in cream weightlessly conditions and leaves hair beautifully finished, full of shine.

Title: Thickening Spraygel
Description: Award winning Aquage Thickening Spraygel is a firm hold, body building styling spray that's ideal for fine, thin hair that lacks body. It thickens and strengthens as you style with Ultraflex polymer technology with sea botanicals. This styling spray delivers long-lasting volume and style retention, never flakes and is ideal for men's styling.

Title: El Rey Styling Jam
Description:
To be the king of style, you need a royal product that follows orders! Max your swagger with El Rey; more than just a gel, this medium hold styling jam gives you full reign over your hair, while keeping it the healthiest and hydrated in the kingdom. Burdock Root fortifies with antiseptic and antioxidant properties, while Juniper and Lime are your natural cleansing sentries, keeping excess oils on the other side of the moat.

Be the king of the castle and go tight and traditional, or break the cast for that unkempt, uncrowned prince look the ladies in waiting love. Either way, you'll rule the style empire all day long, because every king should be able to wear his crown, his way!

Title: Con Man Hair & Beard Pudding
Description:
This is one savvy, sly pudding. Just when you think it's only got your hair hydration covered, it gives you the slip, coming back in to add mild style and volume. But don't be fooled, those aren't the only tricks of the trade this product knows; it can take your beard from wily and dry to healthy, strong and replenished in a flash.

Reinforced with Guar and Guarana for deep hydration, increased shine, and an all-over healthier appearance. But don't forget their accomplices, Burdock Root and Hibiscus, who offer stealth antiseptic and antioxidant properties, helping to leave your scalp nice and fresh for a clean getaway.

Title: Thickening Fluid
Description: Goldwell Thickener is a concentrated fluid that empowers you to control and customize the consistency of your working mass — easily and intuitively – without affecting product performance or results.

Title: Transforming Texture Paste
Description: My Amazing Transforming Texture Paste. Great for control when creating beach waves, ponytails and braids.

Title: Catwalk Texturizing Sea Salt Spray
Description: This workable spray, infused with sea salt is a must-have texturizing styling essential. Create tousled texture, moveable body and windswept waves with an effortless matte finish.

Title: Curl Corps Defining Cream
Description:
A smoothing control cream that softly coaxes curls to keep them from frizzing,
splitting or sagging.

Title: Thermal Image Heat Protection Spray
Description: Keep your hair shielded from the damaging effects of heat and styling with Wella Professionals EIMI Thermal Image Heat Protection Spray. Exposure to heat and environmental factors will cause hair to weaken and harm the main reason for split ends. This light-weight high performance protection spray is non-greasy and non-sticky. It nourishes and protects your hair from heat and environmental stresses while being appropriate for all sorts of hair while not weighing your hair down.

Title: Finishing Spray Mini
Description:
Maria Nila Finishing Spray is a gentle spray with strong hold, yet easy to brush out.
Compared to the Styling Spray, the Finishing Spray has a stronger hold and is lighter than the Extreme Spray. The Styling Spray has a fruity scent of pineapple and blackberry, with floral notes of lily of the valley and jasmine.

Title: Mega Sleek Iron Smoother
Description: Mega Sleek Iron Smoother helps protect against heat damage and humidity for all day frizz control and smoothness for lasting style memory.

Title: Powder Play Lite Soft Volumizing & Texturizing Powder 0.4 oz
Description: Apply Big SexyHair Powder Play Lite Soft Volumizing & Texturizing Powder by pumping on dry hair directly at the root and/or throughout hair for soft and lightweight volume and texture. Big SexyHair Powder Play Lite comes in a puff application making it great for applying exactly where you are needing volume and texture. Great for the root area to add lift! A fun tip is to apply first at the root area, then tease lightly. Provides over 50% more volume and can be used on any hair type. It has a very low shine with a light to medium hold.

Title: Microweb Fiber
Description: Professional Sebastian Microweb Fiber provides a re-moldable texture, with silky web fibers that redefine killer styles for any hair texture and length.

Title: CHI Infra Texture Hairspray
Description: This fast drying styling and finishing spray provides smooth texture and incredible shine. Superior for use with CHI flat or curling irons to create styles for lift, movement, texture and control.

Title: Silk Express Miracle Silk Smoothing Balm
Description:
It’s a 10 Silk Express Miracle Silk Smoothing Balm. Silky Straight Smooth Styles

Ideal for regular use to achieve salon-perfect results for straight styles at home, It’s a 10 Silk Express Miracle Smoothing Balm is one simple step to ultimate silkiness. Used before styling, hair dries faster, with more manageability, fewer tangles, less frizz, better hold, and natural botanical straightening that lasts and lasts. Equally effective after shampooing alone, or after shampoo and conditioner, It’s a 10 Silk Express Smoothing Balm is designed to deliver maximum results with minimum heaviness. In fact, hair feels light, bouncy, and full of sleek body. With continued use, hair becomes straighter, smoother, and more under control.

Title: Classic Firm Hold Styling Gel-8.4 fl oz
Description:
Non-flaking formula.
Firm Hold Styling Gel, the ultimate in holding power, is enriched with natural extracts like Vitamin B5 to help hair look thicker with added shine. This alcohol-free gel is superior in hold and shine and has a low pH to prevent drying of the scalp.

Title: Classic Firm Hold Styling Gel-13.1 fl oz
Description:
Non-flaking formula.
Firm Hold Styling Gel, the ultimate in holding power, is enriched with natural extracts like Vitamin B5 to help hair look thicker with added shine. This alcohol-free gel is superior in hold and shine and has a low pH to prevent drying of the scalp.

Title: Classic Firm Hold Styling Gel-3.3 fl oz
Description:
Non-flaking formula.
Firm Hold Styling Gel, the ultimate in holding power, is enriched with natural extracts like Vitamin B5 to help hair look thicker with added shine. This alcohol-free gel is superior in hold and shine and has a low pH to prevent drying of the scalp.

Title: Ultimate Power Serum
Description:
NIOXIN Ultimate Power Serum. Transparent liquid serum treatment reduces hair-loss while thickening hair.

A leave-on hair treatment that thickens the hair from the 1st use and reduces hair loss in 8 weeks thanks to improved hair anchorage and therefore thickening your hair. The formula, clinically proven to thicken the hair, increase hair anchorage and reduce hair loss, combines Caffeine, Lauric Acid, Niacinamide and Sandalore™. Sandalore is a trademark of Givaudan.

Title: Weather Proof Humidity Resistant Finishing Spray
Description: Create a protective shield against humidity with this high-performance humidity resistant spray. Ideal for keeping blowouts in place, Weather Proof tames frizz & flyaways for up to 72 hours while adding smoothness.

Title: Hard Jel Extra-Firm Hold
Description: Slick back or control hard to manage hair with this humidity-resistant, alcohol-free, extra-firm gel that won’t flake or build up. All-day hold.

Title: Luxe Enhancer™ Blow Dry Creme
Description: Luxe Enhancer Blow Dry Cream adds volume and lift to root area and adds overall body and fullness.

Title: Power Spray Fast-Dry Finishing Spray
Description: Power up with an ultra-firm-hold hairspray that delivers a fine aerosol mist?minus flaking and frizz. With protection against humidity, heat styling, pollution,* and UV rays, this powerhouse of 3-day hold stands up and shines.

Title: Perfect Medium Spray 13 55% VOC
Description: Kenra Classic Perfect Medium Spray 13 is a medium hold hair spray for moveable, touchable styling.

Title: Anti-Humidity Spray
Description: Long lasting styling requires humidity defense. NEW Kenra Anti Humidity Spray 5 is finisher that helps complete a variety of styling looks from air-dried natural curls to voluminous blow-outs.

Title: Style & Protect On the Rise Root Lifting Mousse
Description:
Defy gravity with this root-lifting, volumizing hair mousse that adds life and volume at the roots without leaving behind any product buildup.

Achieve ultimate hair volume goals with the On the Rise Root-Lifting Mousse styling product. Achieve all-day volume without the undesirable stickiness and product buildup with this lightweight, medium control root lifters hair mousse for color-treated or natural hair. Plus, Pureology''s exclusive AntiFade Complex® protects hair color and features full spectrum UVA/UVB sunscreen for that salon-fresh look and feeling. Let your hairstyle speak volume!

Title: StyleSign Dry Boost Creative Texture
Description: StyleSign Dry Boost Creative Texture Dry Texture Spray. Multi-benefit product for defined texture,  refreshed volume and movement. Adds light texture, soft grip and refreshes volume.

Title: Volumizing Matte Effect Hair Styling Powder
Description: Slick Gorilla Volumizing Matte Effect Hair Styling Powder is a volumizing powder which gives a matte finish with lightweight texture and separation.

Title: JoiMist Firm Protective Finishing Spray
Description:
Your blowout?s looking great. And you want it to stay that way, without resorting to a bulletproof layer
of hairspray that paralyzes great movement and flexibility. JoiMist Medium?with Level 6 hold? commits your style to memory; no touch-ups needed.

Title: Thermal Shine Spray 55%
Description: Rusk Thermal Shine Spray is a micro spray that adds body and shine while protecting hair against heat styling tools.

Title: THERMASHAPE Quick Blow Dry Spray
Description:
THERMASHAPE Quick Blow Dry Spray speeds up drying time up to 50%
With this bundle get two THERMAShape Quick Blow Dry Spray for the price of one!

Title: Lightwork
Description: Slick Gorilla Lightwork light to medium hold paraben-free water based hair styling clay infused with natural, ethically-sourced ingredients. Ideal for weightless texture and movement.

Title: High Amplify Wonder Boost Root Lifter
Description: Solve the challenges of fine, limp hair. High Amplify™ Wonder Boost™ Root Lifter with 24HR Full Boost Technology™ features a targeted applicator for extreme lift at the root area or all over volume impact that lasts all day*. It builds lightweight body with a flexible hold. Get salon perfect results: totally full-bodied, strong with lasting volume.

Title: Matte Clay Gravity Feeder Display
Description: American Crew Matte Clay styler offers workable hold and builds texture while still leaving the hair with a silky matte finish.

Title: Powder Play Volumizing & Texturizing Powder
Description: More powder (and volume) to you! Powder Play Volumizing and Texturizing Powder adds body and lift to —even baby-fine hair. Simply apply to the roots of dry hair for an instant lift, or sprinkle throughout for body, separation, texture and the appearance of added volume. Colorless, odorless, and residue-free, this transparent formula is ideal for all hair colors. To reactivate, simply massage into your locks for the appearance of thicker hair.

Title: Rugged Texture Matte Texturizing Paste
Description: You can produce rugged texture, style and definition with Wella Professionals Eimi Rugged Texture Matte Texturizing Paste This Salon grade crème is light-weight and encompasses a paste like texture that is non greasy and non-sticky which is ideal for constructing texturized styles that need definition without that wet look finish.

Title: Curlicue Cream
Description:
Maria Nila Curlicue Cream is a nourishing cream that enhances curls and waves whilst protecting hair against humidity. Moisturising glycerine and extracts from chamomile make up the hydrating formula that protects the hair and prevents frizz and split ends, whilst the heat protecting molecule PVP helps to add definition and hold to the curls.
It has a hold 3 out of 5 and is formulated with Colour Guard Complex to protect against UV–rays and free radicals. The Curlicue Cream has a fruity jasmine-floral scent with base notes of woody amber, heart notes of white jasmine and lily and top notes of galbanum and pineapple.

Title: Maria Nila Styling Spray
Description: Maria Nila styling Spray is a gentle spray with light hold that adds shine and reduces frizz. Compared to the Finishing Spray and Extreme Spray, Styling Spray is the lightest hair spray from the Maria Nila styling series. The spray is easy to brush out and can be applied in multiple layers. The Styling Spray has a vanilla-balsamic fragrance, with citrusy and floral notes of nectarine, marzipan, pink rose, and magnolia.

Title: Hot Tool Protection Hairspray
Description: Protects hair up to 450F

Title: Potion 9 Treatment - Flow-5.1 fl oz
Description: Sebastian Potion 9 is a wearable styling conditioner. Active-oil botanicals restore hair's natural condition while the protective agent cocktail enhances manageable styling, leaving hair with renewed shine.

Title: Styling Gel 17
Description: Kenra Classic Styling Gel 17 is a firm hold fixative. It contains all-natural plant extracts for spectacular shine and naturally derived essences which give hair a fresh, pleasing fragrance.

Title: Curl Spray Gel Thermal Setting Spray
Description: Spray Gel creates long lasting, flexible hold and shine. Can be used with hot irons, rollers or round brush and blow dryer to create soft or firm curls. Loaded with silk and keratin protein for strength, Spray Gel also acts as a thermal protector and will not stick to irons. Infused with natural curl enhancers.

Title: Curl Corps Enhancing Gel
Description:
curl-boosting gel for stretching and/or twisting
• enhances curl shape with added shine
• provides weather protection against frizz
• lightweight formula is never crunchy or sticky

Title: Firewall Argan Shine & Flat Iron Spray
Description: Firewall provides high shine plus a smooth protective barrier between your delicate hair and your searing flat iron, smoothing, protecting and preventing breakage while controlling unruly hair and flyaways. Infused with argan oil, Firewall lets your iron slip seamlessly through your hair as it adds incredible shine.

Title: Smoothing Shine Milk
Description: Biolage Styling Smoothing Shine Milk is a professional product used to achieve a frizz-free blowout or natural hair look with salon-perfect results. A lightweight mist, it repairs hair damage and increases hair shine, for glossy, sleek locks, while smoothing flyaways. Blue agave nectar acts as a hair treatment, strengthening and repairing damaged hair in harsh conditions by retaining moisture and nourishment softening and strengthening hair. Whether your hair is short, curly, or long, this styling milk is the perfect leave-in color-safe conditioner. Product packaging may vary.

Title: Dry Lift Texture & Volume Paste
Description: Formulated with over 96% plant-based and naturally-derived ingredients, AG’s Dry Lift instantly adds grit, volume and texture. Kaolin clay and volcanic ash absorb excess oil, creating a thickening effect on the hair, adding body and allowing hair to be styled and manipulated. AG’s exclusive blend of rosemary, lemon, lime, geranium and lavender essential oils provide natural fragrance. Ideal for refreshing second day hair and creating updos.

Title: Prep Me 450°F Heat Protection Blow Dry Primer 5.1 fl oz
Description: Style SexyHair Prep Me Heat Protection Blow Dry Primer is a weightless primer that provides up to 68% reduction in breakage, when applied prior to blow drying. It is formulated with Amphomer, that provides heat protection up to 450°F.

Title: Infrastructure Structurizing Pomade
Description: For short to medium length hair, Infrastructure’s pliable microfibers provide structure and support with a slight sheen finish. This medium-hold, humidity-resistant pomade gives hair moldable texture, creating that lived-in look.

Title: Food For Soft Multi-Use Hair Oil Serum
Description:
Multi-Use Hair Oil Serum, infused with avocado oil, is a leave-in treatment that helps to seal in hydration for hair that looks shiny and smooth.

Food For Soft is a professional hydrating haircare range that targets dry hair and instantly transforms it for touchable soft results. Food For Soft is suitable for all dry, porous hair types and textures. It is infused with avocado oil, which can add lightweight moisture, and hyaluronic acid, a known humectant that provides moisture and can retain a balance of lipids and proteins.

Food For Soft is suitable for color-treated hair and can be used from that point on and at home between coloring appointments.

Food For Soft can be used on 100% human hair extensions in which the cuticle has not been altered from its original state prior to purchase. Apply product to the human hair portion of the weft only avoiding any points of adhesion.

Title: Beach'n  Spray Texturizing Spray
Description: So much more than a “summer fling”, Beach’n Spray Beach Spray has your saltwater-and-sun inspired style on lock(s). This texturizing spray uses sugar to deliver tousled-to-perfection beachy styles with touchable texture. With low hold and sun-inspired shine, this sand-free texturizing spray will enhance your natural or styled beachy look with pliable texture & buildable body.

Title: Pomade
Description: This water-based formula can help you create almost any style and provides easy control and high shine. This pomade rinses clean and is equally effective for curly or straight hair.

Title: True Soft Argan Oil
Description:
TRUE SOFT is based on argan oil, which remoisturizes and revitalizes dry and brittle hair. MARIA NILA CARE & STYLE is a six–part colour–protecting haircare range. Each part comprises a shampoo, a conditioner and a treatment. Because different hair types need different kinds of treatments, each part of the range contains a special ingredient that adds unique properties, making the product perfect for your particular hair type. All products are sulphate and paraben free and made out of 100% vegan ingredients.

Clean at Cosmo Prof
Products featuring Cosmo Prof’s Clean logo are free from: Sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, mineral oil,  coal tar, hydroquinone, and triclocarban.

Title: Some Like It Hot Heat Protection Spray
Description:
Bed Head's new Some Like It Hot Heat Protection Spray. A protecting and repairing formulation, not only designed with, but used by salon professionals. Delivering salon results and salon experience at home. If you loved Bed Head Beach Bound Protection Spray, you will love Some Like It Hot.

Who It's For: All hair types before applying heat. Colour safe.

Title: Catwalk Your Highness Root Boost Spray
Description: Tigi Catwalk Your Highness Root Boost Spray ptovides magnificent volume that starts at the roots. This fine mist foam delivers the lift and support essential for a long lasting, dramatic style. Specifically for amazing lift and texture, this fine mist foam delivers the lift and support essential for a long lasting, dramatic style. Adds strength, elasticity and smoothness while thickening hair. Won't weigh hair down.

Title: JoiGel Medium Styling Gel
Description:
You want hold, shine, pliability, and movement, without crunchy stiffness. This right-in-the-middle styling gel is designed to deliver all the right stuff?plus moisture, body, and protection from pollution*?in one fell swoop.

*Laboratory tested using pollution particles

Title: Youthlock Collagen Blowout Creme
Description: It’s time to embrace a return to shiny, smooth, soft hair with YouthLock Blowout Crème, a collagen-enriched daily protector that safeguards strands from breakage, hair fall, damaging heat tools, and even environmental factors, like humidity and frizz. Reversing the effect of time on your hair, Blowout Crème instantly strengthens and revitalizes to bring back that coveted glow.

Title: Blowout Big Queen
Description: Blowout Big Queen volumizing blowout cream. The attention grabbing volume you crave - heat protecting volumizing blowout cream let's you reach new heights. This regal styler gets you bigger and bolder, creating full-bodied volume that outlasts. Hold Level 2. Satin finish.

Title: JoiFul Volumizing Styler
Description:
JoiFul Volumizing Styler. Are you dreaming of bigger and better hair? Here?s the hero that swoops in with body, bounce, and brilliant fullness, while saving you from the sticky, crunchy residue of typical volumizers. You?ll experience the unique glide and slip of an airy cr�me, plus the molding and shaping power of a gel�e?all in one game-changing hybrid. Instantly transforms fine strands into full, luxurious, natural-looking hair.


Big, bouncy, and brimming with body; JoiFul is the dream that?s now a reality for fine, thin hair. With this powerfully transformative line, JoiFull helps long-lasting, full, lush, manageable strands come to life, minus the crunchy, sticky residue typical of most volumizing products. JoiFull creates the kind of natural-looking, touchable volume that builds confidence as well as fullness.

Title: Dry Texture Spray
Description: Dry Texture Spray 6 increases texture and fullness in the hair up to 278% while absorbing oils and impurities. This ultra-lightweight, non-drying formulation leaves the hair with a matte finish and provides flexible hold up to 48 hours.

Title: Velveteen Dream Smoothing Balm
Description:
Tame frizz into submission and lock in soft-smoothness, so humidity can’t undo what you’ve done to your ‘do.
Ideal styling agent for dry, frizzy or unmanageable hair. Suitable for all hair types.

Title: Vavoom Freezing Spray Extra Hold
Description: An extra-firm, fast-drying, anti-frizz hair spray.  Fast-drying, ultra high hold spray locks your look into place with firm hold. This fast-drying hairspray provides an extra-firm hold and prevents frizz Adds volume and texture. Gives strands grip when creating updos, braids and ponytails so nothing slips out of place. 24-hour humidity resistance, 24-hour anti-frizz protection.

Title: HAIRPLAY Dry Wax
Description: HAIRPLAY Dry Wax lets you create a perfectly undone finish.

Description: Strong hold gel strengthens the feel of hair with the pearlized shine enhancer, Gel Forte. Pearlescent formula sculpts individual hairs for glistening style and shimmer-strong hold without a stiff or sticky feel.

Title: R.A.W. Texturizing Styling Spray - Matcha
Description: Infused with matcha green tea, this texturizing styling spray gives separation and definition for touchable texture. For loose beach waves with soft feeling and movement.

Gives the appearance of healthy hair by mending split ends up to 92%. Ideal for damaged, over processed hair. Infused with aloe vera & mango butter.

Title: #MyMythicc Body Texture Spray
Description: Gives your styles bulk & texture with a soft, no residue finish. #MyTHICCBody adds all the volume to give you perfectly disheveled, sexy hair.

Title: Royal Treatment - Rapid Shine
Description:
Instant shine spray for all day brilliance and gloss.
Weightless spray with white truffle and pearl provides instant brilliant shine to all your hairstyles.
A lightweight shine spray with a luxurious fine mist, that adds incredible shine and gloss to dull hair. Use as a finishing touch to styles, helping to add depth and dimension to color while eliminating frizz. UV protectants shield hair from UV damage and color loss.

An exclusive easy to apply formula that

setting, thanks to the efficacy of lava derivatives.

natural shine.

Compared to the Styling Spray, the Finishing Spray has a stronger hold and is lighter than the Extreme Spray. The Styling Spray has a fruity scent of pineapple and blackberry, with floral notes of lily of the valley and jasmine.

Kenra Ultra Freeze Spray 30 is perfect for dramatic styles or recreating your favorite red carpet looks.

Title: AddPower Thickening Spray-6.76 fl oz
Description:
Show your fine haired clients that they can rock creative and structured looks with confidence. ADDPOWER Thickening spray is a thermal protector with light hold that makes fine hair look and feel noticeably thicker. Formulated with TRIFinity Technology and enriched with rice protein and organic white tea extract to protect, strengthen and thicken hair. 

Inspired by the self-expressive street style of Copenhagen, ADDPOWER gives fine hair clients the feeling of confident beauty with three new products designed to strengthen and thicken fine hair to make it more resilient for styling. Works in combination with the entire KMS portfolio to create style equations for fine haired clients. Maximize style versatility with ADDPOWER.

Title: AddPower Thickening Spray-2.53 fl oz
Description:
Show your fine haired clients that they can rock creative and structured looks with confidence. ADDPOWER Thickening spray is a thermal protector with light hold that makes fine hair look and feel noticeably thicker. Formulated with TRIFinity Technology and enriched with rice protein and organic white tea extract to protect, strengthen and thicken hair. 

Inspired by the self-expressive street style of Copenhagen, ADDPOWER gives fine hair clients the feeling of confident beauty with three new products designed to strengthen and thicken fine hair to make it more resilient for styling. Compared to the Styling Spray and Finishing Spray, Extreme Spray is the strongest hair spray from the Maria Nila styling series. The Extreme Spray has a vanilla-balsamic fragrance, with fruity notes of passion fruit and apple.
