With up to 120 hours hold, Spritz & Stay is an Intense Hold, Fast Drying, Non-Aerosol Hairspray that provides high shine finish, is resistant to humidity and formulated for all hair types.

Title: Thickening Gel
Description: Whether to create thicker, fuller looking styles or maintain flexibility, there is a 3D Styling solution for you. Thickening Gel is a strong hold gel that provides definition and hold, without stiffness or stickiness.

Title: Tecni.Art Air Fix
Description: L’Oréal Professionnel Tecni.Art Air Fix Spray allows extra-strong, long-lasting, quick drying hold without crunchiness. A must-have to keep it tight.

Title: Blow It Up Volumizing Gel Foam
Description: Blow up your style with this this transformative gel-to-foam volumizer that lifts at the roots for all-over body and fullness. Formulated for all hair types, Blow It Up Volumizing Gel Foam provides 72 hours of humidity resistance and up to 450°F of thermal protection. Just drop a little dab onto fingertips and work through hair to style.

Title: CHI Luxury - Black Seed Blow Dry Cream
Description: Lightweight styling cream that creates sleek and smooth styles with restored shine. This light-hold moisturizing cream with Black Seed Oil eliminates frizz and fly-aways while helping hair resist humidity and thermal styling damage, keeping hair shiny and glamorous through out the day.

Title: Mega Sleek Blow Down Leave-In Cream
Description: Mega Sleek Blow Down - A leave-in cream that offers medium hold, heat protection, and easy glide for fast blow-drys. Smoothes hair instantly and provides frizz-free control all day. 24 Hour Smooth Repair Technology resists frizz and repairs damage for smooth results that lasts 24 hours.

Title: THERMASHAPE Quick Blow Dry Spray Duo
Description: undefined

Title: Slept In Texture Crème
Description: SexyHair Slept In Texture Creme gives hair beauty sleep vibes with soft texture & control for a slept-in look with style. With a lightweight & flexible hold, it helps to tame frizz & flyaways for a blowout with a smooth, touchable finish that won’t weigh down the hair. This is a water-soluble formula that washes out with ease and is ideal for all hair types.

Title: Tousled Texture Body & Shine Finishing Spray
Description: Swiftly muss up hair, creating piecey texture and adding instant volume and shine with this lightweight styling spray that is enhanced with our exclusive Sea Complex, an infusion of seaweed extracts and nourishing seaberry oil. Tousled Texture creates a moveable, piecey look while controlling frizz and flyaways.

Title: Plus Size Mousse-8.5 oz
Description: Run this cushiony-whipped, easy to apply super-expander through your strands and watch the rate of inflation skyrocket in a good way. Shaping polymers plump, bodify and volumize hair voluptuously and keep it that way—without getting crunchy or stiff on you. So you can go through your day head high, hair higher.

Title: Plus Size Mousse-1.5 fl oz
Description: Run this cushiony-whipped, easy to apply super-expander through your strands and watch the rate of inflation skyrocket in a good way. Shaping polymers plump, bodify and volumize hair voluptuously and keep it that way—without getting crunchy or stiff on you. So you can go through your day head high, hair higher.

Title: Tree Hugger Vegan Beard Balm
Description: Hey nature boy, bend the wilderness, and your beard, to your will with this vegan balm! Kokum, Cocoa, and Mango butters moisturize and condition, while Candelilla Wax keeps things smooth & in control, for one formidable face-trophy.

Title: BY Framesi - Lava Sparkling Mousse Strong
Description: Framesi ByFramesi Lava Sparkling Mousse Strong is a moisture-rich foam, formulated to protect and moisturize while creating ultimate hold, volume, and shine. This Mousse provides extra strong hold and support. It's also color safe!

Title: Foxy Curls Contour Cream
Description: Fights frizz with latest curl technology. Frazzled waves & curls that need definition and light hold.

Title: Strength Recovery Strength Repairing Spray
Description:
This lightweight spray provides heat protection and leaves hair silky, detangled and 82% more manageable after one use.*

*Strength Recovery Strength Repairing Spray vs. non-conditioning shampoo

Title: Spray Body Soft-Hold Volumizer
Description: Add body, refresh your style and create fuller hair with this lightweight, alcohol-free spray that is formulated with our Regenerative Complex containing powerful pea sprout extract. Packed with body building panthenol, Spray Body not only volumizes but is also an effective style refresher throughout the day.

Title: Design Spray #9 55% VOC
Description: Kenra Classic Design Spray #9 is a light hold styling spray.

Title: Volume Spray
Description:
MARIA NILA VOLUME SPRAY is a volumising spray which works well for adding volume before the styling process. It is also a great option for those who prefer applying volumising products in wet hair. In comparison to the additional hair sprays in the Maria Nila styling series, the Volume Spray is to be used exclusively in
damp hair. The spray is a wet product, which is blow-dried in for optimal result. The Volume Spray has a fruity scent of pineapple and blackberry, with floral notes of lily of the valley and jasmine.

Title: Bed Head for Men Power Play Firm Finish Gel
Description: A firm finish gel that contains conditioning agents and antioxidants to protect hair while providing control and shine. This gel is alcohol free and has a non-flaking formula that moisturizes and helps repair split ends.

Title: Bed Head for Men Matte Workable Wax
Description:
Matte Separation - Workable Wax with Matte Finish. Perfect for defined looks that need more hold and texture. All with a matte finish.
You can use Matte Separation Wax on dry hair as a finishing product, but also on wet or damp hair for a more natural/wet look. Once worked through, use a dryer to melt wax into desired shape, Once the hair is dry we recommend to make sure you get your fingers through the hair and give a good shake to release all that great texture and add some natural volume.

Title: Silkening Heat Crème
Description: Check out the new Kenra Silkening Heat Crème. Hot tools damage hair. Silkening Heat Crème reduces hot tool passes by 50% for the same sleek style with less damage in half the time. This thermal protectant features Sacha Inchi, a nutrient-dense nut oil, to prevent breakage and improve manageability for silky brilliant strands.

Title: K-PAK Color Therapy Luster Lock Glossing Oil
Description:
Meet your hair?s daily lust-have for gorgeous color vibrancy and swoon-worthy shine! With a brilliant formula that?s ?just light? for fine strands, yet
nourishing enough for thicker tresses, this go-to oil blend delivers instant wow-factor plus powerful protection to ensure your shade glows the distance.

Title: Dualsenses - Ultra Volume Bodifying Spray
Description: Dualsenses Ultra Volume Bodifying Spray for fine hair. LEAVE-IN SPRAY for fine to normal limp hair blended with microPROtec complex and rice protein. Instantly detangles and strengthens the hair. Provides lightweight care to support fullness

Title: Molding Megagel
Description: Aquage Molding Megagel is a lightweight mega-hold styling gel that molds, shapes and creates detail on wet hair. Ultralight holding agents deliver strong control with high gloss shine. The advanced formula never flakes and is excellent for blow drying or sculpted styles.

Title: Amika The Wizard Detangler, The Wizard Detangling Primer
Description: undefined

Title: Curl Details Defining Cream
Description: Define curls, calm frizz and add shine in the softest way possible with herbal extracts and our exclusive Curl Creating Complex containing rice amino acids and tomato extract.

Title: Texture Sexy Hair Surfer Girl Dry Texturizing Spray-6.8 fl oz
Description: Provides buildable texture & 100% more volume with style memory without the crunch. This non-drying, invisible formula uses a combination of three texture-building copolymers allowing for layering & building volume without weighing hair down.

Title: Repair Serum Vitamin C Strengthening Sealant
Description: Reinvent dry, damaged hair with AG’s vitamin C and plant-based squalane leave-in serum. Vegan and lightweight, this helps seal split ends, increase elasticity and reduce breakage. Hair is left silky, glossy and irresistibly soft.

Title: Smooth Perfection Anti-Frizz Serum
Description:
Smooth Perfection Frizz Fighting Serum for normal to thick, frizzy, colour-treated hair. This anti-frizz serum also offers silky smoothness, lasting frizz control and heat protection for normal to thick hair. 
Blow away frizz and heat styling stress with Smooth Perfection anti-frizz haircare products. Made with camellia oil, this lightweight fast-absorbing oil moisturizes and conditions to fight frizzy hair.

Title: Bed Head After Party Smoothing Cream
Description: After Party Smoothing Cream for Silky, Shiny, Healthy Looking Hair controls funky fly-aways to silkify hair. The perfect party favor for frizz prone hair.

Title: The Oil Argan Smoothing Oil
Description: Rich in organic Moroccan argan oil, AG’s The Oil adds indescribable softness, shine and slip to all hair types. Lightweight and non-greasy, The Oil won’t weigh hair down or discolour blonde hair.

Title: Curling Crème
Description: Get ahead of the curve with SexyHair Curling Crème, a moisturizing curl definer that provides light to medium control for up to 72 hours. Formulated with Cacai Oil & Sea Algae, this product works on soft waves and curlicues to tame frizz & flyaways with a soft, flexible finish. It won’t dry your hair out, but will enhance hair’s natural texture & definition while helping to maintain moisture.

Title: Reformer Flexible Wax
Description: Finish your style with Precision Flexible Wax to add pliable movement and texture to any hair type.

Title: Cream Heat Spray
Description: Maria Nilla Cream Heat Spray is a nourishing and cream-based heat protecting spray that rebuilds damaged hair and prevents split ends while adding subtle shine to the hair. The Cream Heat Spray can be applied to both damp and dry hair and provides more moisture than the lighter Quick Dry Heat Spray. The Cream Heat Spray has a fresh-fruity, floral scent of peach, apple and rose.

Title: Beach Bomb Wave-Enhancing Cream
Description: Beach Bomb creates bombshell-worthy waves that are natural and full of texture. This lightweight, alcohol-free cream is infused with keratin protein, silk amino acids and our Curl Creating Complex (C3) to condition and keep your hair healthy.

Title: CHI Helmet Head Extra Firm Hairspray
Description: Create voluminous, full-bodied looks that last from day to night with CHI Helmet Head Spritz. After you spend all that time creating your hair style, it’s a good idea to lock it in with a spray that means business. CHI Helmet Head does just that. Extra firm hold protects your style from wind and humidity, and provides long-lasting hold while adding body and shine. Lock in your style with CHI.

Title: Dualsenses - Rich Repair Restoring Serum Spray
Description: Dualsenses Rich Repair Restoring Serum Leave-In Spray for dry to damaged hair blended with microPROtec complex and IntraLipid. Instantly reconstructs, provides suppleness and shine. Detangles and improves comb-ability. With heat protection.

Title: Summer Curl Kit
Description:
FlexFactor:
New for ultimate Curl Flexibility. Our formulas are dermatologist co-developed, backed by science and stylist approved. Flex your style from blowouts to braids to twist outs and back to your natural texture - while reducing damage by up to 55%! This heat and UV protective spray with the Curl Memory Complex helps all curl types spring back to life and helps prevent damage from brushing, friction, manipulation, and heat up to 450 degrees.
Ultra Defining Gel:
New for ultimate Curl Flexibility. Our formulas are dermatologist co-developed, backed by science and stylist approved. Definition without the crunch. This non-flaking formula with a strong curl-locking blend provides a non-sticky curl cast that defines, fights frizz, and amplifies shine and bounce.
SuperCream:
New for ultimate Curl Flexibility. Our formulas are dermatologist co-developed, backed by science and stylist approved. Meet our superhero styler. This multitasking, ultra-rich cream with a hydra-definition blend provides coarse curls with smoothness, shape, shine and frizz control.

Title: Cloud Air Light Volumizing Mousse
Description: Get instant volume and texture, eliminate frizz and enhance shine with this lightweight volumizing mousse infused with natural corn starch and sugar cane extract. Formulated with over 98% plant-based and naturally-derived ingredients, Cloud air light volumizing mousse delivers dynamic yet weightless performance.

Title: Twisted - Curl Magnifier Cream
Description: Twisted Curl Magnifier Cream Polishes and defines curls without extra weight, stiffness, or crunchiness. Flexi-Alg™ Complex fights daily frizz and dryness for touchable, natural looking definition and bounce.

Title: Humidity Blocker+Protective Finishing Spray
Description: Don?t let your fresh blowout or pristine flat-iron style go unprotected against rainy, humid weather. This light-hold humidity-buster works tirelessly, depositing an invisible, 24-hour shine-shield of frizz and static protection over all your hard work.

Title: INVIGO Nutri-Enrich Frizz Control Cream
Description:
The Nutri-Enrich Frizz Control Cream Instantly helps to prevent frizz by straightening unruly hair while nourishing it. Leaving hair soft, shiny and full of vitality.

Wella Professionals introduces Invigo Care & Styling – a complete portfolio of products designed to support all types of hair needs and clients’ demands. Modern life is hectic – Invigo creates recharging moments in salon and at home with high performance invigorating care and styling treatments. New inside blends with advanced technology, ingredients, and vitamins wrapped in delightful fragrances. Time to recharge your clients’ hair and mood while enhancing your hair craft!

Title: Re-Shaper Strong Hold Hairspray 55% LVOC - Form-1.5 fl oz
Description: Re-Shaper brushable Humidity Resistance strong-hold hairspray. Next-generation of the fashion iconic SHAPER hairspray, Sebastian strong-lasting, re-shapable spray. Shape, hold and re-shape endless edgy styles and stand-out silhouettes, over and over again. Reworkable for up to 18 hours.

Title: Re-Shaper Strong Hold Hairspray 55% LVOC - Form-10.6 fl oz
Description: Re-Shaper brushable Humidity Resistance strong-hold hairspray. Next-generation of the fashion iconic SHAPER hairspray, Sebastian strong-lasting, re-shapable spray. Shape, hold and re-shape endless edgy styles and stand-out silhouettes, over and over again. Reworkable for up to 18 hours.

Title: Molding Cream Sculpt and Style
Description: Mold, sculpt and set your style in any hair length, adding texture and a polished shine. Distributes easily through the hair and washes out effortlessly.

Title: K-Pak Color Therapy Luster Lock Multi-Perfector
Description: This silky leave-in treatment leaves behind an invisible-yet-powerful shield of protection against styling stress, thermal damage, and UV exposure that can fade your haircolor. The other great leave-behind? Soft, smoothas-silk hair that SHINES like nobody?s business!

Title: Curl Quencher Hydrafusion Intense Curl Cream
Description: An intense cream styler that feeds thirsty curls with intense moisture, renewing strength and adding instant softness and definition. This cream works to restore curls' internal weight, encouraging optimal formation and a more uniform curl pattern.

Title: Foam Party Lite Texturizing Foam Spray
Description: There’s no place like foam. Get 100% more volume for up to 72 hours with this texturizing foam that adds grit and grip with medium hold. Apply through damp hair and air dry for a defined look, or blow dry with a diffuser for soft, beachy texture that will take you from beach to brunch and beyond.

Title: Thickening Mousse
Description: New! Thickening Mousse plumps hair strand by strand up to 150% and adds fullness and body to achieve the appearance of thicker hair. Provides crushable, touchable hold for up to 24 hours.

Title: Firm Hold Styling Cream
Description: FIRM HOLD STYLING CREAM  - Pliable hold with flexible definition and low shine.  A moisturizing formula that tames hair and adds style with low shine and a flexible finish. Washes out easily without leaving residue behind.  Use to create styles with reliable hold and control. For all hair types.

Title: Tecni.Art Web
Description: L’Oréal Professionnel Tecni.Art Web is a sculpting fibrous paste to mold, shape and define the hair with a natural-looking shiny finish.

Title: PureMix™ Blooming Sunflower Volumizing Mist
Description: PureMix Blooming Sunflower Volumizing Mist for fine hair provides 57% more volume after use. It's enriched with sunflower seed extract to gently moisturize the hair and vitamin B5 + styling polymers to thicken and lift strands. The Blooming Sunflower Volumizing Mist also provides thermal protection, leaving you with healthy, voluminous hair.

Title: Ego Boost Split End Mender
Description: Tigi Bed Head Ego Boost Split End Mender Leave-In Conditioner mends and protects dry, damaged hair from environmental elements, chemical treatments, shampooing and brushing.

Title: Stylutions Going Up Volumizing Hair Texture Spray
Description: Say good-bye to crunchy curls that fall flat. Formulated with non-drying raw silk powders, this spray provides the perfect amount of texture and grit for all curl types. Build volume where you want it, while ensuring curls stay soft and smooth all day long.

Title: Set It Straight Argan Straightening Lotion
Description: Argan-infused Set it Straight wastes no time getting to work, tackling waves head-on, while you smooth and straighten effortlessly. Keep hair smooth and frizz-free with this argan-infused, humidity-resistant straightening lotion and heat protectant.

Title: Clay Pomade
Description: Slick Gorilla Clay Pomade - a paraben-free hair styling clay pomade infused with natural ethically-sourced ingredients including clay and beeswax. Separates, defines and molds hair to deliver a strong, pliable all-day hold. Hold - Firm, Finish - Natural Matte.

Title: Grooming Creme
Description: Grooming Creme will help you create a straight, sleek look or soften wavy or curly hair. It contains conditioning elements, like aloe vera, that repel moisture and provide long-lasting style and shape. It provides a strong hold and shine

Title: Mega Firm Gel
Description: Use Woody's Mini Mega Firm Gel for a super hold.  Creates body and shine.

Title: AllCurl Sealing Oil Spray
Description: AllCurl Sealing Oil Spray offers enhanced shine and conditioning benefits with up to 72 hour frizz control & humidity resistance. Layer this lightweight oil as a styler to impart maximum moisture or use as a finisher to seal in hydration without disrupting definition. Define curls beyond just type and texture. For all curl types. Silicone free. Paraben free.

Title: CHI Enviro Natural Flex Hairspray
Description: CHI Enviro Flex Hold Hair Spray - Natural Hold by Farouk Cationic Hydration Interlink lets you spray, scrunch, mold, and hold to create multitudes of styles without added weight. CHI Enviro Flex Hold Hair Spray Natual Hold is a style hold memory, fast drying hair spray. Contains an innovative new technology that offers true versatility. It provides incredible shine. Contains less than 55% VOC to help protect the environment.

Title: CHI Straight Guard
Description: CHI Straight Guard™ is a styling cream with easy brush glide formula. It is an ideal styling tool for all smooth, sleek styles while providing hair incredible control and smoothness and helping in eliminating frizz and creating superior shine.

Title: Phantom Matte Shaping Cream
Description: Is it real or is it GIBS Grooming? Take matte to the max and elevate your grooming game with Phantom Matte Shaping Cream, a 'now you see it, now you don't styling cream for impossibly soft, medium hold and an ultra-matte, never-flat finish. Add sophisticated texture and haunting hold with tapioca starch and kaolin clay; hops, holy basil and prickly pear mean this bare-boned cream disappears into the hair with scalp tingling moisture and protection to ban hairline breakouts. Style is never an illusion with GIBS Grooming!

Title: THERMASHAPE Shaping Blow Dry
Description: ThermaShape Shaping Blow Dry gives light body, movement and texture. Provides lasting shape.

Title: Volumizer Thickening Spray
Description:
Volumizer Thickening Spray with Dynagen-R™ won’t just lift flat hair to new heights, it’ll plump and strengthen each strand along the way, leaving hair soft to the touch. 
Recommended for flat hair that needs a little oomph!
Hold Factor: 3 | Shine Factor: 3

Title: Curl Quencher Moisturizing Styling Gel
Description: Coaxing your tight curls to stay in place - and look exactly how you want - can be a delicate balance. You need a styling product that's lightweight and hydrating, but strong enough to hold your curl pattern. That's where our Curl Quencher® Moisturizing Styling Gel comes in. This light-hold gel defines and holds curls while infusing deep moisture to hydrate strands from the inside out. Meadowfoam Seed Oil, rich in fatty acids, injects weightless moisture into hair's cuticle layer, while Arnica Flower plumps and seals dehydrated strands for frizz-free definition. Tight curls reclaim their natural curl pattern with bounce, definition, and natural hold.

Title: Color Sealer
Description: A high-performance balm infused with Biomimetic Silk & Red Raspberry Seed Oil. Our 100% vegan formula seals the cuticle, moisturizes and strengthens the hair fiber and improves color depth and vibrancy for long-lasting color protection and high-gloss shine.

Title: Smoothing Blowout Lotion 14
Description: Smoothing Blowout Lotion 14 tames frizz and smooths hair enhancing manageability for up to 4 days after a blow-out service. This easy to use blow-dry lotion is ideal for clients in salon or at home for a professional, blowout look.

Title: CHI Pliable Polish Styling Paste
Description: CHI Pliable Polish Weightless Styling Paste with a pliable base allows you to move the hair in any direction. It also adds a weightless shine, and can be re-activated with heat for any necessary styling touch ups later on.

Title: Stucco Matte Clay Paste
Description: Stucco’s non-greasy formula provides texture, separation and moldability with a matte finish. Natural oceanic sea clay conditions and replenishes moisture and thickens hair. Best for natural, matte tousled looks, from short and spiky to piecey definition.

Title: Dark Oil Silkening Fragrant Mist-4.5 fl oz
Description:
Sebastian Professional introduces its new Dark Oil Line Extension for 3x smoother* hair with NEW lightweight Dark Oil products. 
*Shampoo, mask and Dark Oil vs non-conditioning shampoo.  The Sebastian Dark Oil Silkening Fragrant Mist is a lightweight mist for a fragrant and silkening effect.

Create your own cocktailing recipes for endless possibilities with Sebastian Professional’s most loved oil, Dark Oil, Lightweight Shampoo, Lightweight Conditioner, Lightweight Mask, and Fragrant Mist. #RulesDon’tApply

Title: Sea Spray Beachy Wave Finish
Description: We’ve bottled up the beach to help you create gritty, wavy texture and volume using this unique formula enhanced with AG’s Sea Complex, an infusion of three naturally texturizing seaweed extracts plus nourishing seaberry oil.

Title: Advanced Climate Control® Heat and Humidity Gel-8.5 fl. oz.
Description: Our bestselling styler, Advanced Climate Control® Heat & Humidity Gel, gets you out of hair-raising situations. Use it to seal every strand, lock in moisture, and lock out humidity. Wheat Protein and pliable styling polymers form a weightless flexible lattice that expands as heat or humidity rises to hold curl definition without frizz. Our high-performance Anti-Frizz Nano Technology with a protein derived from silk seals the cuticle to keep essential moisture in and humidity out. A dedicated UV filter helps protect against damage from environmental aggressors. The result: Flexible hold that won't leave hair crunchy, sticky, or weighed down. Frizz-free, perfectly defined curls-in any climate.

Title: Advanced Climate Control® Heat and Humidity Gel-33.8 fl. oz.
Description: Our bestselling styler, Advanced Climate Control® Heat & Humidity Gel, gets you out of hair-raising situations. Use it to seal every strand, lock in moisture, and lock out humidity. Wheat Protein and pliable styling polymers form a weightless flexible lattice that expands as heat or humidity rises to hold curl definition without frizz. Our high-performance Anti-Frizz Nano Technology with a protein derived from silk seals the cuticle to keep essential moisture in and humidity out. A dedicated UV filter helps protect against damage from environmental aggressors. The result: Flexible hold that won't leave hair crunchy, sticky, or weighed down. Frizz-free, perfectly defined curls-in any climate.

Title: Whip
Description: An airy, weightless formulation that provides subtle texture and control for a natural, effortless look

Title: Sculpt Force
Description: Eimi Sculpt Force is a light-weight non-greasy quick drying hair gel that contains Acrylic compounds that assist you to make fast dramatic hairstyles in a flash and provides you with that high shine finish.

Title: Joigel Firm Styling Gel-33.8 fl oz
Description: We understand: Your hair is tough, tenacious, thick, even coarse at times; it needs a Styling Gel that will fearlessly stand up to its feistiness. And that?s why we developed our firm-hold formula? so supportive, it gives those spirited tresses a run for their money.

Title: StyleSign Curly Twist Salty Oil Spray Surf Oil
Description: StyleSign Curly Twist Surf Oil  Salty Oil Spray is a 2 in 1 texture & moisture spray. Adds beautiful texture and body while defining and protecting from frizz. Use for big bouncy curls or soft natural waves.

Title: Volume Spray Mini
Description:
MARIA NILA VOLUME SPRAY is a volumising spray which works well for adding volume before the styling process. It is also a great option for those who prefer applying volumising products in wet hair. In comparison to the additional hair sprays in the Maria Nila styling series, the Volume Spray is to be used exclusively in
damp hair. The spray is a wet product, which is blow-dried in for optimal result. The Volume Spray has a fruity scent of pineapple and blackberry, with floral notes of lily of the valley and jasmine.

Title: CHI Shine Infusion Thermal Spray 55%
Description: Shine Infusion spray is ideal to be used with all your CHI Tools. It gives the hair an instant polished shine without any added weight or oils. It protects, and helps to repair split ends and eliminates frizz.

Title: CHI Luxury - Black Seed Curl Defining Cream-Gel
Description: Light-hold styling cream that controls frizz while helping to tame, shape and define curls and waves into perfectly controlled styles. Nourishing Black Seed Oil fortifies and revitalizes hair while providing added radiance and shine for the ultimate glamorous finish.

Title: Moisture Recovery + Curl Confidence Duo
6 Pack Styling Mix
Description:
6 Pack Styling Mix Includes:

(1) Spray Grooming Tonic - 3.38 fl. oz.
(1) Surf Tonic - 3.38 fl. oz.
(1) Clay Spray - 3.38 fl. oz.
(1) Fiber Pomade - 1.3 oz.

(1) Extreme Hold Matte Pomade - 1.3 oz.
(1) Travel Dopp Bag

Title: Supernova Blonde Violet Moisture and Shine Cream
Description: This lightweight leave-in hydrating cream makes cool blond shine bright. Keep your blonde light + bright with this violet leave-in cream to neutralize brassy tones.

Title: Original Outlaw Hair Spackle
Description: Original Outlaw Hair Spackle keeps it rugged. It doesn’t matter if you’re robbing banks or on the run, this high- hold, matte grit will leave your hair textured and in place all day. Topped off with shea butter, panthenol, Holy Basil and hops, this pomade also helps to moisturize and condition hair, while leaving the scalp soft and soothed. So go on, take the pomade and run. Comb it smooth or leave it messy. The choice is yours. Its moody and complex fragrance is tinged with hints of dark plum, clove and black currant.

Title: CHI Keratin Flexible Hold Hair Spray
Description: Flexible styling hairspray with lightweight control to provide an ultra smooth hold. Infused with keratin to strengthen hair and reduce breakage, this smoothing hairspray seals out humidity and eliminates frizz and flyaways from any style for a sleek, smooth finish that lasts all day.

Title: Curl Last Flexible-Hold Hairspray
Description: A pliable-hold hairspray to keep curls in place without sacrificing softness or movement.

Title: On Lock High Hold Wax
Description: Keep your ‘do on lock. this workable paste provides a high hold, adds grip, definition, and results in a natural finish on wet or dry hair. ideal for shorter styles, braiding, and ponies. This powerful styling hair wax is pliable and ideal for roughing-up any texture with a long-lasting hold.

Title: Zero Heat Air Dry Styling Creme - Fine/Medium Hair
Description:
Style your hair in seconds?that?s the beauty of this time- saving polishing cr�me that provides long-lasting, air-dried style while keeping frizz at bay.
NEW Joico Zero Heat is the no-heat, no-hassle styler you need when you want to wear an air-dry style and still look polished. With two personalized formulas?for fine/medium or thick hair?that define and enhance your hair?s natural texture (while keeping frizz in check all day), it?s ?no- blow? styling freedom for all.
Without the heft of a heavy cr�me, Zero Heat for Fine/ Medium Hair delivers a natural-looking, no-blow-dry style while reducing frizz and boosting shine.

Title: Road Trip Clay Matte Pomade Duo
Description: Clay Matte Pomade creates a touchable medium hold with a matte finish and is used to manipulate the hair into any style.

Title: Alternator
Description: Unique, new technology that allows all-day flexible styling without re-applying.  Alternator's polymer base offers medium hold with medium shine and allows hair to bend and be reset without re-applying.

Title: Power Powder
Description:
Maria Nila power powder is a volumising, matte styling powder. The main ingredient in Power Powder is Silica Silylate, which adds great texture and volume to dry hair. Power Powder works well for those desiring a long-lasting experience of thicker, high-volume hair without it feeling heavy. The powder works great for both long and short hair and gives as much volume to fine hair as thick. In comparison to the Maria Nila Cleansing Powder, the Power Powder adds more volume and texture, and is less absorbent.

The Power Powder is a great tool for both hairdressers and end-consumers to create volume, hold and long-lasting styling. It is  especially useful if you want to create the sensation of having thicker hair or to secure your bridal, prom or party hairstyle. 
Power Powder is also suitable for fixing braids or hairstyles  after using hair coils to create extra long-lasting texture. The bottle has  a pump function which enables easier and more even application. Thanks to the light formula and the handy pump, this product can also be  applied to create wanted volume in specific parts of the hair.

Title: Ocean Spray
Description: Maria Nila ocean Spray is a multi-functional product that can be used to create texture and natural beach waves or used as prep spray for long lasting Up-dos. This texturizing spray will give tresses the extra hold it needs for a long-lasting finish and with Sunflower Seed Extracts the hair receives the vitamins and minerals it needs to encourage a healthy growth. Ocean Spray is suitable for both longer and shorter hair and thanks to its high concentrate of natural salt, it gives a stronger hold than the original Salty Mist from Maria Nila. The Ocean Spray has a fruity scent of apple and apricot with a slight citrusy fragrance.

Title: Schist Fiber Cream-3.4 oz
Description: Maria Nila schist is a defining fibre cream with low shine for short to medium long hairstyles. Apply to dry or damp hair. Hold 3/5.

Title: Schist Fiber Cream-1.7 oz
Description: Maria Nila schist is a defining fibre cream with low shine for short to medium long hairstyles. Apply to dry or damp hair. Hold 3/5.

Title: ADDVOLUME Root and Body Lift
Description: ADDVOLUME Root and Body Lift, lifts roots and provides targeted volume. Gives hair up to 70% more volume for up to 72 hours.

Title: HAIRPLAY Liquid Wax
Description: HAIRPLAY Liquid Wax holds like a gel, styles like a wax and provides flexible support with shine.

Title: TAMEFRIZZ De-Frizz Oil
Description: TameFrizz De-Frizz Oil smoothes hair surface.  Is a lightweight, non-greasy formula that absorbs instantly. Provides frizz and humidity control for up to 3 days.

Title: Luxe One Leave-In Spray
Description:
Platinum Luxe One Leave-In Spray - All-in-one miracle spray.
Luxe One Leave-In is an all-in-one miracle spray enriched with precious gold for opulent slip and lustrous shine. This versatile fine mist leave-in provides heat protection up to 450°F and can be used as a cutting lotion, after cleansing, or for refreshing dull styles.

Title: Therm-Activ Protector
Description: An ultra lightweight heat protectant that won't leave hair feeling stiff. Therm-Active Protector is a heat-activated spray that protects hair against breakage and damage, without leaving stiff or sticky build up.

Title: Restorative Balm
Description:
A nourishing balm infused with Biomimetic Silk & Hyaloveil®. Our 100% vegan* formula effectively repairs and immediately reconstructs damaged hair for hair that is 15x more resistant to breakage.

*no animal-derived ingredients.

Title: ADDVOLUME Styling Foam
Description: ADDVOLUME Styling Foam gives hair up to 70% more volume, thin ends appear thicker.

Title: BosVolumize Style+ Blow Dry & Styling Gel
Description: BosVolumize Style+ Blow Dry & Styling Gel helps provide thicker, fuller-looking hair with maximum style durability and superior humidity-resistant hold. Sunflower Seed Extract helps create instant volume while Apple Stem Cell Extract stimulates hair follicles when applied to root area.  Weightless, color-safe, alcohol free formula may help resist heat damage from styling tools.

Title: #MyControl Spray Medium Hold
Description: Bulk, Sculpt, and Finish your style with this hairspray!  Shape the style you want by lightly backcombing areas, then brushing out frizz. This lets you  keep the volume and helps perfectly  place and shape  each wave. I love this spray because it dries super fast allowing me to bulk, smooth, and sculpt my styles without the stickiness of a standard hairspray.

Title: Advanced Climate Control Restore Revive Bi-Phase Spray
Description: Extend your style another day with our two-in-one miracle mist, designed to redefine and reactivate your curl pattern as it eliminates frizz. Ouidad Advanced Climate Control® Restore + Revive Bi-Phase combines two high-performing formulas in one: The concentrated oil phase with Mongongo, Grapeseed, and Meadowfoam Seed Oils nourishes, plumps, and perfects curls for consistency and bounce. The Anti-Frizz Nano Technology phase seals hair’s cuticle to lock in moisture and lock out humidity. A dedicated UV filter helps protect against color fade, heat, and free radical damage. The result: Defined, shiny, frizz-free curls – in any climate.

Title: Curl Glaze Mousse
Description: Kenra Professional Curl Glaze Mousse glazes each individual curl for shine, control, and definition. This non-drying, non-flaking formulation provides curls that feel soft to the touch while it helps to resist humidity and control frizz.

Title: Body Shake Texturizing Finisher for Medium to Fine Hair
Description: Get the body you?ve always wanted with the plush, airy, bombshell volume of Body Shake?the buildable spray that?s never stiff or sticky. Delivering a bouncy, plush finish, and the freedom to touch and retouch, you?ll have fullness, fluidity, and pollution protection* in one unique finisher.

Title: Hitman Texturizing Spray
Description:
When you're a man on the run, you don't have time to primp and style. With Gib's Hitman Texturizing Spray, all it takes is a one quick shot and a tousle with your fingers
for a textured, messy, just-drove-off-in-a-cloud-of-dust look. Topped off with Keratin, Hops and Holy Basil, this spray isn't for the weak hearted (or haired).

Title: Builder Wax Spray
Description: Aerosol wax with a satin-matte finish. Spray on to control and finish your style. Vegan formula: no animal derived ingredients.

Title: Rosehip Balm Hair Dry Lotion
Description: Over 98% plant-based and naturally-derived ingredients, Rosehip Balm makes both blow drying and air drying easier. Hair feels instantly smoother and more manageable. Smooth and nourish hair to help prevent dryness, spilt ends and breakage with cold-pressed rosehip oil in this silicone-free, lightweight lotion.

Title: Silk Therapy Duo
Description: Biosilk Silk Therapy is a leave-in replenishing & reconstructing treatment, ideal for all hair types. Fills any voids in cuticle layer and helps prevent split ends. Provides incredible shine.

Title: Tecni.Art Fix Anti Frizz Pure
Description: L’Oréal Professionnel Tecni.Art Pure Fix Anti-Frizz is a 24hr anti-frizz and anti-static hold spray. It lets you take control of your style: a must-have to fight flyaways and keep it tight. For the first time the formula turns pure without added fragrance.

Title: Color Lover Raise The Roots - Root Lifter
Description: Need a lift? Spray it and rise above it!  FRAMESI COLOR LOVER RAISE THE ROOTS brings fierce lift, intense volume, texture and all over bodacious locks. All while keeping your color >95% longer.

Title: Road Trip Fiber Pomade Duo
Description: Fiber Pomade creates textured definition with a firm but pliable hold and low shine finish.

Title: Flip Turn Volumizing Spray
Description: Upside down, sideways, backwards...this spray delivers supercharged volume and hold from any angle. With big-time body and ultra-firm staying power (up to 72 hours!), you?ll seriously flip for it.

Title: Blow Dry Volumizing Gel
Description: Big things are on the horizon! Blow Dry Volumizing Gel creates 94% more volume and lift with a workable, medium hold and style memory that lasts up to 48 hours. The ideal primer for a silky smooth blowout, this heat-activated formula provides thermal protection up to 450°F, while improving manageability and smoothness for a shiny, residue-free finish. This multi-benefit volumizing gel also helps to tame frizz and flyaways in addition to offering humidity protection up to 72 hours.

Title: Dualsenses - Color Brilliance Serum Spray
Description: Dualsenses - Color Brilliance Serum Spray, LEAVE-IN SPRAY for fine to normal hair blended with microPROtec complex and Luminescine.

Title: Stay Firm Workable Finishing Spray
Description: Delicately crafted to represent the fascinating mix of cultures and creativity in EIMI's global neighborhood. A fragrance thats fused with airy transparent floral base notes, contrasted with a clean, luxurious amber heart and complemented with exquisite marine top notes.

Title: Potion 9 Lite Treatment - Flow-5.1 fl oz
Description: Potion 9 Lite is a new lightweight, wearable treatment-styler with active target conditioners to restore under-nourished hair while the protective agent cocktail enhances manageable styling, leaving hair with a radiant shine.

Title: Curl Reboot Nourish Strength Leave - In Mask (Fine and Thin Curls)
Description: Designed for finer textures, this nutrient-rich treatment restores elasticity, repairs damaged hair and improves manageability. The lightweight formula gives fine/thin strands the moisturizing nourishment they need without weighing them down. Curls are left more manageable and damage is visibly reduced.

Title: Shine Spray 55% VOC
Description: Kenra Classic Shine Spray provides hair with instant weightless shine.

Title: Curl Shaper Take Shape Plumping Defining Curl Cream
Description: Medium-to-thick textures need more moisture, but heavy is not always better. When loose curls lose their shape, this lightweight cream builds body and definition from the inside out. It establishes a curl memory so curls can reform, giving you soft, natural-looking movement every time.

Title: Sonic Wave™ Control Creme
Description: Layer Texture Control Creme on curly hair to tame or enhance curls and define shape. Moisturizes, enhances and adds volume to wavy or curly hair.

Title: CURLUP Wave Foam
Description: CURLUP Wave Foam enhances wave formulation.

Title: Controller Gel
Description: Strong hold with no flaking. This sculpting gel adds structure with shine. Applies clean and rinses out easily. Vegan formula: no animal derived ingredients.

Title: CURLUP Control Creme
Description: CURLUP Control Creme shapes and bundles curls.

Title: L'Oreal Serie Expert Blow-dry Fluidifier
Description: New L'Oreal Professional Serie Expert Blow-dry Fluidifier - Lightweight shape memory cream to bring long=lastingness and protection.

Title: Defy Damage Protective Shield
Description:
Defy Damage Protective Shield to guard against thermal and UV damage.
Protect all hair types from the ravaging effects of daily heat styling, UV exposure, and environmental pollution that lead to dry, dull, lackluster locks with Joico?s NEW Defy Damage haircare system. From salon to home and beyond, this damage-defying breakthrough helps protect and strengthen hair bonds for a healthy hair transformation you can instantly see and feel.

Title: Root Shoot
Description: AN EIMI Must Have; You're only ever one shot away from high precision root lift with this always on-target mousse. Root Shoot gives the hair more lift and volume starting at the scalp, leaving the rest of the hair free to receive other styling products so you can combine and craft any way you like.

Title: Tecni.Art Beach Waves
Description: L’Oréal Professionnel Tecni.Art Beach Waves texturizing salt spray gives you that on-trend beachy hair effect, without the rough touch. The styling essential for a matte texturized look.

Title: Tecni.Art Constructor
Description: L’Oréal Professionnel Tecni.Art Constructor is a thermo-active spray for texture and flexible hold for voluminous and wavy hairstyles.

Title: Better Together Hairspray
Description: Two is better than one with CHI's Better Together Dual Mist Hairspray's two hold options. This unique adjustable spray gives you the flexibility for multiple hairstyles. The Good" hold setting provides a natural hold that is perfect for styling
Price: beachy waves and taming flyaways. The "Great" hold setting provides a stronger hold for updos
Link: tights curls and slicked back ponytails. Get everything you need in one hairspray. Vegan

Title: Air Dry Crème 6-6.5 oz
Description: Air Dry Crème 6 dramatically reduces air dry time up to 59% and enhances natural body for effortless looks with a finish that feels product-free. This time-saving styling creme delivers a delicate hold to tame frizz and resist humidity providing a natural carefree look.

Title: BioSilk Glazing Gel
Description: BioSilk Glazing Gel light hold sculpting gel that distributes evenly to give body and shine without stickiness.

Title: Road Trip Extreme Hold Matte Pomade Duo
Description: Extreme Hold Matte Pomade provides our strongest hold and a matte finish. This water based formula washes out easily and won’t leave build up behind. It’s 1 better than 10, it’s an 11!

Title: Color Lover - Curl Pudding
Description:
Curl Pudding - Curl Defining Cream.
Be a high roller. Bet on FRAMESI COLOR LOVER CURL PUDDING.  Define and separate curls. Eliminate frizz. Win silky texture and smoothness, lose stiffness. With a unique compound rich in QUINOA, our curl defining cream keeps your color >95% longer.

Title: Multi-Purpose Hairspray VOC
Description:
A multi-purpose hairspray infused with Biomimetic Silk & Blue Lotus Extract. Our 100% vegan* formula can be used as a fixing spray or working spray for heat-activated styles for long-lasting styles with touchable hold and shine for up to 72h.

*no animal-derived ingredients.

Title: StyleSign - Curly Twist Curl Splash Hydrating Curl Gel
Description: StyleSign - Curl Splash Hydrating Curl Gel. Accentuates and hydrates limp curls for vital bounce and flexible texture, without crunchiness.

Description:
An Extra Volume Spray!
Shaper Fierce is the hairspray with extra muscle to keep your hair where you want it. Whether you're in the city or on the run way. Hold that volume, texture or pinned-up style in place, and radiant against the odds.

Title: Bed Head Superstar Queen for a Day Thickening Spray
Description: TIGI Bed Head Superstar Queen for a Day Thickening Spray is a thickening mousse spray that gives volume, body and lift. It strengthens, conditions and moisturizes hair for a natural, non-sticky feel. TIGI Bed Head Superstar Hair Spray Queen for a Day" is good for fine to medium hair texture

Title: BY Framesi - Pearl Straightening Balm
Description: Creates natural movement while increasing hair volume. Great for straightening naturally curly or wavy hair with a hairdryer or flat iron! Tame and smooth even the most rebellious, disobedient hair types. Protects your hair from humidity for all-day frizz control while nourishing the fibers with rice oil and Limnanthes alba oil.

Title: Celebrity Styling Kit
Description:
Thickening Spray Gel:
Aquage Thickening Spray Gel is a firm hold, body-building styling spray that thickens fine, thin hair.
Transforming Paste:
Aquage Transforming Paste is an ultra-firm hold texturizer that combines the flexibility of a wax with the hold of a hairspray.

Title: Whipped Taffy
Description:
The iconic versatility of Texturizing Taffy 13 now with ultra matte firm hold.
Whipped Taffy 20 is the new addition to the Kenra Platinum portfolio that provides an airy, high-hold matte finish. It is one of the most versatile products because you can sculpt, smooth or texturize any style without adding weight due to its whipped souffle texture.

Title: Paste
Description:
Rusk Paste has a fibrous, web-like texture that allows you to manipulate hair into any desired shape. Stretchable fibers allow for reshaping hair throughout the day.
It's pliable enough to form, lift, separate and define hair. Ideal for textured looks and changeable styles. Flake-free.

Title: StyleSign - Perfect Hold Sprayer
Description: StyleSign Perfect Hold Sprayer - Powerful Hair Lacquer - Locks hair into place for bold looks with extreme hold. Protects against humidity.

Title: Slip Vitamin C Dry Oil Spray
Description: Slip dry oil spray disperses a fine mist that instantly adds smoothness and shine. Vitamin C and plant-based squalane strengthen hair while Abyssinian, sunflower seed and rosemary leaf oil lock in moisture. Slip helps hair feel soft to the touch.

Title: VolumeBloom Root Lift
Description:
Ideal for fine, flat hair, Biolage Volumebloom Root Lift is enriched with Extracts of Wheat and Soy Proteins and Cotton Flower and is designed to texturise the hair for a voluminous, full bodied style. Biolage Volumebloom Root Lift also revives lifeless hair and lifts from root to tip, leaving the hair with up to 70% more volume.
Product packaging may vary.

Title: Total Results High Amplify Shine Rinse
Description:
Discover sleeker, shinier locks with Matrix's nourishing hair treatment. Designed to give your mane a more reflective sheen, the formula helps each strand to catch the light for a glistening end result.

Thanks to innovative technology, the watery fluid is completely weightless, meaning you don't have to compromise on volume when it comes to realizing maximum shine. It works to make hair more manageable for easier brushing and styling, letting tangles fall away for a silky finishing touch. In just eight seconds, you'll notice an increase in shine, making this an easy way to transform your everyday haircare routine. Ideal for even finer hair types, the treatment can be used as a conditioner after shampooing.

Title: Color Lover Volume Blow It Big - Blow Dry Cream
Description: Boom! Go BIG and Go OUT! Elevate your hair with FRAMESI COLOR LOVER BLOW IT BIG volumizing blow dry cream. Height without weight and an extreme yet natural tossable hold. Smooth it in, root to tip and keep your color >95% longer using a compound rich with QUINOA. Offers strong thermal protection.

Title: Sugar Lift Spray
Description: Sugar Lift Spray for Voluminous Texture. Get a grip on volume: this rich flexible spray infused with sugar provides lift, shine and touchable grippy texture.

Title: Tecni.Art Full Volume Extra Mousse
Description: L’Oréal Professionnel Tecni.Art Full Volume Extra Mousse creates big boudoir hair: extra volume, extra strong hold without weighing hair down. Best used on fine hair.

Title: Orchid Oil Curl Defining Creme
Description:
Orchid Oil® Curl Defining Creme with Dynagen-R™ Taming even the unruliest and damaged hair, this rich creme will leave your curls healthy, radiant and supple.

- Restores essential moisture balance
- Defines and shapes curls
- Boosts natural hair elasticity
- Recommended for: All types of curly hair.

Title: Bed Head Joyride Texturizing Powder Balm
Description: Bed Head Joyride Texturizing Powder Balm - The ultimate ‘bed head’ look, this thick balm breaks to a dry powder feel for control, de-frizzing and adding live-in texture for easier styling.

Title: StyleSign - Double Boost Root Lift Spray
Description: StyleSign Double Boost Spray Intense Root Lift Spray - Invigorates and adds instant lift and volume to fine and limp roots.

Title: Advanced Climate Control Featherlight Touch - Up Gel Cream
Description: Refresh styles in between wash days and define dry curls on the go. This lightweight formula combines the hold of a gel with the moisturizing benefits of a cream. Anti-Frizz Nano Technologyᵀᴹ seals hair's cuticle to lock moisture in and humidity out. The result is hydrated, frizz-free curls. Ideal for fine to medium textures. Cruelty-free. Color and keratin safe. Free of sulfates, parabens, phthalates, paraffin, MIT.

Title: Coconut Milk All-In-One Leave-In Miracle Mist
Description:
The multi-benefit spray tames frizz, rehydrates, smooths, detangles, provides shine, heat protection and more. BCL Superfoods Collection formulas meet the Whole Foods standards which prohibit use of over 100+ ingredients. BCL Hair care formulas are made with Certified Organic oils, extracts and botanicals to insure the purest and most efficacious ingredients.

Clean at Cosmo Prof
Products featuring Cosmo Prof’s Clean logo are free from: Sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, mineral oil,  coal tar, hydroquinone, and triclocarban.

Title: Sugar Beach Sun Crème 12
Description: Achieving textured styles doesn’t have to leave your hair dry and tangled. Sugar Beach Sun Crème is a rich, texturizing crème that provides sun protection against color fading while increasing shine. Enhance natural texture with this non-greasy crème a sweet step towards soft, touchable texture and longer color vibrancy.

Title: Dark Oil Mini
Description:
Dark Oil - Evanescent styling oil that replenishes from the inside out to smoothen the cuticle and add body, then disappears from hair thanks to the new DiffusX Technology. Formulated with sandalwood, cedarwood, and argan oil. With hair protection against UV damage. 
Disappears in seconds, smooths up to 48 hours.

Title: Clay Spray
Description: Clay Spray adds texture, thickness, and definition while leaving hair with a matte finish and light hold. Helps achieve a dry, gritty, lived-in look.

Title: CHI Enviro Firm Flex Hairspray 55%
Description: Farouk CHI Enviro Flex Hold Hair Spray Firm Hold by Farouk, is a firm hold, fast drying hair spray that is ideal for all your hard to hold styles. Lock in total control without added weight and experience the enriched silk proteins and natural herbs found in Farouk Chi Enviro Flex Firm Hold Hair Spray.

Title: Quick Dry Heat Spray
Description: Maria Nilla Quick Dry Heat Spray is a fast drying and lightweight spray that protects the hair against heat whilst speeding up the drying process. The formulation contains water repellent ingredients ensuring the hair dries quickly whilst protecting molecules help to combat heat damage and leaves the hair glossy and shiny. The product is sulphate and paraben free and Colour Guard Complex protects against UV rays and free radicals. The Quick Dry Heat Spray has a fresh floral scent of yellow rose, white musk, sweet pear and blackcurrant.

Title: StyleSign - Curly Twist Curl Control Cream
Description: StyleSign - Curl Control - Moisturizing Curl Cream. Provides smoothness and definition to unruly curls. Leaves hair elastic and flexible. Bundles curls without weighing down.

Title: Thermal Serum w/ Argan Oil
Description: Rusk Thermal Serum with Argan Oil infuses hair with pure Argan Oil to instantly restore smooth, shiny hair and continuously repair and protect against styling damage.  It can be used before blow-drying to seal in moisture or after to give style a smooth finish.

Title: Brooklyn Bombshell Blowout Mist-6.7 oz
Description: For blowouts that blow all others away because they’re shapely and sexy, not limp and wimpy. Adds volume and body with no weight, buildup or crunchiness and creates extra texture and lift with massive hold. The mist nozzle provides even product distribution with every use.

Title: Brooklyn Bombshell Blowout Mist-2.3 oz
Description: For blowouts that blow all others away because they’re shapely and sexy, not limp and wimpy. Adds volume and body with no weight, buildup or crunchiness and creates extra texture and lift with massive hold. The mist nozzle provides even product distribution with every use.

Title: StyleSign - Diamond Gloss Protect and Shine Spray
Description: StyleSign Diamond Glos Protect & Shine Spray - effectively blocks humidity for up to 72 hours. Tames frizz and provides intense shine, for a silk smooth touch and glossy finish.

Title: Advanced Climate Control Featherlight Styling Cream
Description: Our Advanced Climate Control® Featherlight Styling Cream creates definition and defends against frizz for long-lasting, touchable curls. The flexible and soft hold is thanks to our blend of lightweight humectants and natural oils (meadowfoam seed, olive, and soybean) that nourishes hair with balanced hydration to enhance curls. Our signature high-performance Anti-Frizz Nano Technology™ with a protein derived from silk, forms an invisible barrier to block out humidity that causes frizz. “Nano” Technology refers to the size of the molecules in the formula, which are small enough to penetrate the cuticle and provide maximum frizz-fighting benefits. Safe for color-treated curls, this styling cream also has a dedicated UV filter that helps protect against damage from environmental aggressors.

Title: Thickefy Styler Foam
Description: Thickefy Foam is a weightless flexible styler to create the look and feel of naturally thick and voluminous hair. Its liquid-to-foam technology increases intra-hair volume for long-lasting body and pliable hold making it the ultimate styler for people with fine thin hair.

Title: Fresh-Pressed Passion Fruit Guava High Hold Molding Putty
Description:
Fresh Pressed Passion Fruit Guava High Hold Molding Putty.  Exotic Passion Fruit and ripe Guava give tropical texture for piecey, pliable and adjustable styling with high hold. Macadamia Oil and Chia Seed Protein add moisture and volume with a matte finish.

Clean at Cosmo Prof
Products featuring Cosmo Prof’s Clean logo are free from: Sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, mineral oil,  coal tar, hydroquinone, and triclocarban.

Title: Coco Nut Milk Conditioning Spray
Description: Detangle, strengthen and hydrate hair, helping it feel soft and manageable with this silicone-free conditioning spray infused with coconut, macadamia extract and mango seed butter. Ideal for medium to thick hair types or those prone to knots. Formulated with over 98% plant-based and naturally-derived ingredients, lightweight coco nourishes hair like a super food smoothie.

Title: Blow Dry Mist
Description: Kenra Blow Dry Mist is a lightweight formula for fine-medium hair.

Title: Style Link - Chill BOHO Air Dry Smoothing Cream
Description: Chill BOHO Smoothing Air-Dry Cream smooths the hair for a lightweight, frizz controlled finish. No heat needed, no fuss, no flyaways! Goodbye frizz, hello smooth!

Title: Curl Shaper Out of Thin Hair Volumizing Curl Jelly
Description: Styling products with certain oils and waxes can be too heavy for finer curls. This light-as-air jelly activates loose curls for smooth definition, volume, and hold without weighing them down. Curls are left soft and defined, without any crunch.

Title: Root Lifting Spray 13 2% VOC-8 fl oz
Description: Kenra Classic Root Lifting Spray is a spray that provides hair with volume, body and style.

Title: Style & Protect Shine Bright Taming Serum
Description:
Make your hair shine as bright as you with this hair shine serum that smooths frizzy hair and adds radiant shine.

Is your dull hair in need of some serious shine? Introduce it to the Shine Bright Taming Serum, an anti-frizz hair shine serum that uses coriander seed oil to smooth frizzy hair and add radiant shine without the unwanted weight. Pureology's exclusive AntiFade Complex® protects hair color and features full spectrum UVA/UVB sunscreen for that salon-fresh look and feeling. Say goodbye to unwanted flyaways and hello to shiny, smooth hair.

Title: Advanced Climate Control Heat and Humidity Stronger Hold Gel
Description: Humidity: It's every curl’s nightmare. That's because curly hair’s unique structure exposes its cuticle. When humidity gets in, curls expand with unwanted volume and look frizzy, undefined, and dull. Ouidad Advanced Climate Control® Heat & Humidity Gel – Stronger Hold transforms uneven curl patterns into consistently formed, well-defined and frizz-free spirals. Anti-Frizz Nano Technology seals the cuticle to lock in moisture and lock out humidity. A dedicated UV filter helps protect against damage from environmental aggressors. The result: Defined, shiny, controlled curls – in any climate.

Title: Blofoam Extreme Texture & Root Lifter
Description: Blofoam Extreme Texture and Root Lifter is a unique spray-on texturizing foam that is applied directly to hair for maximum styling control and versatility.

Title: Pomade Starter Pack
Anti-Frizz Spray
Description: RUSK Anti-Frizz Spray, the latest addition to RUSK’s 2014 Styling Collection, “weatherproofs” hair. This light spray locks out humidity while providing color protection and strengthening hair.

Title: Uplifting Foam-2 fl oz
Description: Aquage Uplifting Foam is a light hold, weightless volume-building foam that adds body and bounce to lifeless hair.

Description: Aquage Uplifting Foam is a light hold, weightless volume-building foam that adds body and bounce to lifeless hair.

Description: Aquage Finishing Spray locks in style and humidity with an ultra-firm hold.

Title: Foxy Curls Curly Hair Mousse For Strong Hold
Description:
Foxy Curls™ Mousse; new on the outside and just as epic on the inside. A powerful curl defining formulation, not only designed with, but used by salon professionals. Delivering salon results and salon experience at home.
	Whip curls into shape with the Foxy Curls™ Extreme Curl Mousse! This curly hair mousse provides curls with a strong hold to help maintain shape and for long-lasting curl definition. The mousse also imparts heat protection, frizz control and resistance to humidity.
	Formulated with Super Hold Polymers that provides a firm hold for curls to help maintain shape and definition with flexibility and shine, Shape Support Complex that helps retain curl shape and body so styles last for longer, even in high humidity, and Thermal Protectants to help shield curls from heat.
	Bright zesty fragrance.

Title: CHI Keratin K-Trix 5 Thermal Active Smoothing Treatment
Description: Theramally activated smoothing treatment that works with the heat of a styling iron to smooth the hair cuticle, locks in moisture and seals out humidity - creating soft hydrated styles that last up to 5 days.

REFINED. IRIDESCENT. INCREDIBLE.

Dream Blowout Thermal Protection Creme

Moisturizing exotic oils and protective technology change blow-drying as you know it.
Get the blowout of your dreams with NEW Joico Dream Blowout?our one-and-done blow-drying solution that saves major time, shields hair from thermal damage, protects your ?do against humidity, and fights frizz. Watch your hair become luxuriously soft and smooth and beam with dreamy shine.

AllCurl Defining Jelly is a spreadable gel cream that delivers increased shine and manageability. Providing maximum curl definition along with elongation and essential moisture, this jelly eliminates frizz and resists humidity without crunch. Define curls beyond just type and texture. For all curl types. Silicon Free. Paraben Free.

It contains natural bamboo extract to promote shine and offers heat protection via a polymer blend that creates an invisible film around the hair fiber.

This light hold formula imparts incredible moisture & elongation alongside essential definition. Define curls beyond just type and texture. For all curl types. Silicon free. Paraben free.

Our alcohol-free, flake-free formula will not dry the scalp and contains thermal barriers that protect the hair from environmental stress and blow drying or heat treatments. This is one gel that works to condition scalp with ginseng and sage extract.

Description: Non-flaking formula. Light Hold Styling Gel builds thickness and shine while providing light control. This is one gel that works to condition scalp with ginseng and sage extract.

Description: Dualsenses - Color Lock Serum - Luminosity for fine to normal hair. Locks in color instantly and amplifies color luminosity.

Description: Meet the seaside styling spray that delivers glam, beachy texture, satiny hydration, and protective separation in a single transformative spray. That?s what you get with touchable Beach Shake.

Description: THERMASHAPE Hot Flex Spray is a medium hold prep spray for heat styling.

Title: CHI Keratin Silk Infusion
Description:
CHI Keratin Reconstructing Silk Infusion for extra moisture and elasticity. 

Transform weak chemically, mechanically or environmentally abused hair into strong healthy smooth locks with CHI KERATIN with highly sophisticated compounds and ingredients replenish and protect hair’s natural keratin protein, dramatically improving elasticity and preventing future breakage while adding intense hydration that restores softness and shine. 

Recommended for chemically, mechanically or environmentally abused hair.

Description: Cleanse and refresh sweaty curls to combat dryness, breakage and frizz. This lightweight mist effortlessly extends styles, no shower needed! Perfect for all hair types. Color and keratin safe. No sulfates, paraffin.

Description: Refresh styles and tame frizz on the go with this super hydrating touch-up balm. Packed with nourishing butters and oils, it works to diminish the appearance of split ends while also helping to repair, strengthen, and prevent breakage. Anti-Frizz Nano Technologyᵀᴹ seals hair's cuticle to lock moisture in and humidity out. Ideal for medium to thick textures. Cruelty-free. Color and keratin safe. Free of sulfates, parabens, phthalates, paraffin, MIT.

Description: Aquage Spray Wax is a flexible, non-sticky, wax-free styler that delivers soft texture, volume, and dimension with a satin finish.

Description: StyleSign - Smooth Control Smoothing Blow Dry Spray - Speeds up drying time and improves manageability for smooth responsive styling. Shapes the hair and gives light hold.

An ultra-lightweight spray infused with Biomimetic Silk & Blue Lotus Extract. Our 100% vegan* formula transforms limp, flat hair into natural-looking voluminous and touchable hair with enhanced volume and natural shine.

*no animal-derived ingredients.

Title: Volumizing Spray-4.2 fl. oz.
Description:
An ultra-lightweight spray infused with Biomimetic Silk & Blue Lotus Extract. Our 100% vegan* formula transforms limp, flat hair into natural-looking voluminous and touchable hair with enhanced volume and natural shine.

*no animal-derived ingredients.

Title: Defining Gel
Description: Aquage Defining Gel is a firm-hold gel that creates well-defined curls without the frizz.

Title: Silk Therapy Lite - 100 count
Description: undefined

Title: Classic Molding Clay Gravity Feeder Display
Description: High hold with medium shine. Concentrated styling power lets you manipulate hair into any style. Made with natural extracts and beeswax, this unique compound maintains touchable shape and texture. Works well for short styles and those who seek a styling product with a more natural, subtle fragrance. Molding Clay is also a product of choice for those who frequently engage in sports and tend to perspire heavily.

Title: Curl Therapy Lightweight Protein Foam Hair Treatment
Description: Strengthen and repair brittle and damaged curls. This easy-to-use treatment strengthens strands and restores curls without over-proteinizing. Vegetable proteins, amino acids and vitamin-packed Kale, Lemon, Carrot and Chia Seed target strands that have become weak, repairing and restoring to prevent breakage. Hydration-boosting agents infuse curls with the moisture they need to restore definition and elasticity.

Title: Dualsenses Men - Texture Cream Paste
Description: Dualsenses Men Texture Cream Paste for all hair types. Medium hold for naturally structured looks with matte finish. Easy flexible styling with extra long molding time.

Title: THERMASHAPE 2-In-1 Spray
Description: THERMASHAPE 2-in-1 Spray gives shape for styles that use hot tools and reduces breakage up to 50%.

Title: Jel Fx Firm Hold Styling Gel
Description: Jel Fx Firm Hold Styling Gel is a non-greasy forming gel that defines, directs, shapes and slicks. Adds texture and hold. Hair brushes easily and springs back, full-bodied and touchable. Great for wet looks. Brushes through without flaking.

Title: TAMEFRIZZ Smoothing Lotion
Description: TAMEFRIZZ Smoothing Lotion provides instant combability and reduces frizz during blow drying. It is a lightweight leave-in formula that eliminates flyaways and static.

Title: Salty Mist
Description:
Maria Nila Salty Mist is a nourishing texture spray with light hold that gives a salty feeling to the hair. The product is sulphate and paraben free and Colour Guard Complex protects against UV–rays and free radicals. Salty Mist is suitable for both longer and shorter hair and has a low concentrate of salt, which gives a lighter hold than
the Ocean Spray from Maria Nila. The Salty Mist has a fresh chypre floral scent, with notes of bergamot and Bulgarian rose.

Title: DevaFast Dry Spray
Description: Speed up your air-dry & diffusing time up to 66%! With our fast-forward blend, this lightweight dry accelerating spray helps accelerate the rate at which water evaporates from the hair's surface without drying out curls and has a fast-absorbing finish.

Title: Tecni.Art Savage Panache
Description: L’Oréal Professionnel Tecni.Art Savage Panache is a dry touch texturizing powder spray. The perfect product to add grip and texture to enhance any hairstyles.

Title: Shine Heist Lightweight Conditioning Cream
Description: Create luxurious shine, delicate smoothness, and soft movement with Bed Head’s Shine Heist™ Lightweight Conditioning Cream. This conditioning cream helps prevent flyaways and smoothes cuticles, leaving the hair velvety soft at the touch and easier to manage. This premium blend also gives incredible shine and a shimmery finish!

Title: Road Trip Pink Heavy Grease Pomade Duo
Description: Pink Pomade Grease, formulated with Beeswax, allows product to glide through the hair without clumping, while encouraging moisture retention. Pink Pomade Grease has a unique formula that provides excellent hold perfect for the thickest and curliest of hair.

Title: Color Lover Progressively Smooth Leave-In Smoothing Spray
Description: Progressively Smooth Leave-In Smoothing Spray. Work smarter not harder.  Taming frizz is tough.  FRAMESI COLOR LOVER PROGRESSIVELY SMOOTH works for you, transforming your hair from the inside.  Experience the progressive effect…. the more you indulge, the more it smooths while keeping your color >95% longer.

Title: #MyStardust Spray
Description:
#MyStardust Spray - Intense Shine Spray
Tame the hair after blow drying- Spray Stardust Spray for added smoothness, shine and manageability. After creating the perfect shape and style,  contour the curves and bends of the hair with this spray to magnify the shine bands and intensify the reflection.

Title: Tea Tree Matte Cream
Description: A lightweight cream for a light but lasting hold. Adds texture and flexibility all with a natural matte finish.

Title: StyleSign - Showcaser Strong Mousse Wax
Description: StyleSign Showcaser Strong Mousse Wax combines the lightness of a foam with the strong control and hold properties of a wax. For a textured look with a radiant shine.

Title: Whipped Creme
Description: Professional Sebastian whips up a style-craving so scrumptious it could only be Whipped Crème. This protein-rich, ultra-light whip lifts deliciously nourished curls and waves to perfection for super-conditioned air-light bounce.

Title: Con Man Hair Pudding
Description:
This is one savvy, sly pudding. Just when you think it’s only got your hair hydration covered, it gives you the slip, coming back in to add mild style and volume. But don’t be fooled, those aren’t the only tricks of the trade this product knows; it can take your beard from wily and dry to healthy, strong and replenished in a flash. 

Reinforced with Guar and Guarana for deep hydration, increased shine, and an all-over healthier appearance. But don’t forget their accomplices, Burdock Root and Hibiscus, who offer stealth antiseptic and antioxidant properties, helping to leave your scalp nice and fresh for a clean getaway.

Title: Heavy Hold Pomade - Super Size
Description: The newest addition to the family of American Crew pucks, this styler offers Superior Hold with Intense Shine. Reach for it when you are looking to create bold, unapologetic shapes with Star-Quality Shine. Water based pomade that delivers high hold and adds a ton of shine.

Title: Minerals Styling Clay
Description: Get the perfect matte texture with all your hairstyles using this clay wax. Made with moisturizing olive oil and plant-based proteins to create a hydrating formula that protects the hair from becoming dry while creating a natural, textured style. Does not leave behind a wax-feeling and has an oriental woody scent with notes of Lily of the Valley and Citrus.

Title: RAW Color Care Heat Styling Primer
Description: Infused with coconut milk and meadowfoam, Biolage R.A.W. Heat Styling Primer is hair's new blow-dry companion. Provides an easy blow-dry with touchable, soft, shapely results. Heat protection up to 450°F.

Title: Styling Spray Mini
Description: Maria Nila styling Spray is a gentle spray with light hold that adds shine and reduces frizz. Compared to the Finishing Spray and Extreme Spray, Styling Spray is the lightest hair spray from the Maria Nila styling series. The spray is easy to brush out and can be applied in multiple layers. The Styling Spray has a vanilla-balsamic fragrance, with citrusy and floral notes of nectarine, marzipan, pink rose, and magnolia.

Clean at Cosmo Prof

Title: Advanced Climate Control Detangling Heat Spray
Description: Humidity: It's every curl's nightmare. That's because curly hair's unique structure exposes its cuticle. When humidity gets in, curls expand with unwanted volume and look frizzy, undefined, and dull. Our Advanced Climate Control® Detangling Spray primes curls to better resist frizz. Use it to seal every strand, fight tangles, and make curls more manageable. Our high-performance Anti-Frizz Nano Technology with a protein derived from silk seals the cuticle to form a barrier that locks in moisture and locks out humidity. Natural oils (Grapeseed, Sweet Almond, Macadamia Nut, Coconut, Argan, and Safflower) nourish and moisturize curls, while a dedicated UV filter helps protect against damage from heat styling and environmental aggressors. The result: defined, shiny, controlled curls-in any climate.

Title: DevaFuser
Description:
New and improved durable DevaFuser with ceramic technology, now withstands high heat and dries curls quickly while preserving hair's natural moisture and luster with zero frizz. The patented DevaFuser design enhances your natural curls, dries curly hair faster than traditional diffusers, while creating body and touchable volume. This unique, universal diffuser deliver 360º airflow to completely surround curls even at your roots.
Who's It For?
Wavy or curly hair that wants enhanced definition, reduced frizz and shortened drying time
What Does It Do?
- Unlike most diffusers, the DevaFuser enhances the appearance of natural curls by creating both definition and volume. Usually you have to sacrifice one for the other. 
- Its unique shape completely surround curls, delivering airflow even at your roots
- Created with a ceramic inner core to preserve hair's natural moisture and luster
- This diffuser is designed to fit most dryers
