Dualsenses Just Smooth 60 second Treatment with Kukui Nut Oil, for unruly and frizzy hair.
TREATMENT for unruly and frizzy hair blended with microPROtec complex and Kukui Nut Oil. Regenerates hair instantly up to 100% in 60 seconds and provides manageability and frizz control.

Title: Dualsenses Just Smooth Taming 60 second Treatment-16 fl oz
Description:
Dualsenses Just Smooth 60 second Treatment with Kukui Nut Oil, for unruly and frizzy hair.
TREATMENT for unruly and frizzy hair blended with microPROtec complex and Kukui Nut Oil. Regenerates hair instantly up to 100% in 60 seconds and provides manageability and frizz control.

Title: Deva Towel
Description: DevaTowel Anti-Frizz Microfiber Towel. The DevaTowel's smooth microfiber texture dries curls without causing frizz. Plus, the larger size makes it easier to dry every curl thoroughly. It's even big enough to wrap around your whole head!

Title: Classic Body Perm Red
Description:
Quantum Classic Body Acid Perms are formulated with patented Equalizer 3 conditioner that balance porosity for even, predictable curl formation.Advanced conditioning neutralizers provide smooth, manageable and healthy-looking curls. 
No test curl. No dryer heat required. Quantum Classic Body Acid Perm creates soft body and supportive waves for a non-permed" look. Ideal for shorter hair and first time clients. For normal

Title: Dualsenses Curls & Waves Hydrating Serum Spray
Description: Dualsenses Curls & Waves Hydrating Serum Spray for curly and wavy hair is blended with micro-PROtec complex and milk protein. Instantly strengthens the hair fiber from within and reactivates limp curls and waves. Bundles and controls frizz whilst protecting the hair from heat.

Title: Healthy Hair & Scalp Follicle Energizer
Description: Support healthy hair function in areas of thinning with Healthy Hair and Scalp Follicle Energizer, an intensive, advanced leave-in treatment serum featuring Biotin and Caffeine to help inhibit the effects of DHT on hair and scalp and strengthen hair follicles.  Botanical extracts help protect and strengthen for thicker, fuller-looking hair. Biotin and Panthenol help strengthen the hair while DHT-blocking Caffeine and Rosemary Extract help reduce scalp inflammation and increase circulation. Contains stimulating activators that assist in increasing cellular energy and microcirculation on the scalp, creating the foundation for healthy hair growth.

Title: Fragrance-Free & Hypoallergenic SuperCream
Description:
OUR SUPER STYLER MEETS FRAGRANCE-FREE
Fragrance-free and hypoallergenic, this multitasking, ultra-rich cream is formulated for those with sensitivities to fragrance, essential oils, dyes, or gluten. The hydra-definition blend provides coarse curls with smoothness, shape, shine and frizz control.

Title: INVIGO Brilliance for Coarse Hair Retail Kit
Description:
The Brilliance Coarse Hair Retail Kit is the perfect care regimen for color protection, and offers 30% SAVINGS!

INVIGO creates recharging moments in the salon and at home with a high performance invigorating treatment.

-IN Inside blends: Advanced technology. New ingredients. Vitamins. Wrapped in a delightful fragrance.
-VI Recharging and invigorating your hair with the unique Acupoint Activation.
-GO Express caring solutions to recharge on the go.

INVIGORATING CARE BLENDS. TIME TO RECHARGE!

Gift Set Includes:


	1 - Brilliance Coarse Shampoo 10.1 oz.
	1 - Brilliance Coarse Conditioner 8.4 oz.
	1 - Miracle BB Spray 5.07 oz.

Title: Miracle Oil Plus Keratin
Description:
Miracle Oil Plus Keratin. Just like lotion protects the skin, just a few drops of our miracle oil creates a powerful shield that blocks heat, humidity, and UV damage while also rebuilding and revitalizing hair so it’s stronger every day.

Infused with keratin — the building-block protein that makes up all hair — the It’s a 10 Keratin Collection builds stronger, shinier, smoother hair beginning with its most vital components. This versatile compound also shields against damage-causing environmental stressors and heat, locks in moisture, guards against humidity, and restores lost smoothness to dry or brittle hair.

Title: Deep Treatment Curl Restoration Therapy
Description: A salon-strength treatment to replenish essential nutrients and reinforce the hair shaft, so curls are left healthier, more defined and frizz-free. Used with or without heat, it penetrates deep into the cuticle, replacing the proteins and 14 amino acids critical to curl formation. Murumuru and cupuacu seed butter, plus vitamins B5 and E pack more strength, protection, and conditioning benefits.

Title: Dark Oil
Description:
Dark Oil - Evanescent styling oil that replenishes from the inside out to smoothen the cuticle and add body, then disappears from hair thanks to the new DiffusX Technology. Formulated with sandalwood, cedarwood, and argan oil. With hair protection against UV damage. 
Disappears in seconds, smooths up to 48 hours.

Title: Versatile Oil Treatment
Description:
Discover the exceptional effect of Goldwell Elixir Versatile Oil Treatment to transform every hair type into luxuriously cared-for hair. 
Goldwell Elixir Versatile Oil Treatment is immediately absorbed into the hair for a light, smooth feeling and has a weightless formula for all hair types. Its clear formula will not effect existing hair color.

Title: Go Green Curl Detangler
Description: Meet the Wet Brush® Go Green™ Curl Detangler - An innovative brush that helps hair stay strong and healthy! The Go Green™ Curl Detangler gently loosens knots, on wet or dry hair, without pulling or snagging. Brush body made from 56% plant based plastic. Specifically designed for Curly Hair, the brush fingers and bristles adjust to your curl type and texture to allow ultimate flexibility when detangling.

Title: Made For Curls 3-in-1 Universal Diffuser
Description: Our Made For Curls™ 3-in-1 Universal Diffuser has three unique attachments that allow you to customize your curl look. Specifically designed for all curl types, this diffuser provides concentrated heat that accelerates drying time and helps prevent frizz. Whether it's a soft air-dry, more definition, or added volume that you're looking for, this multi-functional diffuser helps you create the curl styles you want on all lengths and hair textures. The universal size is compatible with most dryers. Made from high temperature resistant silicone and nylon material.

Title: NuWave Rollers - 24 Count
Description:
Introducing a new innovation in curling tools. Goldwell NuWave Rollers and NuWave Boards are the outcome of an intensive collaboration between engineers and stylists from Germany and Japan. These innovative tools are designed to create effortless waves that last up to 3 months with the NuWave Service, but can be used outside of the service as well.
NuWave Rollers sets hair strands into shape (set of 24)

Title: Bye Bye Build - Up Exfoliating Scalp Brush For Curls
Description: Transform your cleansing products into a scalp treatment and remove build-up, excess oils, and flakes for stronger, healthier curls.

Title: BaByliss Pro Self Gripping Magic Rollers - 12 Count
Description: -Self gripping magic" rollers
new

Title: Dark Oil Lightweight Mask-16.9 oz
Description:
Sebastian Professional introduces its new Dark Oil Line Extension for 3x smoother* hair with NEW lightweight Dark Oil products.
 *Shampoo, mask and Dark Oil vs non-conditioning shampoo. The Sebastian Dark Oil Lightweight Mask nourishes the hair while keeping the hair''s natural body and leaving it feeling silky and looking shiny.

Create your own cocktailing recipes for endless possibilities with Sebastian Professional’s most loved oil, Dark Oil, Lightweight Shampoo, Lightweight Conditioner, Lightweight Mask, and Fragrant Mist. #RulesDon’tApply

Title: Dark Oil Lightweight Mask-5.07 oz
Description:
Sebastian Professional introduces its new Dark Oil Line Extension for 3x smoother* hair with NEW lightweight Dark Oil products.
 *Shampoo, mask and Dark Oil vs non-conditioning shampoo. The Sebastian Dark Oil Lightweight Mask nourishes the hair while keeping the hair''s natural body and leaving it feeling silky and looking shiny.

Create your own cocktailing recipes for endless possibilities with Sebastian Professional’s most loved oil, Dark Oil, Lightweight Shampoo, Lightweight Conditioner, Lightweight Mask, and Fragrant Mist. #RulesDon’tApply

Title: Fragrance-Free & Hypoallergenic No-Poo Original
Description:
THE OG — FRAGRANCE-FREE EDITION
Fragrance-free and hypoallergenic, this gentle, non-lathering cleanser is formulated for those with sensitivities to fragrance, essential oils, dyes, or gluten. The rich moisture preserving blend will leave dry, medium to coarse curls shiny, bouncy and hydrated.

Title: Advanced Climate Control Frizz - Fighting Hydrating Mask
Description: Let your curl pattern thrive and stop frizz before it starts. This defining and strengthening formula is packed with mango seed butter and castor oil. Vitamin E protects against heat and UV damage. The Anti-Frizz Nano Technologyᵀᴹ seals in moisture to lock out humidity​ for hydrated, frizz-free curls. Cruelty-free. Color and keratin safe. Free of sulfates, parabens, phthalates, paraffin, MIT.

Title: Ultra-Nourishing Intense Hydrating Hair Mask
Description: A deep conditioning treatment that restores essential moisture to dry, damaged, or over-processed curls.

Title: Salon Care Orchid Large Curved Perm Rods 12 Pack
Description: Salon Care Large Curved Perm Rods give hair large, full curls, and add body. These perm rods are durable, long-lasting, and feature flow-thru vents to allow for better heat saturation.

Title: Kerasilk Revitalize Redensifying Serum
Description:
The Kerasilk Revitalize Redensifying Serum combats key signs of an aging scalp by protecting and restoring hair and skin to its most youthful, radiant appearance. Efficiently prevents from hereditary hair loss, strengthens the roots and redensifies the hair for long-lasting thicker, denser hair.

The Kerasilk Revitalize range by Goldwell is a unique scalp and hair rejuvenating routine specifically designed to combat the key signs of scalp aging. All Kerasilk Revitalize products are enriched with ECTOIN®, one of nature’s most powerful protectors that effectively shields the scalp from oxidative stress. Inspired by the key elements of facial skin care, the Revitalize system creates a “facial” for both scalp and hair. It’s two segments — Redensifying and Nourishing — restore your scalp’s health to reveal more youthful-looking hair.

Title: BaByliss Pro Velcro 32mm Rollers - 12 Count
Description: undefined

Title: BaByliss Pro Magic Rollers 20mm - 12 Count
Description: undefined

Title: ColorMotion+ Pre-Color Scalp Protecting Lotion
Description:
While modern hair colors are gentle to the scalp, a few clients suffer from scalp discomfort during the coloring process. This Scalp Protecting Lotion is the perfect add-on service for these clients. Helps to protect from potential discomfort. Easy and quick to use before color application. Does not impact the color development. Use Pre-Coloration.

Wella Professionals introduces ColorMotion+, the ultimate partner to Wella Color! ColorMotion+ unites the best of our care technologies, providing much more than only color protection. Now you can give your clients the power of three for strength in colored hair: color protection, vibrant shine, and stronger hair. For up to 8 weeks of color protection(when using structure+ mask).

Title: Bionik Scalp & Skin Serum
Description: Unflattering, flaky scalp and skin go boom with this explosive man tonic. Bionik Scalp & Skin Serum incorporates Menthol and Eucalyptus to extinguish excess sebum and help increase stimulation while encouraging healthy skin and scalp.

Title: Made for Curls Customizable Detangler
Description: This patented customizable brush is designed to detangle wet and dry curls and handle all of your styling needs. Add or remove bristle rows to create the perfect amount of tension for your unique curl pattern. Its extra-long, no-slip grip handle and easy-glide bristles help to detangle with comfort and ease.

Title: TameFrizz Style Primer-5 fl oz
Description:
NEW KMS Style Primers allow the stylist and the client to better control the style creation process. It’s a quick service that improves hair structure to build a lasting style- foundation, with results that last up to 7 washes*. TameFrizz Style Primer deeply nourishes and smooths unruly, frizzy hair. Intensely restores stressed hair — for better control and detangling.
*When used with Core Reset Spray.

Title: TameFrizz Style Primer-2.5 fl oz
Description:
NEW KMS Style Primers allow the stylist and the client to better control the style creation process. It’s a quick service that improves hair structure to build a lasting style- foundation, with results that last up to 7 washes*. TameFrizz Style Primer deeply nourishes and smooths unruly, frizzy hair. Intensely restores stressed hair — for better control and detangling.
*When used with Core Reset Spray.

Title: Double Prong Comb Detangler
Description: With its unique double-tooth configuration, this comb is optimally designed to detangle curls without disrupting curl pattern, causing frizz or damaging hair.

Title: Fragrance-Free & Hypoallergenic One Condition Original
Description:
RICH, CREAMY & FRAGRANCE-FREE
Fragrance-free and hypoallergenic, this gentle, rich cream conditioner is formulated for those with sensitivities to fragrance, essential oils, dyes, or gluten. The moisture preserving blend helps fight tangles, control frizz and leave dry, medium to coarse curls feeling nourished, soft and bouncy.

Title: Nutricurls Deep Treatment Mask
Description: Nourish and nurture your unique curls with Wella Professionals’ Nutricurls Mask for Waves and Curls; a curl-enhancing, deep conditioning treatment that helps to eliminate unsightly frizz for lusciously big and bouncy curls and waves. Nutricurls gives intense moisture and nutrients to textured hair types, the hair mask harnesses the powers of Nourish-In Complex, which comprises Wheat Bran extract, Jojoba oil, vitamin E and proteins to redefine rings, tame frizz, seal in nourishment and shield against humidity.

Title: Curl Balm-5 fl. oz.
Description:
A multi-benefit curl balm infused with Biomimetic Silk & Carnauba Wax. Our 100% vegan* formula bundles and activates curls while providing the perfect level of moisture for defined, bouncier curls and long-lasting control for up to 72 h.

*no animal-derived ingredients.

Title: Curl Balm-1.6 fl. oz.
Description:
A multi-benefit curl balm infused with Biomimetic Silk & Carnauba Wax. Our 100% vegan* formula bundles and activates curls while providing the perfect level of moisture for defined, bouncier curls and long-lasting control for up to 72 h.

*no animal-derived ingredients.

Title: CHI Lava Volcanic Ceramic Hairstyling Iron - 1 Inch
Description:
Sourced from some of the most effective heat conducting materials found on earth, the 
CHI Lava Volcanic Ceramic Hairstyling Iron 
 combines volcanic lava with the power of CHI ceramic creating smooth, sleek results without the damaging effects of high-heat styling. This innovative combination of elements offers an incredibly smooth styling surface for effortless glide-ability on unruly and coarse hair textures. Heat damage is reduced by the ability to use lower temperature settings than traditional heat styling. With increased durability, lightweight design and extended plate length creating salon quality styles is easier than ever before.

Title: BaByliss Pro Self Gripping Magic Rollers - 6 Pack
Description:
-Brown velcro rollers
-6 per bag
-55 mm

Title: Str8 Anti-Frizz/Anti-Curl Lotion
Description: Str8 Anti-Frizz and Anti-Curl Lotion is a light, greaseless styling lotion that eliminates frizz and temporarily straightens hair. Contains Thermplex, a unique combination of ingredients that activates with the heat of a blow-dryer to alter internal curl memory and block the effects of humidity for up to 24 hours.

Title: Protective Oil Treatment - Deepshine Oil-4 fl oz
Description: Deepshine Oil Protective Oil Treatment is a marine mineral-enriched argan oil treatment that smoothes the cuticle, eliminates frizz, and improves elasticity and hydration, leaving hair soft, silky and manageable. This lightweight, alcohol-free formula imparts brilliant shine, while advanced marine therapy infuses the hair with superior condition, renewing the natural integrity of the hair. Used as a styling or finishing product, Deepshine Oil Protective Oil Treatment helps seal the cuticle, prevents color fading with subsequent shampoos, and protects against damage caused by chemicals, excessive heat from thermal styling, and environmental factors. It's perfect for all hair types.

Title: Silis Silk Straightening System - Strong
Description: A highly protective, formaldehyde-free straightening system that helps hair acquire new texture with a short processing time. It removes frizz, leaving hair sleek, smooth, and more manageable. Silis allows you to create texture by refining natural curl through relaxing, curl reduction and redirection of natural growth patterns. Silis has a lower pH than conventional relaxers, allowing you to create stunning effects while preserving the integrity of the hair.

Title: Dualsenses Curls & Waves Duo
Description:
Dualsenses Curls & Waves Hydrating Shampoo:
Shampoo for curly and wavy hair blended with microPROtec complex and milk protein. Instantly cleanses & hydrates without drying out the hair. For defined and weightless bounce. As gentle as water, the unique FadeStopFormula minimizes color fading with every use.
Dualsenses Curls & Waves Hydrating Conditioner:
Conditioner for curly and wavy hair blended with microPROtec complex and milk protein. This lightweight formula instantly hydrates, detangles and softens without adding weight.

Title: Opti.Smooth Resistant Pro-Keratin Kit
Description: NEW and Improved! Opti.Smooth Kit - Resistant - now with Pro-Keratin for Extra Conditioning

Title: Light Defining Gel-3 oz
Description: A lightweight, moisturizing curl defining gel for maximum frizz prevention that holds without feeling stiff or sticky.

Title: Light Defining Gel-12 oz
Description: A lightweight, moisturizing curl defining gel for maximum frizz prevention that holds without feeling stiff or sticky.

Title: Light Defining Gel-32 oz
Description: A lightweight, moisturizing curl defining gel for maximum frizz prevention that holds without feeling stiff or sticky.

Title: BaByliss Pro Velcro Rollers 6 Pack - Purple
Description: undefined

Title: Coconut Milk Moisture Therapy Leave-in Serum
Description:
Made with concentrated superfoods, supplement, protein, and oil, the Coconut Milk Weightless Moisture Leave-In Hair Serum hydrates and nourishes while revitalizing dry, brittle hair. BCL Superfoods Collection formulas meet the Whole Foods standards which prohibit use of over 100+ ingredients. BCL Hair care formulas are made with Certified Organic oils, extracts and botanicals to insure the purest and most efficacious ingredients.

Clean at Cosmo Prof
Products featuring Cosmo Prof’s Clean logo are free from: Sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, mineral oil,  coal tar, hydroquinone, and triclocarban.

Title: Mist-er Right Dream Curl Refresher
Description:
This curl and scalp refresher infused with a soothing, lavender scent helps to revive curls and calm frizz in between wash-days. Mist-er Right will also reactivate your DevaCurl stylers previously applied to curls – great secret weapon when you’re not in the mood to get your hair wet.



 .

Title: BaByliss Pro Magic Rollers 40mm - 6 Count
Description: undefined

Title: Thick Hair Paddle Detangler
Description: Its large paddle size covers an increased surface area, while the unique bristle pattern gently detangles even the densest curls without pulling, snagging, or breaking.

Title: Morphosis Scalp Exfoliate
Description: Delicate pearls of pure jojoba wax, immersed in a soft emulsion, remove deposits of sebum, dandruff, dead cells and fixative products. Its application stimulates surface blood circulation and ensures the scalp quickly absorbs the active ingredients within the Morphosis treatments. Can be used by all hair types to remove product build-up and keep scalp clean and fresh.

Title: DevaDryer and DevaFuser Combo
Description: All new DevaDryer and Devafuser. The ultimate combo your curls have been waiting for.

Title: No-Comb Detangling Spray
Description: DevaCurl No-Comb Detangling Spray is a conditioning leave-in detangler that gently and instantly untangles hair, while leaving curls shiny, soft and frizz free. With No-Comb Detangling Spray, fingers slip and glide right through the hair, without breakage or disturbing curl formation.

Title: Drying Trio
Description:
DevaFuser:
New and improved durable DevaFuser with ceramic technology, now withstands high heat and dries curls quickly while preserving hair's natural moisture and luster with zero frizz. The patented DevaFuser design enhances your natural curls, dries curly hair faster than traditional diffusers, while creating body and touchable volume. This unique, universal diffuser deliver 360°F airflow to completely surround curls even at your roots.

Who's It For?
Wavy or curly hair that wants enhanced definition, reduced frizz and shortened drying time.

What Does It Do?

	Unlike most diffusers, the DevaFuser enhances the appearance of natural curls by creating both definition and volume. Usually you have to sacrifice one for the other.
	Its unique shape completely surrounds curls, delivering airflow even at your roots.
	Created with a ceramic inner core to preserve hair's natural moisture and luster.
	This diffuser is designed to fit most dryers.

DevaFast Dry Spray:
Speed up your air-dry & diffusing time up to 66%! With our fast-forward blend, this lightweight dry accelerating spray helps accelerate the rate at which water evaporates from the hair's surface without drying out curls and has a fast-absorbing finish.
FlexFactor Curl Protection & Retention Primer:
New for ultimate Curl Flexibility. Our formulas are dermatologist co-developed, backed by science and stylist approved.

Flex your style from blowouts to braids to twist outs and back to your natural texture—while reducing damage by up to 55%! This heat and UV protective lightweight formula with the Curl Memory Complex helps all curl types spring back to life and helps prevent damage from brushing, friction, manipulation, and heat up to 450 degrees.

Title: No. 4P Blonde Enhancer Toning Shampoo
Description: Our best-selling shampoo, is now formulated to celebrate the beauty of blonde.  The newest Bond Maintenance Shampoo deposits just the right amount of purple to tone down the brassiness of any blonde. Whether your blonde comes naturally or from your stylist, root to tip or balayage, even if you're proudly grey - 4-P shampoo will help keep your color cool.

Title: Bust Your Brass Intense Repair Mask
Description:
A salon service in a jar. this ultra-luxe hair mask provides superior toning while strengthening, repairing, and hydrating for bright, healthy blonde.

WHO IT''S FOR
all blondes, silvers + grays are welcome!

WHY IT''S SPECIAL
bring blonde back to life. packed with bond cure technology, plant butters, vegan protein, and ultra-violet pigments-- for your strongest + brightest mane yet!

Title: Sheer Silver Beauty Bag
Description:
Sheer Silver Shampoo:
A sulphate and paraben free shampoo for blonde and dark hair with violet pigment and blackberry extract that neutralizes golden shades, brings shine and strength to the hair structure.
Sheer Silver Conditioner:
A detangling conditioner for blonde hair that softens, moisturizes and strengthens your hair. Violet pigment and blackberry extract neutralizes golden shades and adds shine. The Sheer Silver Conditioner has a fresh scent of Orange and Grapefruit. Colour Guard Complex preserves the colour by protecting your hair from UV radiation and free radicals.
Sheer Silver Masque:
A gentle treatment for blonde hair that moisturizes nourishes and gives a silky soft result. Blackberry extract brings shine and luster to the hair. Colour Guard Complex protect hair and reduce the color loss associated with washing, heat styling, UV rays and free radicals.

Title: Brass Kicker Violet Color Additive Liquid Color-Lightest Natural
Description:
Blonde Brightness – Lighten, Tone and Kick Brass
Wella Professional introduces 5 new Permanent Liquid Toners and 1 customizable Brass Kicker from Blondor – the Stylist Choice Winner for lightening*.  A versatile, non-progressive color that removes unwanted tones after any lightening service without the risk of over depositing. No Yellow, No Orange, Just Beautiful Brass Kicking Results! 
* THREE-TIME BEAUTY LAUNCHPAD READER’S CHOICE AWARD WINNER
Brass Kicker
A violet additive that must be mixed with Blondor Permanent Liquid Toners. Neutralizes underlying pigments for an extra cool kick and to minimize warm tones to achieve the perfect blonde.
Blondor Permanent Liquid Toners
Designed to neutralize unwanted warmth for perfect blonde results every time.

Title: So Silver Triple Power Toning Hair Mask
Description:
Total Results So Silver Deep Conditioning Toning Hair Mask thinks like a toner and conditions like a deep treatment, customizable to enhance all blonde hair and grey hair to a cool toned finish.
Take your toning to the next level with the So Silver Triple Power Mask. Brighten and banish unwanted yellow tones in blonde hair, add beautiful silver tones to platinum hair, or turn your grey into a stunning silver hair. Spectacular conditioning will leave hair feeling silky smooth and progressive technology gives the option to tone to your desired effect.

Title: Blonde Therapy Dual Therapy Treatment
Description: Blonde Therapy Dual Therapy Treatment is Step 2 in Redavid's Blonde Therapy System for client's at home system.  The Blonde Therapy Dual Therapy Treatment takes on conditioning, toning, and softening blonde/silver treated hair.

Title: Dualsenses Silver 60 Second Treatment
Description: Regenerate and restore your hair with the Goldwell Dualsenses Silver 60sec Treatment. Providing instantly cooler-toned hair, this mask features Goldwell's Luminescine technology that transforms non-visible UV light into visible light for magnificent brilliance.

Title: Total Results Unbreak My Blonde Leave-In Treatment
Description: Includes: Reviving Leave-in Treatment, Unbreak My Blonde Shampoo & Conditioner, Unbreak My Blonde Bleach Finder Rinse

Title: Eclectic - 9CT Cool Anti-Yellow Toner-7NE Medium Blonde
Description: Framcolor® Eclectic offers a demi-permanent Ammonia free, PPD free, and fragrance free color that won’t alter the structure of the hair and ensures an intense and lasting shade. Provides up to 100% gray coverage! It is ideal for dynamic, versatile and particularly delicate colorings.

Title: Bed Head Serial Blonde Shampoo, Conditioner Duo
Description: SERIAL BLONDE™ for your best blonde. Transform the look of over-processed and chemically treated hair! The Serial Blonde™ system helps to revive and care for hair.

Title: System 3 Scalp Treatment-3.4 fl oz
Description: A volumizing leave-in treatment that contains antioxidants and botanicals that help provide a refreshed scalp environment for normal to thin-looking hair. For normal to thin-looking, fine, chemically treated hair.

Title: System 3 Scalp Treatment-6.8 fl oz
Description: A volumizing leave-in treatment that contains antioxidants and botanicals that help provide a refreshed scalp environment for normal to thin-looking hair. For normal to thin-looking, fine, chemically treated hair.

Title: BosRevive Color Safe Thickening Treatment
Description: BosRevive Leave-In Thickening Treatment is uniquely formulated for those who want to help restore visibly thinning hair. Designed to help inhibit DHT, this lightweight, foaming, alcohol-free intensive treatment may aid in rejuvenating the scalp and help support the growth of stronger, healthier hair.  Pumpkin Seed Extract and Soy Proteins, natural DHT-blockers, combine with Apple Stem Cell Extract and Panthenol to help reduce scalp inflammation, increase scalp circulation and strengthen the hair to promote healthy hair growth.  May assist in thickening hair, reconditioning fragile hair and provide instant volume.

Title: BosRevive Non Color-Treated Hair Thickening Treatment
Description: BosRevive Leave-In Thickening Treatment is uniquely formulated for those who want to help restore visibly thinning hair. Designed to help inhibit DHT, this lightweight, foaming, alcohol-free intensive treatment may aid in rejuvenating the scalp and help support the growth of stronger, healthier hair.  Pumpkin Seed Extract and Soy Proteins, natural DHT-Blockers, combine with Apple Stem Cell Extract and Panthenol to help reduce scalp inflammation, increase scalp circulation and strengthen the hair to promote healthy hair growth.  May assist in thickening hair, reconditioning fragile hair and provide instant volume.

Title: BosVolumize Volumizing & Thickening Nourishing Leave-In
Description: BosVolumize Volumizing & Thickening Nourishing Leave-In helps create thicker, fuller-looking hair by adding weightless volume while helping to detangle wet hair after shampooing. Color-safe formula lightly conditions hair strands without weighing the hair down.  Apple Stem Cell Extract helps to stimulate hair follicles while Pentapeptides help strengthen and nourish hair strands.  Offers soft hold to blow dried styles.

Title: BosVolumize Hair Thickening Fibers-Black
Description: BosVolumize Hair Thickening Fibers naturally bond to existing hair with keratin fibers that blend and cover thinning and low density areas.  Because our own hair is made of Keratin and naturally holds a positive charge, BosleyMD Hair Thickening Fibers are designed to mimic our own human hair but with a negative charge.  Therefore, when negatively-charged, lightweight, easily blended BosleyMD Fibers come in contact with our positively-charged hair, it creates a static-cling effect, naturally binding to the hair shaft creating instantly thicker, fuller looking hair.

Title: System 3 Kit
Description:
System 3 leaves hair thicker, denser-looking and with a vibrant color.
System 3 is formulated to remove follicle-clogging sebum, fatty acids and environmental residues, while amplifying hair texture, providing moisture balance and color protection.

Cleanser Shampoo:
-Helps to remove follicle-clogging sebum, fatty acids and environmental residues from scalp and hair. 
Scalp Therapy Revitalizing Conditioner:
-Helps to provide hair resilience and control moisture balance.
Scalp & Hair Treatment:
-Helps to provide hair resilience and control moisture balance.

Title: Water-Based Thickening Hair Serum
Description:
Nourishing water based light weight hair serum for increased density, thickness, and volume.

Promotes thicker, fuller hair to increase density, thickness & volume. Strengthens hair shaft and prevents breakage. Reduces shedding. Strengthens follicle. Available in water-based formula for low density hair or oil-based for textured hair. Thicker, fuller, more luxurious hair.

Apply to patchy spots on scalp. Starts working in as little as 6 weeks. See visible results in 9 months to one year.

Water-based:

Aloe barbadensis leaf juice promotes hair growth and helps to remove the dead skin which clogs the pores of the scalp.
Trifolium pratense flower extract reduces scalp inflammation that accelerate hair fall.
Pisum sativum (pea) sprout extract helps shorten the telogen phase of the hair, helping to strengthen hair follicle stem cells.

Title: Redensifying Scalp Serum
Description:
A highly effective serum infused with Biomimetic Silk, Ectoin & T-Flavanone. Our 100% vegan* formula protects from hereditary hair loss, strengthens the roots and redensifies for long-lasting thicker and denser hair.

*no animal-derived ingredients.

Title: System 5 Scalp Treatment
Description: A moisturizing leave-on treatment that contains antioxidants and botanicals that help provide a refreshed scalp environment for normal to thin-looking, medium to coarse, natural/chemically treated hair.

Title: Women's Recover Intro
Description:
Recover Shampoo & Conditioning System for Women:
Increase your hair growth with this travel kit duo! Actiiv's Recover line is a 2-step, shampoo-based hair treatment system for men and women experiencing hair loss or wanting to target and combat hair loss early. Using the science of nutraceuticals (natural, plant-based compounds), our Recover products are able to target hair loss and thinning at the source. Our Recover line is a simple shampoo and conditioning process that only needs to be used every other day for 5 minutes in the shower!

Recover Thickening Shampoo Treatment for Women:
Recover Thickening Cleansing Treatment for women. Target hair loss and hair repair in men and women using new biotanical technology for maintaining and improving hair density and health. Over time using Actiiv Scalp and Hair show increased hydration and skin and scalp health. Use only 3 times a week, 5 minutes per use.

Recover Thickening Conditioner:
Developed from the science of nutraceuticals, Actiiv Recover Thickening conditioner is the second step in the Actiiv Recover Line. This is a non-daily, unisex conditioner to be used after the Recover Thickening Treatment.

Optimizing scalp health leads hair to feel fuller, look thicker, and perform better as if re-established to a more luxurious, youthful, healthier head of hair. After beginning Actiiv Thickening Cleansing Treatment one can expect less hair damage, and thicker, fuller feeling hair starting in as little as 2-6 weeks. Actiiv Recover Thickening Cleansing Treatments for Men and Women are for noticeably thinning hair and Excessive hair breakage.

Women's Recover Kit Includes:


	(3) Recover Shampoo & Conditioning System for Women.
	(3) Recover Thickening Shampoo Treatment for Women - 7 fl. oz.
	(3) Recover Thickening Conditioner - 7 fl. oz.

Title: Men's Recover Intro

Actiiv's Recover line is a 2-step, shampoo-based hair treatment system for men and women experiencing hair loss or wanting to target and combat hair loss early. Using the science of nutraceuticals (natural, plant-based compounds), our Recover products are able to target hair loss and thinning at the source. Our Recover line is a simple shampoo and conditioning process that only needs to be used every other day for 5 minutes in the shower!

Developed from the science of nutraceuticals, Actiiv Recover Thickening conditioner is the second step in the Actiiv Recover Line. This is a non-daily, unisex conditioner to be used after the Recover Thickening Treatment.

Title: System 1 Duo
Description: undefined

Title: Hair Veil Powder Hair Filler-Light Blonde
Description:
Hair Veil powder hair filler gives the appearance of a thicker, richer head of hair to anyone looking to conceal exposed scalp and add depth to their thin or fine hair. 

Developed with a fade proof, transfer proof formula, Hair Veil is designed to stay on the scalp eliminating shiny spots and exposed scalp. The special diagonal tail brush, created by stylists, allows you to part the hair with one side and apply hair filler with the other side of the brush. 

Hair Veil is a water resistant formula that will not run or bleed until you shampoo it out making it very convenient for all women and men suffering from thinning hair.

Hair Veil powder hair filler gives the appearance of a thicker, richer head of hair to anyone looking to conceal exposed scalp and add depth to their thin or fine hair. 

Developed with a fade proof, transfer proof formula, Hair Veil is designed to stay on the scalp eliminating shiny spots and exposed scalp. The special diagonal tail brush, created by stylists, allows you to part the hair with one side and apply hair filler with the other side of the brush. 

Hair Veil is a water resistant formula that will not run or bleed until you shampoo it out making it very convenient for all women and men suffering from thinning hair.

Title: Defense SPF 30 Hair, Scalp & Skin Spray
Description: Give your scalp and hair consistent protection from the sun using Actiiv's SPF 30 Hair + Scalp Defense Spray. We all know how damaging UVA/UVB rays can be to our skin, but our scalps are usually left unprotected. This SPF scalp spray was formulated to give optimal protection to those often forgotten-about areas, as well as keep your scalp healthy to encourage thicker, fuller hair growth. It also helps to protect your hair against color fading, discoloration and damage from the sun and free radicals.

Exfoliating dead, flaky skin allows younger skin cells to surface, and follicles to become unclogged and clean,  providing a healthier environment for new hair to grow.

Title: Healthy Hair Strengthening Masque
Description: Healthy Hair Strengthening Masque is a revitalizing deep conditioning masque that nourishes and strengthens. Provides strength and volume to limp, damaged, or weak hair. Biotin and vegetable proteins strengthen, while chamomile and jojoba extract help to condition the hair. Strengthening Masque contains LifeXtend complex to help nourish hair and ColorKeeper complex to help prolong and protect color. For use on frequent or over chemically processed and thermal damaged hair. Also for hair that is fragile, or is fine and thinning.

Title: No. 3 Hair Perfector - Take Home
Description:
A weekly at-home treatment, not a conditioner, that reduces breakage and visibly strengthens hair, improving its look and feel. Clients can benefit from this global bestseller whether or not they receive chemical services.

Key benefits:
- Repairs damaged and compromised hair
- Strengthens and protects hair structure
- Restores healthy appearance and texture

PH Balance: 3.5-5

Title: Broad Spectrum Chelating Treatment
Description:
What it is: A pro-only, cortex-deep purifying treatment that removes buildup to elevate all salon service results.

What it does: 
OLAPLEX Broad Spectrum Chelating Treatment purifies hair down to the cortex to remove product buildup, oil, hard water minerals, chlorine, heavy metals, pollutants, medications, and discoloring iron and copper deposits–all without stripping hair of its moisture and essential proteins. The powerful, non-sudsing Broad Spectrum Chelating Blend with Vitamin C-rich Kakadu Plum Extract creates a clean slate to enhance the results of other chemical services that can be compromised by buildup, like keratin treatments, color, and perms. OLAPLEX Bond Building Technology™ maintains strong hair bonds during treatment so hair looks and feels healthier after chelation.

The no-mix formula eliminates prep time and leftovers. No wasted time or product. Heat is optional. Adding heat will accelerate and intensify chelating effects for clients who need it.

Description:
Silkening Power Infusion is a powerful 60-second, rinse-out treatment that repairs and silkens color-treated hair:

- Penetrates deeply to strengthen hair repair damage
- Locks in Color molecules for less fading and longer lasting results
- Amazing Shine

Title: Food For Soft Rich Hydrating Treatment Mask
Description:
Rich Hydrating Treatment Mask infused with avocado oil + hyaluronic acid, replenishes hydration in even the driest & most porous hair, making it ideal for every wash.

Food For Soft is a professional hydrating haircare range that targets dry hair and instantly transforms it for touchable soft results. Food For Soft is suitable for all dry, porous hair types and textures. It is infused with avocado oil, which can add lightweight moisture, and hyaluronic acid, a known humectant that provides moisture and can retain a balance of lipids and proteins.

Food For Soft is suitable for color-treated hair and can be used from that point on and at home between coloring appointments.

Food For Soft can be used on 100% human hair extensions in which the cuticle has not been altered from its original state prior to purchase. Apply product to the human hair portion of the weft only avoiding any points of adhesion.

Title: Night Density Rescue
Description:
Nioxin introduces Night Density Rescue, the brand's first night treatment clinically proven to promote hair density* inspired by Nioxin's skin care approach to hair care and the body's nightly regeneration cycles, Nioxin scientists have developed this night time scalp surface treatment with Nioxydine24 technology.
Thin-looking hair can be impacted by scalp surface oxidation. Revolutionary Nioxydine24 contains powerful antioxidants including Vitamin E Acetate, Ginger Root Extract, Caffeine, and Biotin that target and neutralize oxidative damage at the scalp surface.
Designed with a soothing fragrance for night time use, it leaves no residue on the pillow and is suitable for all hair types.

* In three months

Oil-based:

Ricinus communis (castor) seed oil increases blood flow to the scalp, which promotes healthier hair.
Castor oil is high in linoleic acid and is used for its anti-fungal and anti-hair loss capabilities.
Caprylic/capric triglyceride helps to increase the softness or smoothness of hair, reduce tangles and surface roughness.

Description: Clay Matte Pomade creates a touchable medium hold with a matte finish and is used to manipulate the hair into any style.

Title: Clay Matte Pomade-4 fl oz
Description: Clay Matte Pomade creates a touchable medium hold with a matte finish and is used to manipulate the hair into any style.

Title: Matte Texture Powder
Description: Matte Texture Powder is a weightless, texturizing powder that adds volume & thickness to hair and is suitable for all hair types.

Title: Grooming Tonic
Description: Grooming Tonic creates long lasting, natural feeling hold for all hair types. Perfect for blow-drying, and protects hair from all types of thermal styling. T4 Tonic Blend of Witch Hazel, Nettle Leaf, Rosemary and Horsetail Root is ideal for all hair types and frequent use.

Title: Moisturizing Hand Cream
Description: Woody's moisturizing hand cream features a moisturizing trifecta of shea butter, avocado oil and olive oil to hydrate, soften and soothe skin all day. It intense conditioning care restores moisture to rough, cracked, over washed hands to deliver rapid relief from dryness and itching. Fast absorbing, non greasy leaves hands smooth, nourished and protected against the elements.

Title: Hair Tonic
Description: Hair Tonic was modeled after a classic barber tonic, right down to its fragrance, and is an extremely versatile product. T4 Tonic Blend of Witch Hazel, Nettle Leaf, Rosemary and Horsetail Root is ideal for all hair types and frequent use.

Title: Black Kodiak Beard Balm
Description: Black Kodiak Beard Balm (previously Black Cognac). This double duty wonder product acts as a balm and pomade in one, busting a smooth move on your beard, smoothing strands into place, and keeping it at attention for whatever life throws your way.

Title: Matte Styling Paste
Description: Matte Styling Paste has a medium, pliable hold for various lengths of hair, adding texture and increased definition. Leaves hair with a matte finish and is water soluble for easy rinsing.

Title: Pink Heavy Grease Pomade-4 oz
Description: Pink Pomade Grease, formulated with Beeswax, allows product to glide through the hair without clumping, while encouraging moisture retention. Pink Pomade Grease has a unique formula that provides excellent hold perfect for the thickest and curliest of hair.

Title: Pink Heavy Grease Pomade-1.3 oz
Description: Pink Pomade Grease, formulated with Beeswax, allows product to glide through the hair without clumping, while encouraging moisture retention. Pink Pomade Grease has a unique formula that provides excellent hold perfect for the thickest and curliest of hair.

Title: Heavy Hold Pomade
Description: High hold and high shine. Never flakes, and washes out with water.

Description: undefined

Title: Alpha Male Beard, Hair, & Tattoo Oil
Description: Gib did it again! Condition, moisturize and soften the beard, hair and skin with this amazing, multi-use oil! This signature oil features our original blend of Olive, Argan, Sunflower Seed, Passion Fruit and Copaiba Balsam oils as well as the antioxidant benefits from Acai oil. Yeah, thats alpha.

Title: Grooming Cream
Description: Grooming Cream provides a light hold and works well for all hair types, especially finer hair where added texture or increased definition is desired. Tames hair while leaving a low shine finish.

Title: Energizing Beard Wash
Description:
Woodys Beard Wash cleanses and conditions skin and facial hair. 
With our unique blend of herbs and vitamins in a sulfate free base, Woody's Energizing Beard Wash cleanses and conditions skin and facial hair. Vitamin E, B5 and Aloe Vera to promote shine and help combat dry skin. Chamomile and Calendula for their unique properties of hydration and moisturization.

Title: Beard Foam
Description: Beard Foam is a patent-pending, leave-in beard conditioner. Deodorizes your beard and absorbs quickly helping to tame and control. Available in wood & spice and original scent.

Title: Shave Lather
Description: Woody's Shave Lather is a moisturizing shave cream.

Title: Fiber Pomade-1.3 oz

Title: Fiber Pomade-4 oz
Description: Fiber Pomade creates textured definition with a firm but pliable hold and low shine finish.

Title: Handsum Man Salve
Description: A GIBS guy reaches for a salve that works as hard as he does. Like your favorite pair of work gloves, Handsum Man Salve erects a barrier of protection and moisture, repaving and repairing dry, cracked skin and digits with a blend of hemp, safflower, sapote and karanja oils. Finally, coconut oil and beeswax help to protect against the workingman’s elements. Just because you punch a clock doesn’t mean your hands have to take a beating.

Title: Beard Oil
Description: Woody's takes the traditional Beard Oil and makes it entirely new by combining essential oils in a unique blend for the ultimate control and shine. Our special blend of these Macadamia, Moringa and Kukui Nut, oils adds shine as they help to prevent dry, itchy skin. Woody's special formula helps to soothe, moisturize and invigorate skin and facial hair as it delivers the nutrients your skin and facial hair needs.

Title: Voodoo Prince Beard, Hair & Tattoo Oil
Description: Tame that mane with GIBS Beard, Hair & Tattoo Oils. Olive and Argan oils soften, while sunflower oil strengthens and protects your beard from all the manly things you do. These are beard oils with a bonus: Our natural argan, olive and sunflower oil blend busts the same smooth moves on your hair, adding polish, shine and style to neglected mops. It’s also a fantastic tattoo treatment; ink suddenly comes to life against super-conditioned skin.

Title: Shave Relief Balm
Description: Soothing post shave balm Instantly restores moisture balance as it soothes and calms the skin. The cool blast leaves the skin refreshed and the face ready for what comes next. Our light, non-greasy Soothing Post Shave Balm is the perfect finish to the perfect shave.

Title: After Shave Tonic
Description: Make the  morning the best part of your day by starting out with a splash of Woody's After Shave Tonic. Soothe and calm skin with this moisture restoring post shave tonic.

Title: Wood & Spice Beard Balm
Description: Beard Balm contains Shea Butter and Argan Oil to instantly make your beard appear thicker and keep it moisturized through the day. Available in wood & spice and original scent.

Title: Clean & Fresh Beard Serum
Description: Beard Serum - Clean & Fresh is a perfect blend of moisturizers for a weightless oil that will not weigh the beard down leaving it with a natural, non-greasy finish.

Title: BioFuel Conditioning for Beard & Hair
Description: A bearded guy has big needs when it comes to keeping hydrated. Top it off and shower down with BioFuel, basically liquid butter for your beard and hair. Fortified with strengthening Biotin and Moisturizing Sapote Oil and Mango Butter, BioFuel conditions and softens crisp face fur into lovable, stroke-able submission. Dragon's Blood Extract delivers antioxidant protection while Saw Palmetto and Caffeine energize the hair and jump start your day. It's one manly step for your beard, and one badass step for beard-kind.
